source: {300}O{100}NCE UPON A TIME#THERE WAS#A {125}PLUCKY SQUIRE#{100}NAMED {175}JOT
{75}CRACKING!
HE DEFENDED THE LAND FROM#THE NEFARIOUS SORCERER, #{150}HUMGRUMP
WHICH EVERYONE VERY#MUCH APPRECIATED
{75}GOOD LAD!
JOT LIVED IN #{140}THE LAND OF MOJO #- A LAND OF {140}CREATIVITY
MOJO WAS #RULED BY THE GENTLE #{140}QUEEN CHROMA
{75}WELL DONE!
FROM AFAR, HE COULD HEAR SOME #{150} RATHER EXCITING MUSIC...
HE GOT DRESSED#AND WENT TO#{125}INVESTIGATE...
JOT AWOKE#ONE FINE MORNING
AND PLUCKILY#LEAPT FROM#HIS BED.
...WHO FOUND #THEM QUITE #{140}GRIPPING.
JOT WAS ALSO A #{140}WRITER
THESE TALES WERE #{140}AVIDLY READ{100} #BY ALL THE PEOPLE #OF THE LAND...
AND WOULD #TRANSCRIBE HIS #MANY ADVENTURES #{140}IN BOOK FORM.
CHAPTER ONE
SOME SERIOUS BEESWAX
THE MUSIC WAS REALLY BOOMING
JOT REALLY FELT LIKE INVESTIGATING THAT MUSIC...
target: JOTEK MUSIKA HORI IKERTZEKO SEKULAKO BEHARRA SENTITU ZUEN

source: {120}ARE YOU HEARING THIS LAD?! @{120}I RECKON IT COULD BE A SCOOTCH LOUDER!.. @{120}ALL ABOARD THE MOONBEARD EXPRESS! @{120}DESTINATION... {150}DANCE CITY!
column4: MUTIKO?! @{120}PIXKA BAT ALTUXEAGO EGON DAITEKEELA USTE DUT!.. @{120}IGO GUZTIOK ILARGIBIZAR EXPRESSERA! @{120}HELMUGA... {150}DANTZA HIRIA!

source: A MINI QUEST, WOOO-HAAA! YOU TAKE CARE OF THE GOBLINS, AND I'LL HAUL THE WAX BACK HERE FOR YA! @.... @OH YEAH, THERE'LL BE GOBLINS... @NO SWEAT FOR YOU THOUGH, RIGHT JOT?
target: MINI-ABENTURA BAT, UOOO-JAAA! ZU ARDURATU IRATXOEZ, ETA NIK EKARRIKO DIZUT ARGIZARIA! @.... @OH BAI, IRATXOAK EGONGO DIRA... @LAN ERRAZA ZURETZAT, EZTA JOT?

source: THE ENTRANCE TO THE WOODS BECKONED...
“AH, JOT, MY LAD!"
HE EXCLAIMED.
“I'M ON A ROLL HERE! TRAVELLING TO NEW MUSICAL REALMS!
target: “TOPERA NABIL HEMEN! MUSIKA ERRESUMA BERRIETARA BIDAIATZEN!

source: SINCE YOU'RE HERE, LAD, I HAVE A SMALL FAVOUR TO ASK..."
target: HEMEN ZAUDENEZ, LAGUN, MESEDETXO BAT ESKATUKO DIZUT..."

source: THIS WAS THE HOUSE OF#{150}THE GOOD WIZARD MOONBEARD,#JOT'S CLOSE FRIEND AND {134}MENTOR.
target: #{150}ILARGIBIZAR AZTI ZINTZOAREN {100}ETXEA ZEN,#JOTEN LAGUN MINA ETA BERE {134}AHOLKULARIA.

source: “I NEED MORE WAX, LAD!
{150}“PIP#HERE WILL#ACCOMPANY#YOU!"
...TO PRESS MORE RECORDS, YOU KNOW?"
“WAX!"
“WOULD YOU GO TO#{150}HONEY PEAK{100}#AND GET SOME WAX FROM#{150}BENNY BEE?"{100}
target: {150}“EZTI TONTOR{100}ERA JOAN#ETA ESKATUKO DIOZU EZTIA#{150}BENNY ERLEARI?"{100}

source: {150}GOBLINS{100} AMBLED AHEAD.
JOT, THAT'S NOT THE WAY TO HONEY PEAK!
target: JOT, HORI EZ DA EZTI TONTORRERAKO BIDEA!

source: TO TOME TOWER
HONEY PEAK
INKWOOD
THE GATE SWUNG OPEN FOR THE PLUCKY SQUIRE
target: ATEA BAPATEAN IREKI ZEN EZKUTARI AUSARTARENTZAT

source: HONEY PEAK!
THE PLUCKY SQUIRE LEAPT NIMBLY ONWARDS!
target: EZKUTARI AUSARTAK BIZKORKI EGIN ZUEN AURRERA!

source: NOW THIS LOOKED REALLY QUITE...#{150}PRECARIOUS!
JOT TOOK#A DEEP BREATH...
AND OFF HE LEAPT!
A GOBLIN!
AHH... THE TOP OF HONEY PEAK... #THE VIEW IS INCREDIBLE! @...
target: AHH... EZTI TONTORREKO GAILURRA... #BISTA ZORAGARRIA DA! @...

source: NOW THAT RIGHT THERE IS A MASSIVE OWL. @THAT'S TOME TOWER, THAT IS!
target: IKUSTEN DUZU HORKO HONTZ ERRALDOI HORI? @HORI LIBURUKI DORREA DA!

source: WHOAH! THAT'S A HONEY BADGER! EATING BENNY BEE'S HONEY! @BE ON YOUR TOES, JOT... A HUNGRY HONEY BADGER CAN BE REALLY CRANKY...
target: UAUU! EZTI AZKONARRA DA! BENNY ERLEAREN EZTIA JATEN ARI DA! @KASU EMAN, JOT... GOSEAK DAGOEN AZKONARRA OSO ERRETXINA IZAN DAITEKE...

source: OH HECK... HERE WE GO...
COMPLIMENTS TO THE WIZ.
FOR SURE, PIP, MY MAN, I OWE YOU GUYS. HERE YOU GO.
target: ZIUR, PIP, GIZON, ZOR DIZUET. HEMEN DUZUE.

source: AHH... BACK IN THE HIVE. FEELS GOOD. @YO MANY THANKS, JOT - YOU DID ME A SOLID. THAT HONEY BADGER WAS REALLY MESSING WITH MY BEESWAX. @ANYHOW GANG, WHAT BRINGS YOU HERE?
target: AHH... BERRIZ ERE BERASKAN. ZEINEN ONGI. @HI, MILESKER, JOT, FABORE EDERRA EGIN DIDAK. AZKONARRAK GOGOZ NAHI ZIAN NIRE ARGIZARIA. @DENA DEN, BIKOTE, NOLATAN ZUEK HEMEN?

source: MOONBEARD SENT US, BENNY! HE COULD REALLY DO WITH SOME OF THAT BEESWAX, IF YOU HAVE SOME SPARE!
target: ILARGIBIZARREK BIDALI GAITIK, BENNY! HIRE ARGIZARI HORREN BEHARRA OMEN DIK. @SOBERAN BADAUKAK, JAKINA!

source: HUH? WHAT'S GOING ON? @WHAT'S WITH ALL THIS OMINOUS DARKNESS?
target: EH? ZER GERTATZEN DA? @NONDIK DATOR ILUNTASUN BELDURGARRI HAU?

source: JOT PREPARED#FOR A#{150}DUST-UP
THE#HONEY BADGER#SEEMED RATHER#{225}ANNOYED
{Action_Jump}+Ꜳ
ATTACK!
BLOCK
BOXING THE BADGER'
DEFEND!
DODGE
GUARD
HOOK
JAB
ꜽ
Ꜿꜿ
{200}BEAST{100} WAS {200}BESTED!
THE PLUCKY SQUIRE#{150}TRIUMPHANT!
DOWN# THEY# {150}FELL
OOF!
IT WAS TIME#TO CONFER WITH#{160} MOONBEARD!

YEP, IT'S HUMGRUMP ALRIGHT. ALWAYS UP TO TREACHEROUS TRICKERY, THAT ONE. @THERE'S SOMETHING RATHER ODD ABOUT THE MAGIC HE USED... @AND... THIS IS NOT USUALLY HOW THE STORY GOES, YOU KNOW... @THAT IS TO SAY... URMM... @... @FORGET ABOUT THAT. HARRUMPH! @THIS IS A JOB FOR THE PLUCKY SQUIRE, JOT! @HUMGRUMP IS AT TOME TOWER... @HEAD THERE AND MAKE SURE THAT CREEPY LITTLE TWERP DOESN'T CAUSE ANY MORE BOTHER!
target: BAI BA, PETRALTZAR IZAN DA. BETI DARABIL MALTZURKERIAREN BAT HORREK. @ERABILI DUEN MAGIAN BADAGO BITXIA DEN ZERBAIT... @ETA... HAU EZ DA ISTORIOA GARATZEKO OHIKO MODUA, BADAKIZU? @HAU DA... ERMM... @... @EJEM... AHAZTU ESANDAKOA. @HAU EZKUTARI AUSARTARENTZAKO LANA DA, JOT! @PETRALTZAR LIBURUKI DORREAN DAGO... @ZOAZ HARANTZ ETA ZIURTATU KAIKU HORREK EZ DUELA ARAZO GEHIAGORIK SORTUKO!

source: {135}HELLOOOOOO!{100}

THAT WEASELLY WIZARD IS AT TOME TOWER. YOU KIDS HEAD OVER THERE, AND JOT... @PUT A STOP TO HUMGRUMP'S MALARKEY! @I'LL LOOK INTO THAT STRANGE GREEN MAGIC... @AND HAVE A DONUT. BUT THAT'S BY THE BY. @LATER!
target: AZTI MALTZUR HORI LIBURUKI DORREAN DAGO. ZOAZTE HARUNTZ GAZTETXOOK, ETA JOT... @GELDI EZAZU PETRALTZARREN GAIZTAKERIA! @NIK MAGIA BERDE BITXI HORI AZTERTUKO DUT... @ETA DONUT BAT JANGO DUT. BAINA HORI EZ DA KONTUA. @AIO!

source: GOODBYE AND GOOD LUCK! @ ALTHOUGH... YOU NEVER REALLY NEED IT, JOT!
target: AGUR ETA ZORTE ON! @ DENA DEN... BENETAN EZ DUZU HORRELAKORIK BEHAR, JOT!

source: HEY JOT! WE'VE GOT ANOTHER HUMGRUMP SITUATION, HUH? @MOONBEARD GAVE ME THE SKINNY!
target: AIZU JOT! PETRALTZAR BERRIZ GAIZTAKERIETAN, EZTA? @ILARGIBIZARREK KONTATU DIT!

source: NO LIE... I'M PUMPED THAT I'M GOING TO GET TO SEE THE PLUCKY SQUIRE IN ACTION... @{150}KAPOW!{100} @LEAD THE WAY, JOT!
target: EGIA ESANGO DIZUT... EZKUTARI AUSARTA LANEAN IKUSTEKO DESIRATZEN NAGO... @{150}BAM!{100} @GIDA GAITZAZU, JOT!

source: JOT FELT AN URGENT NEED TO GET GOING TO TOME TOWER!
target: JOTEK LIBURUKI DORRERA JOATEKO BAPATEKO BEHARRA SENTITU ZUEN!

source: WHAT THE...?
NICE! YOU ALWAYS HAVE A WAY WITH WORDS, JOT!
target: EDERKI! BETI IZAN ZARA TREBEA HITZEKIN, JOT!

source: I CAN SEE THE WAY AHEAD! LAST ONE THERE IS A ROTTEN EGG!
target: DORRERAKO BIDEA IKUSTEN DUT! AZKENA IPURDI GIZENA!

source: DO YOU WANT TO BUY THIS ITEM?
target: OBJETKU HAU EROSI NAHI AL DUZU?

source: DO YOU WANT TO BUY THIS ITEM? IT WILL REPLACE ANY ABILITY YOU ALREADY HAVE
target: OBJETKU HAU EROSI NAHI AL DUZU? LEHENDIK DUZUN TREBETASUNA ORDEZKATUKO DU

source: JOT GOT THE SWORD THROW BADGE!
target: JOTEK EZPATA JAURTITZEKO INTSIGNIA LORTU DU!

source: JOT GOT THE JUMP ATTACK BADGE!
JOT GOT THE SPIN ATTACK BADGE!
JOT UPGRADED HIS SWORD DAMAGE!
JOT UPGRADED HIS SWORD THROW!
JOT UPGRADED HIS SPIN ATTACK!
JOT FULLY UPGRADED HIS SWORD DAMAGE!
target: JOTEK EZPATA KOLPEA GUZTIZ HOBETU DU!

source: JOT FULLY UPGRADED HIS SWORD THROW!
target: JOTEK EZPATA JAURTITZEA GUZTIZ HOBETU DU!

source: JOT FULLY UPGRADED HIS SPIN ATTACK!
target: JOTEK BIRA ERASOA GUZTIZ HOBETU DU!

source: DODGE!
THROW YOUR SWORD TO ATTACK ENEMIES OR RETRIEVE GOODIES FROM A DISTANCE
target: BOTA ZURE EZPATA ETSAIEI ERASO EGITEKO EDO URRUNEKO GAUZA HARTZEKO

source: PERFORM A POWERFUL AND SURPRISING DOWNWARD STRIKE FROM THE AIR
target: AIRETIK BEHERANZKO EZUSTEKO ERASO BOTERETSUA EGITEKO

source: CHARGE UP AND RELEASE A DEVASTATING SPIN ATTACK TO EASILY CUT THROUGH GROUPS OF ENEMIES
target: KARGATU ETA ASKATU BIRA ERASO SUNTSITZAILE BAT EGITEKO ARERIO TALDEEN ERDIAN.

source: INCREASE THE POWER OF JOT'S SWORD. GOOD FOR ALL SWORD ATTACKS
target: JOTEN EZPATAREN BOTEREA HANDITZEN DU. EZPATA ERASO GUZTIENTZAT BALIO DU

source: JOT CAN NOW HIT MULTIPLE ENEMIES WITH A SINGLE SWORD THROW
target: JOTEK ORAIN HAINBAT ARERIO JO DITZAKE EZPATA KOLPE BAKARRAREKIN.

source: JOT WILL NOW SPIN TWICE AFTER CHARGING UP A SPIN
target: JOTEK ORAIN BIRA BIKOITZA EGINGO DU BIRA KARGATU ETA GERO

source: FURTHER INCREASE THE POWER OF JOT'S SWORD. GOOD FOR ALL SWORD ATTACKS
target: JOTEN EZPATAREN BOTEREA HOBETU. EZPATA ERASO GUZTIENTZAT ONA

source: JOT CAN NOW THROW HIS SWORD FURTHER THAN BEFORE
target: JOTEK ORAIN BERE EZPATA LEHEN BAINO URRUNAGO JAURTI DEZAKE.

source: JOT WILL NOW SPIN THREE TIMES AFTER CHARGING UP A SPIN
target: JOTEK ORAIN BIRA HIRUKOITZA EGINGO DU BIRA KARGATU ETA GERO

source: INCREASE JOT'S SWORD TO MAXIMUM POWER! GOOD FOR ALL SWORD ATTACKS
target: JOTEN EZPATAREN BOTERE MAXIMOA HANDITU DA! EZPATA ERASO GUZTIENTZAT ONA

source: JOT CAN NOW RECALL HIS THROWN SWORD INSTANTLY
target: JOTEK ORAIN JAURTITAKO EZPATA BEREHALA BEREGANA DEZAKE

source: JOT WILL NOW SPIN AN INCREDIBLE FOUR TIMES AFTER CHARGING UP A SPIN
target: JOTEK ORAIN BIRA LAUKOITZA EGINGO DU BIRA KARGATU ETA GERO

source: MELEE ATTACKS DO DOUBLE DAMAGE!
target: MELE ERASOAK MIN BIKOITZA EGITEN DU!

source: ALL BULBS COLLECTED ARE WORTH DOUBLE!
A BUBBLE WILL PROTECT JOT FROM THE NEXT HIT... AND DEAL DAMAGE TO THAT ENEMY!
target: BURBUILA BATEK JOT HURRENGO KOLPETIK BABESTUKO DU... ETA ARERIOARI MIN EMANGO DIO!

source: THE SWORD THROW WILL DEAL DOUBLE DAMAGE!
target: EZPATA BOTATZEAK MIN BIKOITZA ERAGINGO DU!

source: A SWORD THROW WILL NOW ATTRACT ITEMS FROM A DISTANCE!
target: JAURTITAKO EZPATAK URRUNEKO OBJEKTUAK HURBILDUKO DITU ORAIN!

source: JOT WILL RECEIVE PROTECTIVE ARMOUR!
ITEMS WILL BE DRAWN TO JOT FROM A DISTANCE! GOOD FOR LAZY COLLECTORS
target: URRUNEKO OBJEKTUAK JOTI HURBILDUKO ZAIZKIO! BILDUMAGILE ALFERRENTZAT EGOKIA

source: RECEIVE A SPECIAL ITEM THAT MAY OR MAY NOT BE CURRENTLY AVAILABLE IN THE SHOP!
A COLLECTABLE ART SCROLL THAT CAN'T BE FOUND IN THE LANDS OF MOJO!
target: ARTE PERGAMINO KOLEKZIONAGARRIA, EZIN DA MOJOKO LURRETAN AURKITU!

source: GREETINGS, BRAVE WARRIORS! @MY NAME'S MARTINA... NICE TO MEET YOU! @YOU ADVENTURERS CUT DOWN FEARSOME ENEMIES... AND I SLASH PRICES. @LET ME SHOW YOU WHAT I HAVE FOR SALE!
target: ONGI ETORRI, GERLARI ADORETSUAK! @NI MARTINA NAIZ... URTE ASKOTARAKO! @ABENTURAZALEEK GAIZKILE BELDURGARRIAK TXIKITZEN DITUZUE... ETA NIK PREZIOAK. @ZATOZTE SALGAI DUDANA IKUSTERA!

source: IT WAS LOVELY TO MAKE YOUR ACQUAINTANCE! @BE SURE TO CHECK IN AGAIN... NEXT TIME WE MEET I'LL HAVE NEW STOCK! @YOU KEEP SAVING THE LAND FROM BAD BUSINESS, AND MY BUSINESS WILL SAVE YOU FROM BAD DEALS. @SO LONG, BRAVE WARRIORS!
target: PLAZERA IZAN DA ZUEK EZAGUTZEA! @PASA BERRIZ NAHI DUZUENEAN... HURRENGORAKO GAUZA GEHIAGO IZANGO DITUT! @ZUEK JARRAITU LURRALDE HAU BABESTEN, ETA NIK AKORDIO TXARRETATIK BABESTUKO ZAITUZTET. @HURRENGORA ARTE, GERLARI ADORETSUAK!

source: WE MEET AGAIN! @CARE TO TAKE A LOOK AT MY CURRENT SELECTION?
target: BERRIRO TOPATU GARA! @NIRE AUKERAKETA IKUSI NAHI DUZUE?

source: WELL IF IT ISN'T THE BRAVE WARRIORS WITH A SHARP EYE FOR GOOD DEALS! @I'VE GOT SOME NEW STUFF IN. TAKE A LOOK!
target: HARA, BEHERAPENENTZAKO BEGI ZORROTZA DUTEN ABENTURAZALEAK DIRA ETA! @GAUZA BERRIAK DITUT ZUENTZAT, EMAN BEGIRADA BAT!

source: WANT TO TAKE ANOTHER LOOK?
UNTIL NEXT TIME, BRAVE WARRIORS!
FAREWELL FOR NOW, FRIENDS!
GOOD NEWS, FRIENDS! @I NEED TO MAKE ROOM FOR NEW STOCK, SO YOU CAN HAVE THIS FOR FREE.
target: BERRI ONAK, LAGUNAK! @GAUZA BERRIENTZAKO LEKUA EGIN BEHAR DUT, BERAZ, HAU DOAN HAR DEZAKEZUE.

source: FRIENDS, YOU'D REALLY BE HELPING ME OUT IF YOU TAKE THIS OFF MY HANDS. @COME, TAKE THIS WITH YOU. FREE OF CHARGE!
target: LAGUNAK, MESEDE HANDIA EGINGO ZENIDAKETE HAU HARTUKO BAZENUTE. @TORI, HARTU ZUENTZAT. DOAN!

source: WELL, THERE IT IS. THAT MYSTERIOUS ANCIENT OWL. @ALL THE KNOWLEDGE OF MOJO IS SUPPOSED TO BE STORED IN THERE, Y'KNOW...
target: TIRA, HOR DAGO. ANTZINAKO HONTZ MISTERIOTSU HORI. @MOJOKO JAKINTZA GUZTIA BERTAN DAGOELA USTE DA, BA'KIZU...

source: WHOAH! @NOT SURE THE GROUND SHOULD BE DOING THIS...
target: UOOO! @LURRAK EZ LUKE HORI EGIN BEHAR...

source: Although the broad design of Jot was decided early on, alternative hero designs were explored during pre-production.
target: Joten diseinu orokorra oso hasieratik erabakita egon arren, heroiaren diseinu alternatibo batzuk aztertu genituen pre-produkzio garaian.

source: Testing how an alternative hero design would look in the top-down environments. Conclusion: too visually complex, and not quite as charming. Sorry fella.
target: Heroi diseinu alternatiboa goitik beherako inguruneetan nola geldituko litzatekeen probatzen. Ondorioa: bisualki konplexuegia, eta batere xarmagarria. Barkatu, lagun.

source: A graphical glitch in the boxing minigame created our friend the Glitchbird. A character created by the game itself. Thank you, game.
target: Boxeo minijokoko hautsitako grafiko batetik sortu zen gure lagun Heghautsia. Jokoak berak sortutako pertsonaia bat. Eskerrik asko, joko.

source: A lineup of the characters that appear in the gameplay section we call 'Dinorama'.
target: Jokoan zehar ageri diren pertsonaia batzuen atala, guk 'Dinorama' deitzen diogu.

source: Some early concepting of game environments. This would eventually become Boogie Beach.
target: Jokoaren inguruneetako hasierako diseinuak. Hau gerora Dantza Hondartza izan zen.

source: Some early concepting of game environments. This would eventually become the dino land Jot adventures through on the desk.
target: Jokoaren inguruneetako hasierako diseinuak. Hau gerora Jotek mahaingainean topatzen duen dinosauroen lurraldea izango zen.

source: Some early concepting of game environments. Looks delicious.
target: Jokoaren inguruneetako hasierako diseinuak. Itxura ederra.

source: Some early concepting of game environments. This would eventually become Artia Town.
target: Jokoaren inguruneetako hasierako diseinuak. Hau gerora Artia Herria izango zen.

source: Some early concepting of game environments. This would eventually become Artia Castle.
target: Jokoaren inguruneetako hasierako diseinuak. Hau gerora Artiako Gaztelua izango zen.

source: Some early concepting of game environments. An enchanted place.
target: Jokoaren inguruneetako hasierako diseinuak. Leku sorgindua.

source: Some early concepting of game environments. Spooky.
Some early concepting of game environments. This would eventually become Deepdoom.
target: Jokoaren inguruneetako hasierako diseinuak. Hau gerora Galbide Sakona izango zen.

source: Some early concepting of game environments. This would eventually become the green lands in the early chapters of the game.
target: Jokoaren inguruneetako hasierako diseinuak. Hau gerora joko hasierako eremu berdea izango zen.

source: Some early concepting of game environments. Lots of skeletons skull-king around.
target: Jokoaren inguruneetako hasierako diseinuak. Hemen eskeletu asko zeuden.

source: Some early concepting of game environments. Appealing to the 80s / 90s kid who grew up with slime toys and TV shows.
target: Jokoaren inguruneetako hasierako diseinuak. 80 eta 90eko hamarkadetan marrazki bizidunekin eta jolas likatsuekin hazitako haurren nostalgia esplotatu nahi genuen.

source: Some early concepting of game environments. The hot spring looks quite inviting, don't you think?
target: Jokoaren inguruneetako hasierako diseinuak. Iturburu bero hori tentagarria da, ezta?

source: Some early concepting of game environments. This would eventually become the Sonnet Swamps.
target: Jokoaren inguruneetako hasierako diseinuak. Hau gerora Soneto Zingirak izango zen.

source: Some early concepting of game environments. All these environment concepts were drawn by Dave Hankin.
target: Jokoaren inguruneetako hasierako diseinuak. Ingurune diseinu guzti hauek Dave Hankinek marraztu zituen.

source: Some early concepting of game environments. This would eventually become Moonbeard's lab.
target: Jokoaren inguruneetako hasierako diseinuak. Hau gerora Ilargibizarren Laborategia izango zen.

source: We knew we wanted to feature a boxing minigame... but it took a while to land on exactly who your opponent would be. As it turns out, it wouldn't be a giant muscular duck.
target: Bagenekien boxeo minijoko bat nahi genuela... baina arerioa nor izango zen erabakitzea kosta egin zitzaigun. Azkenean, ahate erraldoi gihartsu bat ez izatea erabaki genuen.

source: Exploring the look of Jot on the desk. Early on he was actually cel-shaded, but he just looked better more realistically shaded.
target: Jot mahaingainean nola geldituko zen probatzen. Hasiera batean cel-shadinga probatu genuen, baina azkenean errendatze errealago bat aukeratu genuen.

source: Early character design. This was before Jot was a writer, and didn't have a quill in his hat. He already has that plucky disposition, though.
target: Hasierako pertsonaien diseinua. Jot idazlea izan baino lehenagokoa da, beraz, buruan ez du lumarik. Baina ordurako bazuen jarrera ausart hori.

source: Early character design. Moonbeard before his sunglasses.
target: Hasierako pertsonaien diseinua. Ilargibizar eguzkitako betaurrekorik gabe.

source: Early character design. Pip was originally a trickster kind of character who turned out to be evil. The Pip now featured in the game is all good. We think.
target: Hasierako pertsonaien diseinua. Pip berez iruzurti bat zen jokoaren bukaeran gaiztoa izango zena. Jokoan ageri den Pip erabat zintzoa da orain. Uste dugu.

source: Early character design. Thrash was always athletic, but started out as a human character before becoming a mountain troll.
target: Hasierako pertsonaien diseinua. Thrash beti izan da atletikoa, baina hasiera batean gizaki arrunta zen mendiko trolla izan beharrean.

source: Early character design. At one point Violet was a rabbit.
target: Hasierako pertsonaien diseinua. Puntu horretan Violet untxi bat zen.

source: Early character design. Humgrump's look came together fairly early on, and didn't change much.
target: Hasierako pertsonaien diseinua. Petraltzarren diseinua hasieratik izan genuen argi eta apenas aldatu da.

source: An idea for a whack-a-mole style minigame. These guys look like they'd whack you right back.
target: Satorrak jotzeko minijoko baten ideia. Baina hauek kolpea itzultzeko itxura dute.

source: A concept piece of Jot emerging from the book. For a while he was drawn with a cat companion, but eventually Pip took on the companion role. The cat was pipped by a mouse.
target: Jot liburutik ateratzen zenerako kontzeptu pieza. Denbora batez katu laguntzaile batekin marrazten genuen, baina azkenean Pipek hartu zuen laguntzaile papera. Saguak katua garaitu zuen.

source: An exploration of the look of the room. This was useful reference for the 3D artists. The art was drawn by Murilo Cavalcanti.
target: Gelaren itxura esploratzen. 3D artistentzako erreferentzia erabilgarria izan zen. Artea Murilo Cavalcantik marraztu zuen.

source: An exploration of the mood of the desk when Jot is first kicked out of his storybook.
target: Mahaigaineko giroaren esplorazio bat Jot liburutik lehenengoz ateratzen denean.

source: An intro page for a shooting minigame idea. We always wanted Jot to become super-buff when the situation called for it. There's no real logic to it, it just seemed like a funny idea.
target: Tiro egiteko minijoko baten hasiera orriaren ideia. Argi genuen Jot gihartsu bat nahi genuela jokoak hala eskatzen zuenean. Ez du inongo logikarik baina ideia dibertigarria izan zen.

source: Sometimes it's useful just to draw a whole load of enemies without too much thought as to how they'll be used. You can pick the ones you like afterwards.
target: Batzuetan erabilgarria da arerio piloa marraztea, zertarako balioko duten pentsatu gabe. Erabiliko dituzunak beranduago aukeratu ditzakezu.

source: The little pig enemy here would eventually become the Rubboink character found in Artia.
target: Txerritxo arerio hori aurrerago Artian agertuko diren Borragoinkak bihurtuko ziren.

source: I like Business Bear here. Shame we didn't find a spot for him in this game. Maybe one day his time will come.
target: Hartz Enpresari hau atsegin dut. Pena ez geniola lekurik aurkitu jokoan. Agian egunen batean agertuko zaigu.

source: Exploring designs for silhouetted enemies.
This was sketched soon after the idea of The Plucky Squire was formed. It features a very early design of our hero, Jot.
target: Ezkutari Ausartaren ideia izan orduko egindako zirriborroa. Gure heroi Joten oso hasierako diseinua.

source: Initial sketch of top-down gameplay. Narration text appearing in the environment was a planned feature since the earliest days.
target: Goitik beherako jostagarritasunaren hasierako zirriborroa. Narrazio testua ingurunean agertzearena hasieratik planeatuta zegoen.

source: Sketching the look of simple full-page minigames.
Initial sketch of side-scrolling gameplay.
Sketching how top-down character interactions might look, featuring an early Moonbeard design.
target: Goitik beherako pertsonaiaren eraginaren zirriborroa, Ilargibizarren hasierako diseinua.

source: First explorations of the key art for the game. This feels more like teaser art than key art. This art features the working title of the project.
target: Jokoaren oinarrizko artearen lehenengo esplorazioa. Oinarrizkoa baino aurreratuagoa dirudi. Proiektuaren hasierako izena ageri da bertan.

source: Key art rough layout featuring an early logo design.
target: Oinarrizko artearen gutxi gorabeherako hasierako logoa.

source: The final key art. The art is made up of a combination of 3D renders and digitally-painted elements.
target: Azken oinarrizko artea. Artea 3D errendatze eta digitalki margotutako elementuen nahasketarekin egina dago.

source: The image for this shooting minigame was a saturday morning sci-fi cartoon. We call this gameplay section 'Resotub'.
target: Tiro minijoko honentzako irudia larunbat goizeko zientzi fikziozko marrazkietan inspiratua da. Atal honi 'Resotub' deitzen diogu.

source: Jot has ink stains on his writing hand.
target: Jotek tintaz zikinduta du idazteko eskua.

source: Thrash has callouses on his fingers from drumming and on the soles of his feet from... walking around barefoot.
target: Thrashek bateria jotzearen ondorioz eskuetan babak ditu eta oinetan ere baditu... oinutsik ibiltzeagatik.

source: Violet's hands are paint-stained.

At first the interactive domino objects in our game were just normal dominoes. We realised it would make life much easier if they could only fall one-way, however, and so the one-way domino object was born.
target: Hasiera batean, jokoko domino elementu interaktiboak domino pieza arruntak ziren. Ohartu ginen bizitza askoz ere lasaiagoa izango genuela piezak alde batera bakarrik eroriko balira. Horrela jaio zen alde-bakarreko dominoa.

source: Explorations in the presentation of story sequences. At first they were more comic-like in their layout - formatted in square panels - but eventually became more picturebook-esque.
target: Istorioko sekuentzien aurkezpen esplorazioak. Hasieran komiki itxura handiagoa zuten, bineta laukiekin, baina azkenean ipuinen itxura eman genion.

YOU FOUND A LOST GLITCHBIRD! @IT WILL RETURN TO ITS HOMELAND.
target: GALDUTAKO HEGHAUTSI BAT BAT AURKITU DUZU! @BERE SORTERRIRA ITZULIKO DA.

source: YOU FOUND A SECOND LOST GLITCHBIRD! @IT WILL RETURN TO ITS HOME WITH JOY IN ITS LITTLE HEART.
target: GALDUTAKO BIGARREN HEGHAUTSIA AURKITU DUZU! @BIHOTZ TXIKIA ZORIONEZ BETETA DUELA ITZULIKO DA BERE ETXERA.

source: YOU FOUND A THIRD LOST GLITCHBIRD! @YOU ARE REALLY GOOD AT FINDING GLITCHBIRDS.
target: GALDUTAKO HIRUGARREN HEGHAUTSIA AURKITU DUZU! @BENETAN ONA ZARA HEGHAUTSIAK AURKITZEN.

source: YOU FOUND A FOURTH LOST GLITCHBIRD! @GLITCHBIRDS ARE HIGHLY CURIOUS CREATURES, BUT, ALAS, NOT INCREDIBLY PERCEPTIVE. @THIS OFTEN LEADS TO THEM BECOMING CONFUSED AND LOST. @AFTER A WHILE THEY BECOME QUITE LONELY, AND LONG TO RETURN TO THEIR HOMELAND. @GOOD JOB FINDING THIS ONE.
target: GALDUTAKO LAUGARREN HEGHAUTSIA AURKITU DUZU! @HEGHAUTSIAK OSO IZAKI KUXKUXEROAK DIRA, BAINA, EZ BEREZIKI ARGIAK. @HORREGATIK ASKOTAN NAHASI ETA GALDU EGITEN DIRA. @AZKENERAKO BAKARRIK GELDITZEN DIRA, ETA SORTERRITIK URRUN. @LAN ITZELA HAU AURKITZEN.

source: YOU FOUND A FIFTH LOST GLITCHBIRD! @WHEN YOU FEEL THAT YOU ARE LOST, WITH NO WAY OUT IN SIGHT... @PLEASE BE BRAVE, AND HAVE HOPE. @THERE IS ALWAYS A WAY BACK TO THE LIGHT. @AND THANK YOU FOR RESCUING THIS GLITCHBIRD. THERE ARE STILL A FEW MORE TO FIND!
target: GALDUTAKO BOSGARREN HEGHAUTSIA AURKITU DUZU! @GALDUTA ZAUDELA SENTITZEN DUZUNEAN, ARGITASUNETIK URRUN... @MESEDEZ IZAN ADOREA, ETA IZAN ITXAROPENA. @BETI DAGO ARGITASUNEA ITZULTZEKO BIDEA. @ETA ESKERRIK ASKO HEGHAUTSI HAU SALBATZEAGATIK. ORAINDIK BADAUDES AURKITZEKO BATZUK GEHIAGO!

source: YOU FOUND A SIXTH LOST GLITCHBIRD! @TO THE UNTRAINED EYE, GLITCHBIRDS LOOK SIMILAR TO EACH OTHER. @HOWEVER, EACH ONE IS QUITE UNIQUE. @FOR EXAMPLE, IN ITS HOMELAND THE GLITCHBIRD YOU JUST RESCUED IS A CHARTERED SURVEYOR.
target: GALDUTAKO SEIGARREN HEGHAUTSIA AURKITU DUZU! @ENTRENATU GABEKO BEGIARENTZAT, HEGHAUTSI GUZTIAK BERDINAK DIRA. @HALA ERE, BAKOITZA BEREZIA DA. @ADIBIDEZ, SALBATU BERRI DUZUNA BERE SORTERRIAN BIDE-INGENIARIA ZEN.

source: YOU FOUND A SEVENTH LOST GLITCHBIRD! @THAT GLITCHBIRD WAS ACTUALLY A HIGHLY RESPECTED PIANIST IN ITS HOMELAND. @YOU WERE IN THE PRESENCE OF A CELEBRITY AND YOU DIDN'T REALISE IT. @PERHAPS IT WILL WRITE A SONG ABOUT THE KIND SQUIRE WHO RESCUED IT.
target: GALDUTAKO ZAZPIGARREN HEGHAUTSIA AURKITU DUZU! @HEGHAUTSI HAU ITZAL HANDIKO PIANO-JOTZAILEA DA BERE SORTERRIAN. @IZAKI OSPETSU BAT IZAN DUZU ZUREKIN ETA EZ ZARA OHARTU ERE EGIN. @BEHARBADA SALBATU ZUEN EZKUTARIARI BURUZKO ABESTI BAT EGINGO DU.

source: YOU FOUND AN EIGHTH LOST GLITCHBIRD! @YOU'RE GETTING CLOSE TO RESCUING ALL THE LOST GLITCHBIRDS! @CRACKING JOB SO FAR!
target: GALDUTAKO ZORTZIGARREN HEGHAUTSIA AURKITU DUZU! @HEGHAUTSI GUZTIAK SALBATZETIK OSO GERTU ZAUDE! @IZUGARRIZKO LANA!

source: YOU FOUND A NINTH LOST GLITCHBIRD! @THERE'S ONLY ONE LEFT TO FIND! @NOW WHERE COULD IT BE?
target: GALDUTAKO BEDERATZIGARREN HEGHAUTSIA AURKITU DUZU! @BAT BAKARRIK GELDITZEN ZAIZU! @NON EGON LITEKE?

source: YOU FOUND THE TENTH AND FINAL LOST GLITCHBIRD! @ALL THE GLITCHBIRDS ARE NOW BACK IN THEIR HOMELAND. @WORD IS THAT THEY'RE PLANNING TO THROW A PARTY IN YOUR HONOUR. @IT'S SAID THAT THOSE WHO DO GOOD DEEDS FOR GLITCHBIRDS WILL EXPERIENCE GOOD FORTUNE. @THANK YOU FOR RESCUING THEM ALL, AND MAY FORTUNE SMILE UPON YOU.
target: GALDUTAKO HAMARGARREN ETA AZKEN HEGHAUTSIA AURKITU DUZU! @HEGHAUTSI GUZTIAK BERAIEN SORTERRIETAN DAUDE HONEZKERO. @TXUTXUMUTXUEK DIOTE ZURE OHOREZKO FESTA BAT EGINGO DUTELA. @DIOTENEZ, HEGHAUTSIEI LAGUNTZEN DIENEK ZORTE ONA IZATEN OMEN DUTE. @ESKERRIK ASKO GUZTIAK SALBATZEAGATIK, ZORTE ONA IZAN DEZAZULA.

source: HERE, A PORTAL TO HELP YOU ON YOUR WAY...
target: HEMEN, BIDEAN LAGUNDUKO DIZUN ATARI BAT...

source: GOOD GOING, YOUNG SQUIRE! @I BELIEVE THAT THE ITEM THAT CAN HELP YOU GET BACK TO YOUR WORLD IS FURTHER AHEAD. @BUT, LISTEN, ON YOUR WAY YOU MAY RUN INTO CREEPY CRAWLY COLEOPTERA... @BEETLES! SAM LIKES TO KEEP THEM AS PETS, YOU SEE... @BEWARE, JOT! DON'T GET EATEN! @IT SIMPLY WOULDN'T DO...
target: ONGI EGINA, EZKUTARI GAZTEA! @ZURE MUNDURA ITZULTZEN LAGUNDUKO DIZUN OBJEKTUA AURRERAXEAGO DAGOELA USTE DUT. @BAINA, ENTZUN, BALITEKE ZURE BIDEAN KOLEOPTERO BELDURGARRIAK AURKITZEA... @KAKALARDOAK! SAMEK MASKOTA MODUAN IZATEN DITU... @KASU EMAN, JOT! EZ ZAITZATELA JAN! @ARAZOA HANDIA LITZATEKE...

source: JOT! EXCEPTIONAL PROGRESS! @LOOK, THERE'S SOMETHING I NEED TO SHOW YOU...
target: JOT! AURRERAPEN ITZELA! @BEGIRA, GAUZA BAT ERAKUTSI BEHAR DIZUT...

source: SAM DREW THESE SKETCHES OF YOU...QUITE A REMARKABLE LIKENESS, I MUST ATTEST. @AS YOU MIGHT BE ABLE TO TELL, HE IS VERY FOND OF YOU AND YOUR ADVENTURES. @I'M GLAD THAT YOU GOT TO SEE THIS, JOT... TO SEE HOW MUCH YOU MEAN TO HIM.
target: SAMEK ZURE ZIRRIBORRO HAUEK MARRAZTU ZITUEN... ANTZ HANDIA DUZUE, ENE IDURIZ. @IKUSIKO ZENUEN MODUAN, ZU ETA ZURE ABENTURAK BIZIK MAITE DITU. @ZUK HAU IKUSTEAZ ASKO POZTEN NAIZ, JOT... BERETZAT ZEINEN GARRANTZITSUA ZAREN IKUSTEAZ.

source: NOW, LET'S PRESS ON! THE ITEM YOU SEEK IS JUST AHEAD!
target: ORAIN JARRAITU! BILA ZABILTZAN OBJEKTUA AURRERAXEAGO DAGO ETA!

source: THE#{300}SONNET SWAMPS{100}
THIS BUG LOOKED RATHER DISAGREEABLE.
target: ZOMORRO HONEK NAHIKO DESATSEGIN ITXURA ZUEN

source: WELL THIS IS UNKNOWN TERRITORY, KIDDOS. @JOT, YOUR STORY HAS NEVER TAKEN YOU TO THIS AREA... YOU'RE OFF-SCRIPT NOW! @NO HAPPY ENDINGS GUARANTEED... YOU COULD GET SPLATTED, EATEN BY A HUGE FROG... WHO KNOWS? @ALTHOUGH THESE SWAMPS ARE USUALLY RATHER CULTURED, AS FAR AS I GATHER... @...THE RESIDENTS HERE ARE QUITE KEEN ON POETRY. @IF YOU'VE EVER WANTED TO HEAR A SNAIL RECITE VERSE, HERE'S YOUR CHANCE. @NEVERTHELESS, YOU ZZZKVCCCH @ZZDVVVVVVV @VVVDDCH BAD RECEPTION!
target: TIRA, LURRALDE EZEZAGUNA DUGU HAU, TXIKIOK. @JOT, ZURE ISTORIEK EZ ZAITUZTE SEKULA HONA EKARRI... GIDOIZ KANPO ZABILTZA! @EZ DUGU BUKAERA ZORIONTSU ZIURRIK... @ZAPALDU ZAITZAKETE, IGEL ERROLDOI BATEK JAN... NORK DAKI?. @HALA ERE, ZINGIRA HAUEK NAHIKO DOTOREAK OMEN DIRA... @...HEMENGO EGOILIARRAK OSO POESIA ZALEAK DIRA. @INOIZ ENTZUN NAHI IZAN BADUZU BARRASKILO BAT BERTSO BAT ERREZITATZEN, HEMEN DUZU AUKERA. @EDONOLA ERE, ZUK ZZZKVCCCH @ZZDVVVVVVV @VVVDDCH ESTALDURARIK GABE!

source: ... @MOONBEARD? @LOOKS LIKE RUNETOOTH DOESN'T WORK SO WELL IN THESE SWAMPS... @I GUESS WE'LL GET CONNECTED AGAIN ONCE WE'RE ON THE OTHER SIDE!
target: ... @ILARGIBIZAR? @BADIRUDI BLUTUZAK EZ DUELA ONGI FUNTZIONATZEN ZINGIRA HAUETAN... @GURUTZATU ONDOREN BERRIZ KONEKTATUKO GARELA PENTSATZEN DUT!

source: DANG... THIS PLACE IS HEAVING WITH BUGS!
target: ENE... LEKU HAU ZOMORRO ASTUNEZ BETETA DAGO!

source: CRAZY STUFF, MAN.
SO... THIS MUST BE ONE OF THE PORTALS MOONBEARD WAS TALKING ABOUT... @AND YOU, JOT... CAN JUST... JUMP RIGHT OUT OF OUR WORLD THROUGH THIS THING? @ONTO... A DESK IN SOMEONE'S ROOM??
target: BERAZ... ILARGIBIZARREK AIPATUTAKO ATARI HORIETAKO BAT IZANGO DA HAU... @ETA ZUK, JOT... SOILIK... JAUZI EGIN ETA GURE MUNDUTIK KANPORA ZOAZ HEMENDIK? @NORBAITEN... GELAKO MAHAIRA??

source: AND ON THAT DESK... IS A STORYBOOK... @IN WHICH WE'RE ALL LIVING??
target: ETA MAHAI HORRETAN... IPUIN-LIBURU BAT DAGO... @ETA GU BERTAN BIZI GARA??

source: {120}I'M A CHARACTER... IN A STORY????? @{140}MY WHOLE LIFE IS JUST A PLOTLINE?? @{100}... @SORRY. IT'S JUST A BIT MUCH TO TAKE ON BOARD... @ALTHOUGH IT FIGURES THAT I'M JUST A SUPPORTING CHARACTER IN SOMEONE'S STORY. @I JUST WISH I'D BEEN WRITTEN A LITTLE MORE... COOL...
target: {120}IPUIN BATEKO... PERTSONAIA NAIZ????? @{140}NIRE BIZITZA OSOA ARGUMENTU BAT BAINO EZ DA?? @{100}... @BARKATU. ONARTZEA PIXKA BAT ZAILA EGITEN ARI ZAIT... @GAINERA IRUDITZEN ZAIT BESTE PERTSONAIA BATEN ISTORIOKO LAGUNTZAILEA NAIZELA. @NAHIAGO NUKE IZANGO BANINTZ PIXKA BAT... GUAYAGOA...

source: HE MUST BE IN THE OTHER REALM NOW. I WONDER IF HE CAN STILL SEE US...? @I GUESS TO HIM WE LOOK LIKE... DRAWINGS ON A PAGE?
target: BESTE ERREALITATE BATEAN EGONGO DA ORAIN. BERAK IKUSI OTE GAITZAKE...? ZER IZANGO GARA BERETZAT... PAPER BATEKO MARRAZKIAK?

source: HE VANISHED!
GNARLY.
BACK IN OUR WORLD AGAIN...! @AS SIMPLE AS THAT... @I REALLY WONDER WHAT IT'S LIKE OUT THERE...
target: BUELTAN GURE MUNDUAN...! @HAIN ERRAZ... @HOR KANPOKOA NOLAKOA DEN JAKIN NAHI NUKE...

source: IF YOU FILLED THAT BIG OLD MOAT FULL OF WATER... @YOU MIGHT BE ABLE TO ACCESS SOMEWHERE USEFUL.
target: FOSO ZAHAR HANDI HORI UREZ BETEKO BAZENU... @BESTE LEKUREN BATERA AILEGATU ZINTEZKE.

source: IF YOU'VE HIT THE SWITCH, WHY NOT GET DOWN TO THE BOTTOM OF THE MOAT? @YOU MIGHT FIND A HANDY WORD DOWN THERE. @WORTH A GANDER.
target: ETENGAILUA MUGITUTA, ZERGATIK EZ ZARA FOSORA JAISTEN? @HITZ EGOKIREN BAT AURKITU DEZAKEZU BERTAN. @SAIATZEAK MEREZI DU.

source: WE MEET AGAIN.
HUMONGOUS BUG. LOOKS LIKE IT'S FULL OF WATER.
target: HAU ZOMORROTZARRA. UREZ BETETA DAGOELA DIRUDI.

source: IF IT WASN'T SO HUGE WE COULD GET AROUND IT AND BE ON OUR WAY!
target: EZ BALITZ HAIN HANDIA, INGURATU ETA BIDEAN JARRAI GENEZAKE

source: GOODBYE TINY INSECT DUDE. @AWESOME JOB, JOT! @YOU'VE REALLY GOT A GRASP ON THE POWER OF WORDS!
target: AGUR INTSEKTUTXOA. @LAN EDERRA, JOT! @HITZEN BOTEREA KONTROLPEAN DUZULA DIRUDI

source: I GUESS THE STORY IN THIS BOOK REALLY ISN'T FIXED, HUH?
target: BADIRUDI IPUIN HONETAKO ISTORIOA EZ DELA ESPERO BEZAIN ZURRUNA, EZTA?

source: MAYBE THE STORY'S CHARACTERS ARE NOT SO FIXED EITHER... Y'KNOW?
target: BEHARBADA ISTORIOKO PERTSONAIAK ERE EZ DIRA HAIN ZURRUNAK... ULERTZEN?

source: IT'S ALL JUST AMAZING REALLY. HUGE TO TINY, FULL TO EMPTY... @BY CHANGING THE WORDS... YOU CAN CHANGE... WELL... EVERYTHING!
target: HAU DENA SINESTEZINA DA. ERRALDOITIK TXIKIRA. BETETIK HUTSERA... @HITZAK ALDATUZ... ZUK ALDA DEZAKEZU... ZERA... DENA!

source: I GUESS... NOT.
A [WORD_1] BUG SAT IN THE MIDDLE OF THE PATH
target: ZOMORRO [WORD_1] BAT ESERITA ZEGOEN BIDEAREN ERDIAN

source: A [WORD_1] FROG OBSERVED THE BUG
THESE RUINS WERE JUST [WORD_1] OF BUGS!
THE RUSTY GATE WAS [WORD_1]
THE MOAT WAS COMPLETELY [WORD_1] OF WATER
JOT PEERED INTO THE [WORD_1] GRATE.

WHOOAH! @LOOK AT THE SIZE OF THAT... @BIG... @GNARLY... @UHHHHH... @THING!
GREEN LIGHTNING STRUCK WITH FURIOUS SOUND... @THIS INSECT'S NEST BROKE THROUGH THE GROUND. AND THENCE... FLEW THE BUGS... @REALLY NOT A FAN OF THESE PUNKY BUGS.
target: OINAZKAR BERDEAK AMORRU DOINUAREKIN JO ZUEN... @ZOMORROEN HABIA HAU LURRETIK AZALERATU ZEN. ETA HANDIK... ZOMORROAK HEGAN... @EZ DIET INONGO ESTIMURIK ARTROPODO BASATI HAUEI!

source: SNAILS ARE NOT BUGS, BY THE WAY. WE ARE MOLLUSCS. BIG DIFFERENCE.
target: BIDE BATEZ, BARRASKILOAK EZ GARA ZOMORROAK. MOLUSKUAK GARA. ALDE HANDIA DAGO.

source: IF YOU TURN THE PAGES, YOU MIGHT RETRIEVE A USEFUL WORD. @A WORD THAT COULD GET YOU ACROSS THIS SLIMY, SWAMPY WATER. @WHY NOT GIVE IT A GO? SOMETHING TO DO, AT LEAST.
target: ORRIAK BIRATUZ GERO, HITZ ERABILGARRIREN BAT AURKI DEZAKEZU. @ZINGIRAKO UR LIKATSU HAU PASATZEN LAGUNDUKO DIZUN HITZ BAT. @ZERGATIK EZ SAIATU?

source: HOW GOES IT.
THE WALKWAY WAS DESTROYED
A [WORD_1] LILYPAD FLOATED ON THE WATER
LOOK, OVER THERE... A POOR FLIPPERY FLOUNDERING FISH!
target: BEGIRA HOR... ARRAIN SALTARI HORI NAHIKO LANEKIN DABIL!

source: JOT, DUDE... THAT FISH LOOKS LIKE IT REALLY NEEDS OUR HELP!
target: JOT, MOTEL... ARRAIN HORREK GURE LAGUNTZA BEHAR DU!

source: PHEW! THANK YOU SO MUCH, NOBLE TRAVELER! @MY NAME IS FLOATIO, AND I AM A FISH.
target: FIU! ESKERRIK ASKO BENETAN, BIDAIARI PRESTUA! @NIRE IZENA IGERINE DA ETA ARRAINA NAIZ.

source: GREEN LIGHTNING ZAPPED ME RIGHT OUT OF THESE WATERS. @CONSUMED BY FEAR I FLIPPED AND FLOPPED... @'TIL BY YOUR HAND MY FUGUE WAS STOPPED. @I AM ETERNALLY IN YOUR DEBT. BUT YOU MUST FORGIVE ME... I MUST GO... @FOR MY BELOVED SWIMS THIS REEDY FEN @AND I CANNOT REST 'TIL WE MEET AGAIN. @SAFE TRAVELS, MY NOBLE SAVIOURS.
target: TXIMISTA BERDEAK URETIK ATERA NINDUEN. @BELDURRAK EZIN EGONEZ SALTOKA NENBILEN... @ZURE ESKUAK NIRE AMESGAIZTOA GELDITU DUEN ARTE. @BETI EGONGO NAIZ ZUREKIN ZORRETAN. @BAINA BARKATUKO DIDAZU... ALDE EGIN BEHAR DUT...  @NIRE MAITEA AURKITU ARTEAN @IGERI EGINGO DUT IHI ARTEAN. @BIDAIA ON, NIRE SALBATZAILE PRESTUAK.

source: WHAT AN EXTREMELY WELL-SPOKEN FISH. @I DO HOPE HE FINDS HIS LOVE...
target: ZEINEN HITZ EDERRAK ARRAIN HONENAK. @BERE MAITEA AURKITZEA ESPERO DUT...

source: AND THE LIGHT BEGAN TO DWINDLE
OUR HEROES VENTURED ON
THE SOUNDS OF THE [WORD_1] CHORUS BEGAN TO FADE
DAYTIME
JOT CLEARED HIS MIND.
NOW HE WAS READY TO GRAB THE FISH.
AND THERE IT REGAINED ITS COMPOSURE.
FISH #GRABBED.
THE PLUCKY SQUIRE GENTLY RELEASED THE FISH INTO THE WATER
target: EZKUTARI AUSARTAK GOXOKI ASKATU ZUEN ARRAINA URETAN.

source: SOME OF THOSE SINGING FROGS MIGHT BE BLOCKING YOUR WAY. @Y'KNOW, WHEN NIGHT BECOMES DAY, THEY SHUFFLE AROUND AND CHANGE POSITIONS. @NOW IF YOU COULD MAKE NIGHT INTO DAY, YOU'D BE ONTO SOMETHING. @DID I MENTION YOU CAN GET USEFUL WORDS FROM PREVIOUS PAGES? @JUST CAME TO MIND, NOT SURE WHY.
target: IGEL KANTARI HORIETAKO BATZUK ZURE BIDEA IXTEN ARIKO DIRA. @BADAKIZU, GAUA EGUN BIHURTZEAN, MUGITU ETA LEKUZ ALDATZEN DIRA. @GAUA EGUN ARGI BIHURTU AHALKO BAZENU, ZERBAIT LORTUKO ZENUKE. @ESAN AL DIZUT AURREKO ORRIETATIK HITZ HAR DITZAKEZULA? @ORAITXE BURURATU ZAIT, EZ DAKIT ZERGATIK.

source: GULPER HUNGRY. NEED FRUIT. WHERE GET?
target: ARRAINA GOSEAK DAGO. FRUTA BEHAR DU. NON LORTU?

source: WHEN NIGHT BECOMES DAY, THE FROGGIES SHUFFLE BACKWARDS. @BUT IF YOU PUSHED A BLOCK BEHIND ONE OF THEM... @IT'D HAVE NO SPACE TO RETREAT INTO. @WORTH A TRY.
target: GAUA EGUN BIHURTZEAN, IGELAK LEKUZ ALDATZEN DIRA. @BAINA BATEN ATZERA BLOKE BAT MUGITZEN BADUZU... @EZ DU MUGITZEKO TARTERIK IZANGO. @SAIA ZINTEZKE.

source: HOW DO.
THE SWAMPS ARE KIND OF MOODY AT NIGHT... @CHECK OUT THOSE SINGING FROGS! @SWEET HARMONIES!
target: GIRO EDERRA DAGO ZINGIRAN GAUEZ... @BEGIRA IGEL ABESLARI HORIEI! @ZEINEN ARMONIA EDERRAK!

source: BROKEN
NIGHT
SOLID
THIS BRIDGE WAS [WORD_1]
IT WAS NOW [WORD_1] IN THE SWAMPS
YOU'LL BE NEEDING SOMETHING WITH A BIT MORE REACH THAN THAT SWORD, LAD!
target: EZPATAK DUENA BAINA IRISMEN HANDIAGOKO ZERBAIT BEHARKO DUZU, LAGUN!

source: WE WERE HAVING A LOVELY CUP OF SLIME TEA WHEN THOSE BUGS CAME BARGING IN. VERY RUDE!
target: LOHI TE ZORAGARRI BAT HARTZEN ARI GINEN ZOMORRO HORIEK INDARKA SARTU ZIRENEAN. OSO ZAKAR!

source: THERE WE GO LAD! {110}GO WALLOP EM!{100}
BE CAREFUL IN THERE, ADVENTURER!
{115}NIBBLE NIBBLES!
YOUR SWORD THERE LOOKS MIGHTY SHARP LAD, BUT... @IF YOU WANT TO WALLOP THOSE BUZZING PESTS@A LONG-RANGE WEAPON WILL SERVE THEE BEST.
target: ZURE EZPATAK OSO ZORROTZA DIRUDI, BAINA... @IZURRI BURRUNBATSUA NAHI BADUZU GARAITU@IRISMEN-LUZEKO ARMA BAT DUZU BEHARKO.

source: {120}ADVENTURERS!{100} MAYBE YOU CAN 'ELP US! @OUR HOUSE IS FULL OF FLYING BUGS@PLEASE KICK OUT THOSE INSECTOID THUGS!
target: {120}ABENTURAZALEOK!{100} BEHAR DUGU ZUEN LAGUNTZA! @ZOMORRO HEGALARIAK SARTU DIRA GURE ETXERUNTZA@MESEDEZ, INTSEKTU ASTAKIRTEN HORIEK MEREZI DUTE ZAPALKUNTZA!

source: SQUIRE... YOUR SWORD THERE LOOKS MIGHTY SHARP, BUT... @IF YOU WANT TO WALLOP THOSE BUZZING PESTS@A LONG-RANGE WEAPON WILL SERVE THEE BEST! @URM....THERE MAY BE SOMETHING AROUND HERE...?
target: EZKUTARI... ZURE EZPATAK OSO ZORROTZA DIRUDI, BAINA... @IZURRI BURRUNBATSUA NAHI BADUZU GARAITU@IRISMEN-LUZEKO ARMA BAT DUZU BEHARKO! @BAINA....HEMEN INGURUAN ZERBAIT EGONGO AL DA...?

source: YOU BET WE WILL, SNAIL DUDE!
target: ZAUDE ZIUR EGINGO DUGULA, LAGUN BARRASKILO!

source: A LONG RANGE WEAPON HUH? LET'S TAKE A LITTLE GANDER...
target: IRISMEN-LUZEKO ARMA BAT, EH? IKUS DEZAGUN...

source: HUH... THERE'S SOMETHING LODGED UNDER THE WATER. @MAYBE I COULD DISLODGE IT... WITH... A LITTLE BIT OF MAGIC...? @I CAN NEVER QUITE GET THIS KIND OF THING TO WORK... @BUT... WELL... @I SUPPOSE THERE'S A FIRST TIME FOR EVERYTHING... @GUYS... UH... MAYBE BEST IF YOU... STOOD BACK...
target: EHH... URPEAN ZERBAIT KATEATURIK DAGO. @AGIAN BERTATIK ASKA DEZAKET... BA... MAGIA PIXKA BATEKIN? @GAUZA HAUEKIN EZ DUT INOIZ ASMATZEN... @BAINA... TIRA... @DENETARAKO DAGO LEHENENGO ALDI BAT... @AIZUE... EH... HOBE PIXKA BAT... ATZERA BAZOAZTE...

source: HERE GOES NOTHING!
HOLY GUACAMOLE!!! IT ACTUALLY WORKED!!! @OH... UH... I MEAN...
target: EZ DA POSIBLE!!! FUNTZIONATU DU!! @OH... EH... ZERA...

source: {125}TADAA!!{100} COOL, HUH? @IT'S A BIG LOG. @NOT REALLY A LONG-RANGE WEAPON... @UNLESS YOU THREW IT.
target: {125}TATXAAN!!{100} APARTA, EZTA? @ENBOR HANDIA DA. @EZ DA GUZTIZ IRISMEN-LUZEKO ARMA BAT... @BOTA EZEAN, NOSKI.

source: YOU KNOW, I GET THE FEELING THERE WON'T BE A WEAPON JUST LYING AROUND IN THE SWAMP. @I MEAN, HAVE YOU EVER SEEN A SNAIL ROCKING A CROSSBOW? @I HAVEN'T. @BUT... MAYBE... YOU COULD FIND SOMETHING OUT THERE IN... THE OTHER REALM?
target: IRUDITZEN ZITZAIDAN NIRI, BAI, EZ GENUELA ZINGIRAN BERTAN ARMA BAT AURKITUKO. @ZERA, IKUSI AL DUZUE INOIZ BARRASKILO BAT BALEZTA BATEKIN? @NIK EZ BEHINTZAT. @BAINA... AGIAN... ZERBAIT AURKITU ZENEZAKE... BESTE ERREALITATEAN?

source: A PORTAL!
JOT! WELCOME BACK! DID YOU GET WHAT YOU WERE LOOKING FOR?
target: JOT! ONGI ETORRI BUELTAN! BILATZEN ZENBILTZANA LORTU AL DUZU?

source: YOU'VE REACHED SNAILFORD-UPON-AVON! @A NICE PEACEFUL TOWN! @AT LEAST... IT WAS!
target: BARHERRIRA AILEGATU ZARETE! @HERRI POLIT ETA LASAIA! @BEHINTZA... HALA ZEN!

source: IF YOU WANT TO BE GETTIN' UP TO THE RAISED PLATFORM ON THE LEFT THERE... @A LITTLE STAIRCASE MIGHT GET YOU UP. @IF ONLY THAT PUSHABLE BLOCK WERE SHAPED MORE LIKE A SET OF STEPS, HUH? @JUST IMAGINE.
target: GOIKO EZKER ALDEAN DAGOEN PLATAFORMARA IGO NAHI BADUZU... @ESKAILERA BAT LAGUNGARRIA LITZATEKE. @HORKO BLOKE HIGIGARRI HORREK MAILA ITXURA BALU, EH? @IMAJINA EZAZU.

source: THAT BUG OVER TO THE RIGHT LOOKS HARD TO GET TO, EH? @IF ONLY THAT BIG STAIRCASE WAS MORE LIKE A... BIG FLAT SURFACE. @A BIG, BLOCKY FLAT SURFACE. @WHAT A VISION.
target: ZOMORRO HORREGANA AILEGATZEA ZAILA DA, EZTA? @HOBERENA LITZATEKE ESKAILERA HAU... GAINAZAL HANDI ETA LAUA BALITZ. @BLOKE FORMAKO GAINAZAL LAU HANDIA. @HORI IRUDIPENA.

source: WELL WELL.
THERE ARE TEN BUGS HERE IN THIS WESTERN NOOK@DEFEAT THEM ALL TO COLLECT THAT BOOK!
target: MENDEBALDEKO ALDEAN HAMAR ZOMORRO DAUDE@GARAITU ITZAZU LIBURUA BERRESKURATZEKO!

source: SPLENDID WORK!
ONE BUG LEFT TO DISPATCH, PLUCKY SQUIRE!
target: ZOMORRO BAT FALTA ZAIZU, EZKUTARI AUSARTA!

source: THANKS FOR TAKING CARE OF THOSE PESKY BUGS!
target: ESKERRIK ASKO ZOMORRO GOGAIKARRI HORIETAZ ARDURATZEAGATIK!

source: IS THAT... THE FAMED PLUCKY SQUIRE? @MOST UNEXPECTED FOR US TO FIND YOU IN THESE LANDS! @WE'VE READ ALL YOUR BOOKS AND THRILLED AT YOUR ADVENTURES! @WE DON'T GET TO ADVENTURE MUCH OURSELVES... @BEING SNAILS, THAT IS.
target: HAU AL DA... EZKUTARI AUSART EZAGUNA? @HAU EZUSTEKOA LURRALDE HAUETAN ZU AURKITZEA! @ZURE LIBURU GUZTIAK IRAKURRI ETA ABENTUREKIN LILURATUTA GAUDE! @GU EZ GARA BEREZIKI ABENTURAZALEAK... @BARRASKILOAK IZANDA, BADAKIZU...

source: PLUCKY SQUIRE, PLEASE DEFEAT THE BUGS AND GET THOSE TWO BOOKS BACK TO US!
target: EZKUTARI AUSARTA, MESEDEZ AKABATU ZOMORROAK ETA ITZULI BI LIBURU HORIEK GURI!

source: NAMELY... THE TWO-VOLUME COLLECTED WORKS OF SHELLSPEARE!
target: ZEHAZKI... SHAKESBAREK IDATZITAKO BI LIBURUKO BILDUMA!

source: PERHAPS... OH! PERHAPS YOU COULD... HELP US?? @THOSE HORRIBLE BUGS HAVE TRASHED OUR TOWN@AND STOLEN WORKS OF GREAT RENOWN!
target: BEHARBADA... OH! BEHARBADA ZUK... LAGUNDU GAITZAKEZU?? @ZOMORRO IZUGARRI HORIEK GURE HERRIA HONDATU DUTE@ETA IZEN HANDIKO LANAK LAPURTU DITUZTE!

source: SNAIL FRIENDS, WE'RE ON THE CASE. @LEAVE IT TO US!
target: LAGUN BARRASKILOAK, EZ ARDURATU. @UTZI GURE ESKU!

source: THESE CATERPILLARS WERE RATHER AGGRESSIVE
VOLUME ONE RETURNED, ALL THANKS TO YOU! @NOW HERE'S A KEY TO RETRIEVE BOOK TWO!
target: LEHENENGO LIBURUA ITZULITA, ESKERRIK ASKO! @TORI, BIGARREN LIBURUA LORTZEN LAGUNDUKO DIZUEN GILTZA!

source: WHEN YOU'VE FOUND A BOOK, SET IT DOWN IN FRONT OF US
target: LIBURUA AURKITZEN DUZUENEAN, GURI AURREAN UZTEAREKIN NAHIKO

source: BOTH VOLUMES ARE NOW BACK SAFE AND SOUND! @WE ARE ETERNALLY GRATEFUL!
target: BI LIBURUAK ONIK ITZULI DIRA! @BETIKO ESKERTUTA GAUDE!

source: WE WILL THANK YOU... WITH A SPECIAL PERFORMANCE!
target: ESKERRAK EMANGO DIZKIZUEGU... IKUSKIZUN BEREZI BATEKIN!

source: A KINGDOM FOR A STAGE, PRINCES TO ACT#AND MONARCHS TO BEHOLD THE SWELLING SCENE!
target: ERRASUMA BAT AGERTOKI MODUAN, PRINTZESA ANTZEZLE#ETA MONARKAK ESZENA HANDI HONI SO EGINEZ!

source: HELLO!
... @BEEN WAITING AGES TO SAY MY BIG LINE.
target: ... @NIRE ESALDIA ESATEKO DENBORA LUZEZ ITXARON DUT.

source: O FOR A MUSE OF FIRE, THAT WOULD ASCEND#THE BRIGHTEST HEAVEN OF INVENTION!
target: OH, SUAREN MUSA BATEK GORATU ETA#ZERUKO ASMAKIZUNIK DISTIRATSUENA EKARRIKO BALU!

source: NOW, BRAVE ADVENTURERS... EXIT... STAGE LEFT! @WHICH WOULD BE... YOUR RIGHT. @FARE THEE WELL!
target: ORAIN, ABENTURAZALE ADORETSUOK... ATERA... EZKERRETIK! @ZUENTZAKO IZANGO DENA... ZUEN ESKUINA. @BIDAIA ONA IZAN!

source: YOU SNAILED IT!
BRAVO!
WELL NOW... VOLUME TWO MUST BE SOMEWHERE IN THERE. @STAY ON YOUR TOES, JOT!
target: TIRA BA... BIGARREN LIBURUAK HOR NONBAIT EGON BEHAR LUKE. @KONTUZ IBILI, JOT!

source: YOU BLASTED THOSE CATERPILLARS, MAN!
BLOCK
BROKEN
STAIRCASE
WHAT A #GREAT CARVED #[WORD_1]
HERE WAS A STONE [WORD_1]
YOU'D BETTER RUSH AHEAD ON THOSE FEET OF YOURS... @NO TELLING WHAT THE BOSS BUG IS UP TO!
target: HOBE DUZU ALDE EGITEA, HANKAK DITUZULA PROBESTUZ... @NORK DAKI ZERTAN ARI OTE DEN ZOMORRO NAGUSI HORI!

source: I TOLD YOU!!! YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE TROD SO LOUDLY!! @IT'S ALWAYS FEET THAT ARE CAUSING TROUBLE!
target: ESAN DIZUET!!! EZ ZENUTEN HAIN ZAKAR IBILI BEHAR!! @OINAK BETI ARAZOAK SORTZEN!

source: SHH! DON'T TREAD SO LOUDLY! @THE BOSS BUG WILL HEAR YOU!
target: SHH! EZ HAIN GOGOR EMAN PAUSUAK! @ZOMORROEN NAGUSIAK ENTZUN EGINGO DU!

source: {150}KGHAAAARRGGH!!!{100}
WHOAH... CAN YOU... SEE THOSE... @...THOSE BUGGY-LOOKING EYES?
target: UAAUUU.. IKUSTEN AL... DITUZUE... @...ZOMORRO BEGI BITXI HORIEK?

source: YOU MEAN THE ONES THAT ARE RAPIDLY GETTING BIGGER AND BIGGER?
target: GERO ETA HANDIAGO EGITEN ARI DIREN HORIETAZ ARI ZARA?

source: BUGS!
IT WAS TIME TO#PUT ITS POWERS#{125}TO THE TEST
JOT READIED THE#{150}ELVEN BOW
JOT DREW HIS BOW BACK AS FAR AS HE COULD...
target: JOTEK BERE ARKUA AHALIK ETA GEHIEN TENKATU ZUEN...

source: ...AND SHOT THE CREATURE RIGHT IN THE EYE!
WAVES
THE PLUCKY SQUIRE
HAD SQUASHED THE BUGS.
SUCH PLUCKINESS I HAVE NEVER SEEN. THANK YOU!!
target: EZ NUEN EGUNDAINO HALAKO AUSARDIARIK IKUSI. ESKERRIK ASKO!!

source: YOU SET EM PACKING! YOU'RE A GOOD 'UN!
target: MEREZITAKOA EMAN DIEZU! ONA ZARA GERO!

source: WHAT A STORY THIS'LL BE... OUR HOUSE SAVED BY THE PLUCKY SQUIRE!
target: ZELAKO ISTORIOA IZANGO DEN... EZKUTARI AUSARTAK GURE ETXEA SALBATU DU!

source: YOU'RE A TREASURE, LAD.

THANK YOU FROM THE BOTTOM OF OUR MOLLUSC HEARTS!! @THAT'S NOT THE LAST OF THOSE BUGS, THOUGH... @WE'VE HAD WORD THERE ARE MORE AHEAD! @THEY SAY THEIR LEADER IS A BIG 'ORRIBLE BUG WITH FLASHING EYES. @HAVE YER WITS ABOUT YOU, ADVENTURERS... AND GOOD LUCK!
target: ESKERRIK ASKO GURE MOLUSKU-BIHOTZEN SAKONENETIK!! @BAINA ORAINDIK EZ DUZUE ZOMORRO HORIEKIN GUZTIZ BUKATU... @AURREAN GEHIAGO DAUDELA ABISATU DIGUTE! @ENTZUN DUGUNAREN ARABERA
column4: BERAIEN NAGUSIA BEGI DISTIRATSUAK DITUEN ZOMORRO HANDI ITSUSI BAT DA. @KONTUZ IBILI

source: YOU WIELDED THE ELVEN BOW MAGNIFICENTLY, #PLUCKY SQUIRE. @IT SERVED YOU WELL... AND NOW IT MUST RETURN TO THE FORESTS.
target: ELFOEN ARKUA JAKINTZA HANDIZ ERABILI DUZU, #EZKUTARI AUSARTA. @BERE LANA BETE DU... ETA ORAIN BASOETARA ITZULI BEHAR DU.

source: A MAGICAL BOW... WELL I NEVER! @THE EXIT FROM THESE SWAMPS LIES AHEAD. @IF YOU EVER RETURN, YOU'LL BE HAPPILY WELCOMED BACK BY ALL ITS RESIDENTS. @WELL, APART FROM THE BUGS. @YOU DESTROYED ALL OF THEM. @REALLY CRACKING JOB! @FAREWELL, YOUNG ADVENTURERS!
target: ARKU MAGIKO BAT... NORK ESANGO LUKE? @ZINGIRA HAUETAKO IRTEERA AURRERAGO DAGO. @INOIZ ITZULIZ GERO, HEMENGO BIZTANLE GUZTIOK POZIK EGINGO DIZUEGU HARRERA. @TIRA, ZOMORROEK IZAN EZIK. @GUZTIAK TXIKITU DITUZUE. @BENETAN LAN ZORAGARRIA! @ONGI JOAN, GAZTE ABENTURAZALEOK!

source: LEGEND!
AMAZING, JOT!
ADVENTURERS! I REUNITED WITH MY LOVE; GILLIETT!
target: ABENTURAZALEOK! NIRE MAITEA AURKITU DUT, ZAKATZNE

source: FLOATIO TOLD ME ALL ABOUT HOW YOU RESCUED HIM. @WE THANK YOU FROM THE BOTTOM OF OUR HEARTS.
target: IGERINEK NOLA SALBATU ZENUTEN KONTATU DIT. @GURE BIHOTZEN SAKONENETIK ESKERTU NAHI DIZUEGU.

source: WHAT LOVELY FISH. @I'M SOOO GLAD THEY FOUND EACH OTHER. THEY LOOK SO HAPPY TOGETHER! @NOW COME ON, LET'S SKEDADDLE!
target: ZEINEN ARRAIN MAITAGARRIAK. @ASKO POZTEN NAIZ ELKAR AURKITU DUTELAKO. ELKARREKIN OSO POZIK DAUDELA DIRUDI. @ORAIN MARTXAN, GOAZEN HEMENDIK!

source: Y'KNOW... MOONBEARD SAID JOT WAS OFF-SCRIPT HERE... @BUT IT TURNS OUT OFF-SCRIPT DOESN'T HAVE TO MEAN CERTAIN DOOM...
target: BA'KIZU... ILARGIBIZARREK ESAN ZUEN JOT GIDOIZ KANPO ZEBILELA HEMEN... @BAINA HORREK EZ DU ESAN NAHI GAUZAK GAIZKI ATERA BEHAR DUTENIK...

source: IMPROVISATION... I DIG IT. LIKE A DRUM SOLO!
target: INPROBISAZIOA... GUSTUKO DUT. BATERIA SOLO BAT ADINA!

source: PHEW! WE SURVIVED THE SWAMPS!
NOPE! WE FIGURED IT OUT... WE IMPROVISED!
target: EZPA! ASMATU DUGU ZER EGIN... INPROBISATU EGIN DUGU!

source: OR A FREE-FORM PAINTING! @SOUNDS QUITE COOL, DOESN'T IT?
target: EDO MARRAZKETA ASKEA! @ITXURA BIKAINA DU, EZTA?

source: WITH GREAT CAUTION YOU MUST TREAD... @THERE'S A BUZZING BRUTE IN THE NOOK AHEAD!
target: KONTU HANDIAREKIN EMAN PAUSU... @PIZTIA BURRUNBATSUA DABIL ETA, KASU!

source: JOT COULD #HEAR THE BIG BUG #THROUGH THE #ENTRANCEWAY...
HE READIED #HIS BOW...##IT WAS TIME TO #FINISH THIS ##{125}ONCE AND FOR ALL
target: BERE ARKUA #PRESTATU ZUEN...##HAU GUZTIA BUKATZEKO #GARAIA HELDU ZEN ##{125}BEHIN BETIRAKO

source: THE {150}BUG{100} WAS {150}BESTED!{100}
THE PLUCKY SQUIRE#{125}TRIUMPHANT!{100}
THE SUN ON THEIR FACES FELT MOST PLEASANT
target: EGUZKIA BERAIEN AURPEGIETAN SENTITZEA OSO ATSEGINA ZEN

source: AS THEY#CONTINUED#ON THEIR WAY.
{125}FINALLY!{100 }#OUR HEROES WERE OUT OF THE SWAMPS
JOT GOT THE BOW! @NOW HE CAN DEFEAT THE DASTARDLY BUGS!
target: JOTEK ARKUA LORTU DU! @ORAIN ZOMORRO HIGUIN HORIEK GARAITU DITZAKE!

source: YOU GOT THE BOW! @WE MADE A GOOD TAG TEAM, DON'T YOU THINK, JOT? @SO... IT SEEMS THAT HUMGRUMP'S FORCES HAVE MADE THEIR WAY OUTSIDE OF YOUR BOOK... @THIS DOES NOT BODE WELL! @HERE, JUMP INTO THIS STICKY NOTE... @YOU'LL BE ABLE TO GET DOWN TO THE DESK AND BACK TO YOUR BOOK!
target: ARKUA LORTU DUZU! @TALDE EDERRA OSATU DUGU, EZ DUZU USTE, JOT? @BERAZ... BADIRUDI PETRALTZARREN ARMADAK ZURE LIBURUTIK KANPORAKO BIDEA AURKITU DUELA... @HONEK EZ DU ITXURA ONIK! @TORI, EGIN JAUZI OHAR HONETARA... @HEMENDIK MAHAIRA JAITSI ETA ZURE LIBURURA JOAN AHAL IZANGO ZARA!

source: JOT! WE MEET ONCE MORE! @BUT ALAS, IT SEEMS THAT DANGER IS ON THE HORIZON.
target: JOT! BERRIZ TOPATU GARA! @ALTA, ZORITXARREZ, ARRISKUA ZERUMUGAN DAGOELA DIRUDI.

source: SONNET SWAMP'S LEAST DESIRABLES HAVE EXTRICATED THEMSELVES FROM THE BOOK... @BUT IT DOES AT LEAST APPEAR THAT YOU ARE SUITABLY EQUIPPED THIS TIME! @ERADICATE THESE INVERTEBRATES! #FORTHWITH!
target: SONETO ZINGIRAKO MALTZUR HAUEK LIBURUTIK ATERATZEA LORTU DUTE... @BAINA ORAINGOAN BEHINTZAT ONGI EKIPATUTA ZAUDELA DIRUDI! @DESAGERRARAZI ITZAZU HORNOGABE HORIEK! #DERREPENTEAN!

source: Hello, young squire.##I'm afraid that I am not yet prepared for battle.##Take my bow until I am fully implemented!
target: Kaixo, ezkutari gaztea.##Uste dut oraindik ez nagoela borrokarako prest.##Hartu nire arkua guztiz inplementatzen nauten arte!

source: TO TOME TOWER
BZZT! @IMPRESSIVE CHASSIS! @WHAT IS MODEL NUMBER?
BE CAREFUL NEAR ENERGY CORE, BIPED! @REMOVING CORE INVERTS EMERGENCY GATE SYSTEM! @ZZZK!
target: KONTUZ IBILI ENERGIA NUKLEOAN, HANKABIKO! @NUKLEOA KENTZEAN LARRIALDIETAKO ATEEN SISTEMA ALDERANTZIKATZEN DA! @ZZZK!

source: VVVK! @LAYOUT OF ROBOT CITY - #ALL CHANGED!
CONTRAPTION NEED #POWER. @BIPED LOCATE POWER CORE?
target: TRESNAK ENERGIA #BEHAR DU. @HANKABIKOAK ENERGIA NUKLEOA AURKITU?

source: CONTRAPTION OUTPUT STRANGE PORTAL! @PORTAL VERY SHINY @SHINY VERY GOOD @ZZRK! @EXCELLENT WORK!
target: TRESNAK ATARI BITXI BAT SORTU! @ATARI OSO DISTIRATSUA! @DISTIRA ONA. @ZZRK! @LAN BIKAINA!

source: GREETINGS BIPED! @ZZRRT! @REQUEST NOT TREAD GREASE HERE @KEEP FLOOR SHINY @SHINY GOOD @ZKK!

I ONCE FELL IN A HOLE. @... @B... BUT... I SUPPOSE IT'S NOTHING COMPARED TO YOUR ESCAPADES... @YOU WRITE ABOUT THEM SO EVOCATIVELY! @I'M A BIG FAN OF YOUR WORK...
target: NI BEHIN ZULO BATEAN ERORI NINTZEN. @... @B... BAINA... EZIN DA ZURE ABENTURA ARRISKUTSUEKIN KONPARATU... @MODU OSO IRADOKITZAILEAN IDAZTEN DITUZU! @ZURE LANAREN JARRAITZAILE SUTSUA NAIZ...

source: HELLO LITTLE GOBLIN! @I HAVE A TASK FOR YOU, MY ROTUND PURPLE FRIEND... CONCERNING THAT WRETCHED SQUIRE! @I BOOTED HIM OUT OF THE BOOK, YOU KNOW... BUT HE'S A PERSISTENT LITTLE CREEP... @HE MAY STILL BE OUT THERE, WITH AN EYE ON CAUSING HUMGRUMP TROUBLE. @BUT YOU SEE... HUMGRUMP WILL BRING THE TROUBLE TO HIM! @TAKE A SHOT OF MY METAMAGIC AND A LEAP THROUGH THIS PRETTY PORTAL... @SET YOURSELF FREE OF THESE PAGES... AND GO BULLY THAT WRETCHED PEST!
target: KAIXO IRATXO TXIKI! @ZURETZAT LAN BAT DAUKAT, LAGUN BOROBIL MOREA... EZKUTARI GORROTAGARRI HORREKIN LOTUA! @LIBURUTIK KANPORATU NUEN, BADAKIZU... BAINA EKINA DA NAZKANTE HORI... @BALITEKE ORAINDIK HOR ZEHAR IBILTZEA, NIRI ARAZOAK SORTU NAHIAN. @BAINA... NIK SORTUKO DIZKIOT ARAZOAK BERARI! @HAR EZAZU NIRE METAMAGIATIK PIXKA BAT ETA EGIN ATARI EDER HONETATIK JAUZI... @ASKATU ZAITEZ ORRI HAUETATIK... ETA JOAN ZAITEZ ZIKIN HORI ZAPALTZERA!

source: SO... MY INSECT SPIES TELL ME... @THE WRETCHED SQUIRE IS AT LARGE IN THESE PAGES AGAIN... @IN THESE VERY SWAMPS! MOST... DISPLEASING. @NO DOUBT HE AND HIS MISERABLE FRIENDS ARE ON THEIR WAY TO ARTIA... @WELL... I'LL SOON PUT AN END TO THEIR ADVENTURES. @I'LL SUMMON UP SOME SQUIRE-KILLERS... @SOME RUSHING... CRUSHING... @{150}CATERPILLARS!{100}
target: NIRE ESPIA INTSEKTUEK ESAN DIDATE... @EZKUTARI MADARIKATUA ORRI HAUETAN LASAI DABILELA BERRIRO... @ZINGIRA HAUETAN BERTAN! ZEINEN... AMORRAGARRIA. @ZALANTZARIK GABE, BERA ETA BERE LAGUN MISERABLEAK ARTIA ALDERANTZ DOAZ... @TIRA... LASTER BUKATUKO DUT BERAIEN ABENTUREKIN. @EZKUTARI-HILTZAILE BATZUEI EGINGO DIET DEI... @BIZKORRAK... SUNTSITZAILEAK... @{150}BELDARRAK!{100}

source: FIRE ARROW {Action_Jump}
CHARGE SHOT (HOLD) {Action_Jump}
WE MEET AGAIN.
IF YOU FILLED THAT BIG OLD MOAT FULL OF WATER... @YOU MIGHT BE ABLE TO ACCESS SOMEWHERE USEFUL.
target: FOSO ZAHAR HANDI HORI UREZ BETETZEN BADUZU... @BESTE LEKUREN BATERA AILEGATU ZINTEZKE.

source: IF YOU'VE HIT THE SWITCH, WHY NOT GET DOWN TO THE BOTTOM OF THE MOAT? @YOU MIGHT FIND A HANDY WORD DOWN THERE. @WORTH A GANDER.
target: ETENGAILUA MUGITU BADUZU, ZERGATIK EZ ZARA FOSORA JAISTEN? @HITZ EGOKIREN BAT AURKITU DEZAKEZU BERTAN. @SAIATZEAK MEREZI DU.

source: HOW GOES IT.
IF YOU TURN THE PAGES, YOU MIGHT RETRIEVE A USEFUL WORD. @A WORD THAT COULD GET YOU ACROSS THIS SLIMY, SWAMPY WATER. @WHY NOT GIVE IT A GO? SOMETHING TO DO, AT LEAST.
target: ORRIAK BIRATUZ GERO, HITZ ERABILGARRIA AURKI DEZAKEZU. @ZINGIRAKO UR LIKATSU HAU PASATZEN LAGUNDU DIEZAZUKEN HITZ BAT. @ZERGATIK EZ SAIATU? ZERBAIT EGITEKO, GUTXIENEZ.

source: HOW DO.

SOME OF THOSE SINGING FROGS MIGHT BE BLOCKING YOUR WAY. @Y'KNOW, WHEN NIGHT BECOMES DAY, THEY SHUFFLE AROUND AND CHANGE POSITIONS. @NOW IF YOU COULD MAKE NIGHT INTO DAY, YOU'D BE ONTO SOMETHING. @DID I MENTION YOU CAN GET USEFUL WORDS FROM PREVIOUS PAGES? @JUST CAME TO MIND, NOT SURE WHY.
target: IGEL KANTARI HORIETAKO BATZUK ZURE BIDEA IXTEN ARIKO DIRA. @BADAKIZU, GAUA EGUN BIHURTZEAN, MUGITU ETA LEKUZ ALDATZEN DIRA. @GAUA EGUN ARGI BIHURTU AHALKO BAZENU, ZERBAIT LORTUKO ZENUKE. @ESAN AL DIZUT AURREKO ORRIETATIK HITZ HAR DITZAKEZULA? @ORAITXE BURURATU ZAIT, EZ DAKIT ZERGATIK.

source: WHEN NIGHT BECOMES DAY, THE FROGGIES SHUFFLE BACKWARDS. @BUT IF YOU PUSHED A BLOCK BEHIND ONE OF THEM... @IT'D HAVE NO SPACE TO RETREAT INTO. @WORTH A TRY.
target: GAUA EGUN BIHURTZEAN, IGELAK LEKUZ ALDATZEN DIRA. @BAINA IGEL BATEN ATZEAN BLOKE BAT JARTZEN BADUZU... @EZ DU MUGITZEKO TARTERIK IZANGO. @SAIA ZINTEZKE.

source: WELL WELL.
IF YOU WANT TO BE GETTIN' UP TO THE RAISED PLATFORM ON THE LEFT THERE... @A LITTLE STAIRCASE MIGHT GET YOU UP. @IF ONLY THAT PUSHABLE BLOCK WERE SHAPED MORE LIKE A SET OF STEPS, HUH? @JUST IMAGINE.
target: EZKERREAN GOIAN DAGOEN PLATAFORMARA IGO NAHI BADUZU... @ESKAILERA BAT LAGUNGARRIA LITZATEKE. @HORKO BLOKE HIGIGARRI HORREK MAILA ITXURA BALU, EH? @IMAJINA EZAZU.

source: THAT BUG OVER TO THE RIGHT LOOKS HARD TO GET TO, EH? @IF ONLY THAT BIG STAIRCASE WAS MORE LIKE A... BIG FLAT SURFACE. @A BIG, BLOCKY FLAT SURFACE. @WHAT A VISION.
target: ZOMORRO HORREGANA AILEGATZEA ZAILA DA, EZTA? @HOBERENA LITZATEKE ESKAILERA HAU... GAINAZAL HANDI ETA LAUA BALITZ. @BLOKE FORMAKO GAINAZAL LAU HANDIA. @HORI IRUDIPENA.

source: THESE RUINS WERE JUST [DRAINED] OF BUGS

IF YOU'RE LOOKING FOR A LONG-RANGE WEAPON... @THERE'S AN ELVEN WARRIOR AROUND HERE WHO OWNS ONE. @SHE LIVES IN A GAME CARD. HEAD UPWARDS TO FIND HER. @SHE MIGHT TRY AND SHOOT YOU WITH ARROWS, BUT DON'T TAKE IT PERSONALLY.
target: IRISMEN-LUZEKO ARMA BATEN BILA BAZABILTZA... @HORRELAKO BATEN JABE DEN GERLARI ELFO BAT DAGO HEMEN INGURUAN. @JOKO BATEKO KARTA BATEAN BIZI DA. SEGI GORANTZ BERA AURKITZEKO. @BALITEKE ZURI GEZIAK JAURTITZEN HASTEA, BAINA EZ EZAZU MAILA PERTSONALEAN HARTU.

source: WORD UP. IT'S ME, MINIBEARD. @OR TO GIVE YOU MY FULL NAME; 'MY TALKIN' MINIBEARD'. @I'M A TOY BASED ON THE CHARACTER 'MINIBEARD' FROM THE BOOK 'THE PLUCKY SQUIRE'.  @IT'S ALL A BIT META. BUT MY ADVICE IS VERY PRACTICAL. @IF YOU'RE LOOKING FOR A LONG-RANGE WEAPON... @THERE'S AN ELVEN WARRIOR AROUND HERE WHO OWNS ONE. @SHE LIVES IN A GAME CARD. HEAD UPWARDS TO FIND HER. @SHE MIGHT TRY AND SHOOT YOU WITH ARROWS, BUT DON'T TAKE IT PERSONALLY.
target: ZE MARTXA. NI NAIZ, MINILARGI. @EDO NIRE IZEN OSOA ESANDA; 'NIRE MINILARGI HIZTUNA'. @'EZKUTARI AUSARTA' LIBURUKO 'MINILARGI' PERTSONAIAN OINARRITUTAKO JOSTAILUA NAIZ. @GUZTIA NAHIKO META DA. BAINA NIRE AHOLKUA OSO ERABILGARRIA DA. @IRISMEN-LUZEKO ARMA BATEN BILA BAZABILTZA... @HORRELAKO BATEN JABE DEN GERLARI ELFO BAT DAGO HEMEN INGURUAN. @JOKO BATEKO KARTA BATEAN BIZI DA. SEGI GORANTZ BERA AURKITZEKO. @BALITEKE ZURI GEZIAK JAURTITZEN HASTEA, BAINA EZ EZAZU MAILA PERTSONALEAN HARTU.

source: HOW DO. YOU NEED TO HEAD UPWARDS. YOU'LL WANT TO FIND A BLOCK TO CLIMB ONTO. @I'M SURE THERE'S ONE AROUND HERE. @I'M VERY SENSITIVE TO THE PROXIMITY OF PLASTIC BLOCKS... @IT'S A FAMILY TRAIT.
target: IEPE. GORANTZA JOAN BEHAR DUZU. IGOTZEKO BLOKEREN BAT BILATU BEHAR ZENUKE. @ZIUR HEMEN INGURUAN BADAGOELA HORRELAKORIK. @SEGITUAN NABARITZEN DUT PLASTIKOZKO BLOKEREN BAT INGURUAN BADUT... @FAMILIATIK DATORKIT.

source: GREETINGS. YOU'LL NEED A KEY TO GET THROUGH THAT CASTLE DOOR. @ I THINK I SAW ONE AROUND THE SIDE OF THE CASTLE. @TRY EXPLORING THE SKETCHES ON THE WALLS. @EXPLORATION, THAT'S THE KEY. TO FINDING THE KEY.
target: ONGI ETORRI. GAZTELUKO ATEA GURUTZATZEKO GILTZA BEHARKO DUZU. @GAZTELUAREN INGURUAN BAT IKUSI NUELA USTE DUT. @PROBA EZAZU PARETETAKO ZIRRIBORROETAN MIATZEN. @MIATZEA, HORI DA GILTZA. GILTZA AURKITZEA.

source: NOW THEN. THERE'S A NOOK AROUND HERE. @A NOOK INTO WHICH YOU COULD PLACE A BOUNCY THING. @TO GET TO THE NOOK, TRY TURNING A CORNER. @ALWAYS PAYS TO PEEK AROUND A CORNER.
target: TIRA BA, INGURUAN GORDELEKU BAT DAGO. @BOTEAK EMATEN DITUEN ZERBAIT UTZI DEZAKEZUN GORDELEKU BAT. @GORDELEKURA JOATEKO, PROBATU IZKINAN BIRATZEN. @ONA DA IZKINETAN BEGIRATZEA.

source: NOW THEN. @YOU SEEM TO BE DOING ALRIGHT, LAD.
HEY UP. NO ADVICE RIGHT NOW. @YOU'RE DOING PRETTY GOOD.
target: IEPE. AHOLKURIK GABE ORAINTXE. @OSO ONGI ZABILTZA.

source: ALRIGHT NOW. GOOD ADVENTURING. @KEEP IT UP.
HOW DO. NOTHING TO REPORT. @ KEEP UP THE GOOD SQUIRING.
TURN THE BOOK'S PAGES TO FIND A HELPFUL WORD! @MOONBEARD OUT!
target: PASA LIBURUAREN ORRIAK HITZ LAGUNGARRIAK BILATZEKO! @ILARGIBIZARREK MOZTU!

source: YOU SAVED MY SHELL... THANK YOU!!
target: NIRE MASKORRA SALBATU DUZU... ESKERRIK ASKO!!

source: THE PLUCKY SQUIRE?!?! @I'VE BEEN RESCUED BY A CELEBRITY!!!
LIKE A HERO FROM A SHELLSPEARE PLAY... @THE PLUCKY SQUIRE HAS SAVED THE DAY!
target: SHAKESBAREREN HEROIETAKO BATEK BEZALA... @EZKUTARI AUSARTAK EGUNDOKOA EGIN DU!

source: YOU BANISHED THOSE BUGS! @YOU'RE JUST AS BRAVE AS I IMAGINED!!
target: ZOMORRO HORIEK UXATU DITUZU! @PENTSATZEN NUENA BEZAIN ADORETSUA ZARA!

source: NOBLE FRIENDS, PLEASE TAKE THIS PRESENT @MAY YOUR PATH AHEAD BE SAFE AND PLEASANT. @FAREWELL!
target: LAGUN PRESTUAK, ONAR EZAZUE OPARI HAU @AURRERANZKO BIDEA GOXO ETA LASAIA IZAN DADILA. @ONGI IZAN!

source: CHAPTER TWO
TOME TOWER
OUR HEROES#{120}HUNG ON{100}#TO THE#CLIFF'S EDGE#BY THEIR#{120}FINGERNAILS{100}
...AND {125}HOISTED UP!{100}
THEY WERE {125}GRABBED{100}...
WHEN#SUDDENLY...
BY#{150}THRASH!{100}
BY WHOM???
AND SO WERE VERY HAPPY TO BE REUNITED.
target: ETA BERRIZ IKUSTEAZ IZUGARRI POZIK ZEUDEN.

source: AND JOT AND VIOLET'S {110}CHILDHOOD FRIEND{100}
THRASH WAS A {110}MOUNTAIN TROLL{100}
THE TRIO HAD NOT BEEN TOGETHER FOR QUITE A WHILE
target: HIRUKOTEA ASPALDITIK ELKAR IKUSI GABEA ZEN

source: MOJAM!!!

I'M JUST STOKED I COULD FIND YOU, DUDES. @AFTER ALL THIS CRAZINESS KICKED OFF I CHECKED IN WITH MOONBEARD... @HE TOLD ME YOU WERE BOTH HEADING TO TOME TOWER. I FIGURED I'D HELP YOU ON YOUR WAY! @THE PATH IS WRECKED, HUH...? WELL, THERE'S MORE THAN ONE ROUTE TO TOME TOWER... @LET'S GET DOWN TO THE GROUND!
target: EZ DAKIZUE NOLA POZTE NAIZEN ZUEK AURKITUTA, LAGUNAK. @EROKERIA HAU HASI ZENEAN, ILARGIBIZARRI GALDETU NION ZER GERTATZEN OTE ZEN... @ZUEK BIAK LIBURUKI DORRERA BIDEAN ABIATU ZINETELA ESAN ZIDAN. ETA ZUEI LAGUNTZERA ETORRI NAIZ! @BIDEA PUSKATU EGIN DA, EZTA...? TIRA, BADIRA LIBURUKI DORRERA JOATEKO BIDE GEHIAGO ERE... @GOAZEN BEHERANTZ!

source: THRASH!! HOOO BOY, YOU REALLY SAVED OUR SKINS! ARE WE HAPPY TO SEE YOU! @TRIPLE TROUBLE TOGETHER AGAIN!
target: THRASH!! EEENE BADA, EDERRETIK SALBATU GAITUZU! POZTEN GARA ZU IKUSTEAZ! @HIRUKO BIHURRIA BERRIZ ELKARREKIN!

source: HUUUUHH... THIS IS... REALLY QUITE... HIGH... ISN'T IT. @WELL... IF ANYONE CAN LEAD THE WAY DOWN... IT'S THRASH. @LET'S DO THIS!
target: EEEHHH... HAU NAHIKO... NAHIKO-OSO... ALTU DAGO... EZTA. @TIRA... NORBAIT BEHERA GIDATZEKO GAI BADA... HORI THRASH DA. @EGIN DEZAGUN!

source: AND HERE WAS THRASH, WAITING ON THE GROUND AS COOL AS A CUCUMBER.
target: ETA HAN ZEGOEN THRASH, LURREAN ZAIN, LASAI DEMONIO.

source: NICE CLIMBING DUDE!
YOU BOTH GOT DOWN THAT CLIFF SIDE WITH BANGING STYLE! @YOU HAD A GOOD RHYTHM GOING ON THERE, DUDES.
target: SEKULAKO ESTILOAREKIN JAITSI ZARETE BIAK! @GUSTUKO DUT ZUEN ERRITMOA, LAGUNAK.

source: YOU THINK?? @YOU KNOW I DID FEEL RATHER GRACEFUL... SORT OF LIKE A HOPPING MOUNTAIN RABBIT. @WELL, NOW WE'RE DOWN ON THE GROUND, BEST GET ON TO TOME TOWER... LEAD THE WAY, PLUCKY SQUIRE!
target: ZUK USTE?? @EGIA ESAN, NAHIKO JAITSIERA DOTOREA EGIN DUGU... UNTXITXOAK MENDIAN SALTOKA BEZALA. @TIRA, BEHEAN GAUDE JADA, GOAZEN LIBURUKI DORRERA... GIDA GAITZAZU, EZKUTARI AUSARTA!

source: LOOK AT THOSE BOUNCING BOULDERS... THEY'RE JUST VANISHING INTO THIN AIR...!
target: BEGIRA HARRI SALTARI HORIEI... AIREAN DESAGERTZEN ARI DIRA...!

source: MAJORLY WEIRD...
JOT'S WEARING RED...
I DON'T THINK BULLS ARE THAT PICKY!
A BULL! @IT LOOKS ANGRY... @GOOD JOB NONE OF US IS WEARING RED. PHEW!
target: ZEZEN BAT! @HASERRE DAGOELA DIRUDI... @ESKERRAK GUTAKO INOR EZ DELA GORRIZ JANTZI. FIU!

source: ... @IS IT RED? I SUPPOSE IT IS KIND OF A RED. @ MORE OF A CRIMSON THAN A SCARLET...
target: ... @GORRIA DA? GORRI ANTZEKO ZERBAIT ZELA USTE NUEN. @ESKARLATA BAINO, ESANGO NUKE GORRIMINA DELA GEHIAGO...

source: THIS FOREST BE DENSE... DIFFICULT TO PUSH THINGS THROUGH IT. @BUT THE PATH MIGHT BE EASIER GOING ALL ROUND... @IF THE FOREST... WASN'T A FOREST. @WEIRD THOUGHT.
target: BASO HAU ITXIA IZAN DAITEKE... BERTATIK GAUZEKIN IGAROTZEA ZAILA IZAN DAITEKE. @BAINA BIDEA ERRAZAGOA IZAN DAITEKE... @BASOA... EZ BADA BASOA. @HAU EROKERIA.

source: YO, JOT.
HEY TOPSY!
AH! GREETINGS, TRAVELLERS THREE. MY NAME IS TOPSY!
target: AH! ONGI ETORRI, BIDAIARIOK. NIRE IZENA TOPSY DA!

source: I SEE YOU ARE ON A QUEST OF SOME KIND. YOU KNOW... TOPSY MAY BE ABLE TO HELP YOU... @BUT... THERE IS SOMETHING YOU COULD PERHAPS ASSIST ME WITH FIRST...? @NAMELY... MY TUMMY. @IT IS EMPTY. I LEFT MY BISCUITS AROUND HERE SOMEWHERE, YOU SEE... @...AND THE LANDSCAPE... IT SEEMS TO HAVE... CHANGED SOMEWHAT... @WHICH HAS RESULTED IN THOSE BISCUITS BECOMING... LOST!
target: NOLABAITEKO ABENTURAN ZABILTZATELA IKUSI DUT. @BADAKIZUE... TOPSYK AGIAN LAGUNTZEKO AUKERA DU... @BAINA... LEHENENGO ZUEK ZERBAITEKIN LAGUNDUKO DIDAZUE...? @HAIN ZUZEN ERE... NIRE TRIPOTXAREKIN. @HUTSIK DAGO. NIRE BIXKOTXAK HEMEN INGURUAN UTZI DITUT... @...ETA INGURUNEA... NOLABAIT... ITXURALDATU EGIN DA... @ETA ORDUAN NIRE BIXKOTXAK... GALDU EGIN DIRA!

source: OH, THAT WOULD BE EXTRAORDINARILY HELPFUL! @A LITTLE ADVICE! @THERE'S A WORD IN THAT SENTENCE JUST THERE... @...THAT MIGHT BE THE KEY TO ALL THESE LANDSCAPE-SHIFTING ANTICS. @YOU MIGHT IDENTIFY WHICH WORD IS CAUSING ALL THE MISCHIEF BY... GIVING IT A GOOD WHACK!
target: OH, HORI ZORAGARRIA LITZATEKE! @AHOLKU TXIKI BAT! @HORKO ESALDIAN BADAGO HITZ BAT... @...INGURUNEAREN ITXURALDAKETA KONTU HONEKIN ZERIKUSIA IZAN DEZAKEENA. @MALTZURKERIA HORI EGIN DUEN HITZA TOPATZEKO... EMAN ZARTAKO BAT!

source: A CAT SHOULDN'T BE PARTED FROM THEIR BISCUITS. WE'LL FIND THEM FOR YOU, TOPSY!
target: KATU BATEK EZIN DU INOIZ BERE BIXKOTXETATIK URRUN EGON. GUK AURKITUKO DITUGU, TOPSY!

source: MY BISCUITS! HOW I HAVE DREAMED OF THIS MOMENT! TRAVELLERS, YOU HAVE MY SINCEREST THANKS! @THE PROSPECT OF THIS SNACK BRINGS A SMILE TO MY FACE...
target: NIRE BIXKOTXAK! UNE HONEKIN AMETSETAN NENBILEN! BIDAIARIAK, NIRE ESKERRIK BEROENAK ZUENTZAT! @HAUEK IKUSTE HUTSAREKIN IRRIBARREA DATORKIT...

source: THIS LAND IS FULL OF PUZZLES AND TRICKERY. @ALWAYS REMEMBER... THINGS ARE SOMETIMES NOT WHAT THEY SEEM! @WHEN YOU GET STUCK... TRY TO SEE THINGS FROM A DIFFERENT ANGLE! @GOOD LUCK, BISCUIT SAVIOURS!
target: LURRALDE HAU PUZZLE ETA AMARRUEZ JOSITA DAGO. @IZAN BETI GOGOAN... GAUZAK EZ DIRA BETI DIRUDITENAK! @TRABATUTA ZAUDENEAN... SAIATU GAUZAK MODU DESBERDINEAN BEGIRATZEN! @ZORTE ON, BIXKOTX SALBATZAILEAK!

source: JOT FOUND TOPSY'S BISCUITS!
HERE WAS A SECLUDED [WORD_1]
FOREST
RUIN
LOOMED #{130}TOME TOWER{100}
THERE, ON THE HORIZON...
OUR TRIO STOPPED IN THEIR TRACKS
THERE WAS A #{115}STRANGE ELECTRICITY{100} #IN THE AIR
WHOAH... IT GOT DARK AROUND HERE PRETTY FAST. @THERE'S SOME MAGIC AFOOT... EVERYTHING FEELS KIND OF... FIZZY!
target: UAUU... AZKAR ILUNDU DU LEKU HONETAN. @HAU MAGIA KONTUA IZANGO DA... DENA DAGO OSO... EFERBESZENTE!

source: WHOAH! BOOMING BOLTS! @VERY METAL!
THIS STRANGE ELECTRICITY WAS {125}SPAWNING MONSTERS!{100}
target: ELEKTRIZITATE BITXI HORI {125}MUNSTROAK SORTZEN{100} ARI ZEN!

source: HELLO, YOUNG ADVENTURERS! ARE YOU ON YOUR WAY TO TOME TOWER?
target: KAIXO, ABENTURAZALE GAZTEOK! LIBURUKI DORRERANTZ AL ZOAZTE?

source: BEST BEWARE! A DARK WIZARD OCCUPIES THE TOWER... HIS MAGIC IS CAUSING PANDEMONIUM! @I MEAN, LOOK AT THIS LOVELY BRIDGE. UNMITIGATEDLY OBLITERATED!
target: BA KASU EMAN! AZTI ILUN BATEK HARTU DU DORREA... BERE MAGIA KAOSA SORTZEN ARI DA! @ADIBIDEZ, BEGIRA ZUBI MAITAGARRI HAU. LOTSAGABEKIRO DEUSEZTATUTA!

source: THESE BOOKISH LANDS ARE USUALLY SO PEACEFUL. ALL THIS MAYHEM IS NOT CONDUCIVE TO READING!
target: LITERAT-LUR HAUEK LASAIAK IZAN OHI DIRA. HORRELAKO ZALAPARTAREKIN EZIN DA IRAKURRI!

source: YEP! THAT'S WHERE WE'RE HEADING.
HMM... IS THERE ANOTHER WAY ACROSS THE WATERS?
target: HMM... BA AL DAGO URA GURUTZATZEKO BESTE MODURIK?

source: OH YEAH... WRECKED!
