SOME OF THEM MIGHT HELP YOU RETURN. @HEAD AROUND THE CORNER TO THE LEFT AND WE'LL TRY AND FIND ONE!
target: OROITZEN AL ZARA NIRETAZ, JOT? ZURE LIBURUAN EZAGUTU GENUEN ELKAR. @NI BEREZ EZ NAIZ HANGOA. @PAPERJALEOK LIBURU BATETIK BESTERA IBILTZEN GARA BIDAIAN. @BAINA ZU, JOT, LIBURU BATEKO PERTSONAIA ZARA... ETA EZ ZENUKE BERTATIK KANPO EGON BEHAR. @PETRALTZARREN MAGIAK EKARRI ZAITU MAHAIRA LIBURUTIK ATERATA, EZTA? @ZU BERRIRO ZURE LIBURUAN SARTZEA LORTU BEHAR DUGU, JOT... BEREBIZIKO MUNTA DU... @BESTELA ESANDA: OSO GARRANTZITSUA DA! @MAHAI HONETAN GAUZA OSO INTERESGARRIAK DAUDE... BATEN BATEK ITZULTZEKO BALIOKO DIZU. @EGIN EZKERRERA IZKINA HORRETAN ETA BAT AURKITZEN SAIATUKO GARA!

source: JOT GOT THE TORCH! @USE IT TO ILLUMINATE THE WAY FORWARD! @YOU CAN ALSO PRESS Ꜷ TO LOCK ONTO ENEMIES. TRY IT!
target: JOTEK LINTERNA LORTU DU! @ERABILI AURREAN DUZUN BIDEA ARGIZTATZEKO! @SAKATU Ꜷ ARERIOETAN FINKATZEKO. PROBA EZAZU!

source: GOOD GOING, JOT! THAT TORCH WILL HELP YOU NAVIGATE THIS TABLE.
target: SEGI HORRELA, JOT! LINTERNA HORREK MAHAIAN MUGITZEN LAGUNDUKO DIZU.

source: THESE SKETCHES OF YOU...QUITE A REMARKABLE LIKENESS, I MUST ATTEST. @THE PERSON WHO DREW ALL THIS IS CALLED SAM. @HE IS THE BOY WHO LIVES IN THIS ROOM, AND IS THE OWNER OF YOUR STORYBOOK. @AS YOU MIGHT BE ABLE TO TELL, HE IS VERY FOND OF YOU AND YOUR ADVENTURES. @I'M GLAD THAT YOU GOT TO SEE THIS, JOT... TO SEE HOW MUCH YOU MEAN TO HIM.
target: ZIRRIBORRO HAUEK ZURE...APARTEKO ANTZA DUTE, ESAN BEHAR DA. @HAUEK MARRAZTU ZITUENAK SAM DU IZENA. @GELA HONETAN BIZI DEN MUTIKOA DA, ETA ZURE IPUINAREN JABEA DA. @ZUK ZEUK IKUS DEZAKEZUN MODUAN, ZURE ABENTURAK MAITE DITU, BAITA ZU ERE. @ZU HAU IKUSTEN ARITZEAK ZEHARO POZTEN NAU, JOT... BERETZAT ZEIN GARRANTZITSUA ZAREN IKUS DEZAZUN.

source: BEWARE OF HUMGRUMP! @HE WISHES TO TAKE OVER YOUR BOOK. YOU HAVE TO STOP THAT FROM HAPPENING! @NOT JUST FOR THE SAKE OF THE CITIZENS OF YOUR BOOK... @BUT FOR ALL THE CHILDREN WHO WILL READ AND BE INSPIRED BY YOUR BOOK. @SAM IS ONE OF THOSE CHILDREN, JOT. @YOU KNOW, US BOOKWORMS... WE'RE ABLE TO GLIMPSE THE PAST, PRESENT... @...AND EVEN THE FUTURE! @I'VE SEEN THAT SAM WILL ONE DAY GROW UP TO BE A WRITER AND ILLUSTRATOR HIMSELF.
target: KONTUZ PETRALTZARREKIN! @ZURE LIBURUA BEREGANATU NAHI DU. HORI GERTATZEA EKIDIN BEHAR DUZU! @EZ ZURE LIBURUKO HERRITARRENGATIK BAKARRIK... @BAITA ZURE LIBURUA IRAKURRI ETA INSPIRATUKO DITUEN HAUR GUZTIENGATIK ERE. @SAM HAUR HORIETAKO BAT DA, JOT. @BADAKIZU, PAPERJALEOK... IRAGANA ETA ORAINA IKUSTEKO GAI GARA... @...BAITA ETORKIZUNA ERE! @SAM BERA HANDITZEAN IDAZLE ETA ILUSTRATZAILEA IZANGO DELA IKUSI DUT.

source: JOT! @YOU MADE IT! @MY FEARS HAVE BEEN ALLAYED... @IT SEEMS THAT NOTHING CAN HINDER THE PLUCKY SQUIRE. @ON THAT VERY NOTE... WHILE YOU ARE HERE... @THERE IS SOMETHING THAT YOU REALLY MUST OBSERVE.
target: JOT! @LORTU DUZU! @NIRE BELDURRAK BARETU DIRA... @BADIRUDI EZERK ERE EZIN DUELA EZKUTARI AUSARTA GELDITU. @HONETAZ ARI GARELA... HEMEN ZAUDENEZ... @BADAGO DERRIGORREZ IKUSI BEHAR DUZUN ZERBAIT.

source: JOT GOT THE TURN GAUNTLETS! @NOW HE HAS THE POWER TO MANIPULATE HIS STORYBOOK! @PRESS {Action_BookInteract} WHEN NEXT TO THE BOOK TO OPEN IT UP.
target: JOTEK ORRI-ESKULARRUAK LORTU DITU! @BERE IPUINA MANIPULATZEKO BOTEREA DU! @SAKATU {Action_BookInteract} LIBURUTIK HURBIL ZAUDENEAN ZABALTZEKO.

source:
GOOD GOING, YOUNG SQUIRE! @I BELIEVE THAT THE ITEM THAT CAN HELP YOU GET BACK TO YOUR WORLD IS FURTHER AHEAD. @BUT, LISTEN, ON YOUR WAY YOU MAY RUN INTO CREEPY CRAWLY COLEOPTERA... @BEETLES! SAM LIKES TO KEEP THEM AS PETS, YOU SEE...
 @BEWARE, JOT! DON'T GET EATEN! @IT SIMPLY WOULDN'T DO...
target:
ONGI EGINA, EZKUTARI GAZTEA! @ZURE MUNDURA ITZULTZEN LAGUNDUKO DIZUN OBJEKTUA AURRERAXEAGO DAGOELA USTE DUT. @BAINA, ENTZUN, BALITEKE ZURE BIDEAN KOLEOPTERO BELDURGARRIAK AURKITZEA... @KAKALARDOAK! SAMEK MASKOTA MODUAN IZATEN DITU...
 @KASU EMAN, JOT! EZ ZAITZATELA JAN! @ARAZOA HANDIA LITZATEKE...

source: YOU GOT THE GAUNTLETS! @EXCEPTIONAL PROCUREMENT! @HEAD BACK TO YOUR BOOK, POST HASTE! @I THINK YOU'LL FIND THAT THE GAUNTLETS WILL HELP YOU RETURN HOME. @ONE LAST THING BEFORE YOU LEAVE THIS TABLE, JOT. IT IS VERY IMPORTANT...
target: ESKULARRUAK LORTU DITUZU! @IZUGARRIZKO LORPENA! @ITZUL ZAITEZ ZURE LIBURURA BEREHALA! @NIK USTE ESKULARRUEK ETXERA ITZULTZEN LAGUNDUKO DIZUTELA. @MAHAI HAU UTZI AURRETIK AZKEN GAUZA BAT, JOT. OSO GARRANTZITSUA DA...

source: HE WILL CREATE A SERIES OF VERY POPULAR CHILDREN'S BOOKS... @WITH VERY LUCRATIVE MERCHANDISE TIE-INS AND BRAND INTEGRATIONS! @SAM'S BOOKS WILL GO ON TO INSPIRE MANY OTHER CHILDREN. @THAT IS, IF HE EVER ACTUALLY WRITES THEM.
target: OSO EZAGUNA IZANGO DEN HAURRENTZAKO LIBURU SORTA BAT SORTUKO DU... @MERCHANDISING OSO ERRENTAGARRIAREKIN ETA MARKEKIN LANEAN! @SAMEN LIBURUEK ERE BESTE HAUR ASKO INSPIRATUKO DITUZTE. @HORRELA IZANGO DA, BERAK INOIZ IDAZTEN BADITU.

source: IF HUMGRUMP TAKES CONTROL OF YOUR BOOK, THE STORY WILL GET WORSE.
target: PETRALTZARREK ZURE LIBURUA BEREGANATZEN BADU, ISTORIOAK OKERRERA EGINGO DU.

source: BOOKS WITH BAD STORIES GET PUT AWAY ON THE SHELF. @NO-ONE READS THEM ANY MORE. @THOSE BOOKS LOSE ALL OF THEIR LIFE, AND CEASE BEING AN INSPIRATION TO ANYONE. @YOUR BOOK WILL NO LONGER INSPIRE SAM... AND THEN... @WHO KNOWS WHAT PATH HE WILL TAKE...? @DO NOT LET THAT HAPPEN, JOT! @RETURN NOW, AND STOP HUMGRUMP!
target: ISTORIO TXARRAK KONTATZEN DITUZTEN LIBURUAK APALERA DOAZ. @INORK EZ DITU IRAKURRIKO. @LIBURU HORIEK BIZITZA GUZTIA GALTZEN DUTE, ETA EZ DIRA INOREN INSPIRAZIO ITURRI. @ZURE LIBURUAK EZ DU SAM INSPIRATUKO... ETA GERO... @NORK DAKI ZEIN BIDE HARTUKO DUEN...? @EZIN DA HORI GERTATU, JOT! @ITZULI ORAIN ETA GELDITU PETRALTZAR!

source: BUT THERE IS NO TIME TO DWELL ON THAT. @YOUR QUEST TO RE-ENTER THE BOOK IS NEAR ITS PINNACLE. @THE ITEM YOU NEED IS JUST BEYOND THIS SKETCHBOOK. @PRESS ON!
target: BAINA EZ DAGO HORRI JIRA-BIRAKA IBILTZEKO BETARIK. @LIBURUAN BERRIZ SARTZEAREN ABENTURAKO UNE ESANGURATSUA DA HAU. @BEHARREZKO OBJEKTUA ZIRRIBORRO HONETATIK HARATAGO DAGO. @AURRERA!

source: OH YOU NOTICED THE BEETLES ARE AFRAID OF THE LIGHT! NICE WORK!
target: AH, ZOMORROAK ARGIAREKIN IZUTZEN DIRELA OHARTU ZARA! LAN EDERRA!

source: AS LONG AS YOU STAY WITHIN THE LIGHT, THEY WON'T BE ABLE TO CATCH YOU!
target: ARGIAREKIN ZOAZEN BITARTEAN, EZIN IZANGO ZAITUZTE HARRAPATU!

source: WHOA THERE LAD. OUR TRAINING SESSION ISN'T QUITE OVER YET. @HEAD TO THE TOP OF THE PAGE AND JUMP THROUGH THE METAMAGIC PORTAL!
target: EGON PIXKA BATEAN, LAGUN. GURE ENTRENAMENDUA ORAINDIK EZ DA BUKATU. @ZOAZ ORRIAREN GOIKO ALDERA ETA EGIN JAUZI ATARI METAMAGIKOAN ZEHAR!

source: TESTING... TESTING.... AHEM @JOT! I'M TALKING TO YOU VIA RUNETOOTH HEADSET! @YOU KNOW, I'M SUDDENLY FEELING RATHER PARCHED... @WIZARDS ARE LIKE PLANTS... WE MUST KEEP HYDRATED. @USE YOUR PAGE TURNING ABILITIES TO GET ME SOMETHING TO DRINK! @APPROACH THE EDGE OF THE BOOK AND SEE WHAT YOU CAN DO.
target: PROBATZEN... PROBATZEN... EJEM @JOT! NIRE BLUTUZ ENTZUNGAILUETATIK ARI NAIZ! @HARA, BAPATEAN SEKULAKO EGARRIA ETORRI ZAIT... @AZTIAK LANDAREAK BEZALAKOAK GARA... HIDRATATUAK EGON BEHAR DUGU. @ERABILI ZURE ORRIAK PASATZEKO GAITASUNA NIRI EDARIREN BAT EKARTZEKO! @ZOAZ LIBURUAREN ERTZERA, EA ZER EGIN DEZAKEZUN.

source: YOU SEE THAT GLOW AROUND THE EDGES OF THE PAPER? @THAT'S THE BOOK TELLING YOU THERE'S SOMETHING USEFUL ON ITS PAGES. @TRY JUMPING IN AND SEEING WHAT YOU CAN FIND!
target: IKUSTEN DUZU PAPER ERTZETAKO DISTIRA HORI? @ORRI HAUETAN GARRANTZITSUA DEN ZERBAIT DAGOELA ESATEN ARI DA LIBURUA. @PROBATU BARRURA JAUZI EGIN ETA EA ZER AURKITZEN DUZUN!

source: JOT GOT THE TILT GAUNTLETS! @WITH THESE MYSTERIOUS GLOVES HE HAS THE POWER TO MOVE THE WORLD ITSELF! @USE {Axis_TiltBook_Negative} & {Axis_TiltBook_Positive} WHEN MANIPULATING THE BOOK.
target: JOTEK OKERTZEKO ESKULARRUAK ESKURATU DITU! @ESKULARRU MISTERIOTSU HAUEKIN MUNDUA BERA MUGITZEKO BOTEREA DU! @ERABILI {Axis_TiltBook_Negative} ETA {Axis_TiltBook_Positive} LIBURUA MANIPULATZEAN.

source: ANOTHER OF MOONBEARD'S MAGICAL ITEMS! @I BELIEVE YOU WILL FIND THE TILT GAUNTLETS MOST BENEFICIAL... @AND RATHER FUN - IF YOU ENJOY TILTING THINGS.
target: ILARGIBIZARREN OBJEKTU MAGIKOETAKO BESTE BAT! @NIK USTE OKERTZEKO ESKULARRU HAUEK OSO ERABILGARRI IZANGO ZAIZKIZULA... @ETA DIBERTIGARRIAK, GAUZAK OKERTZEA GUSTUKO BADUZU.

source: RETURN TO YOUR BOOK AND GIVE THEM A WHIRL!
target: ITZULI ZURE LIBURURA ETA EMAN BUELTA BAT!

source: I'LL MAGIC UP A PORTAL TO HELP YOU ON YOUR WAY...
target: ATARI BAT IREKIKO DUT, ZURI BIDEAN LAGUNTZEKO...

source: CHAPTER THREE
MOONBEARD
HMM, I SEEM TO FEATURE RATHER PROMINENTLY IN THIS CHAPTER. @BETTER PUT MY BEST FOOT FORWARD THEN!
target: HMM, KAPITULU HONETAN GARRANTZITSUA NAIZELA DIRUDI. @NIRE ONENA EMAN BEHARKO DUT!

source: GREETINGS, LAD!
HEY JOT! GLAD YOU'RE BACK HERE IN ONE PIECE!
target: AIZU JOT! POZTEN NAIZ ZU OSORIK IKUSTEAZ!

source: I SUPPOSE YOU MUST HAVE A GREAT NUMBER OF QUESTIONS, LAD! @THE ANSWER TO THE FIRST QUESTION IS... @YES. I AM AWARE OF HOW COOL THESE SUNGLASSES LOOK. @THE ANSWER TO THE SECOND QUESTION IS... @YES. OUR ENTIRE WORLD IS INDEED A LAND IN A STORYBOOK. @BANANAS, HUH? @I'VE KEPT THIS KNOWLEDGE A CLOSELY GUARDED SECRET FOR MANY A YEAR. @SOMEHOW, THAT GREASY NINCOMPOOP HUMGRUMP FOUND OUT. @VERY REGRETTABLE! @NOW HE KNOWS THE TRUTH, WHO KNOWS WHAT MISCHIEF HE'S PLANNING. @I HAVE A HUNCH THAT BIG TROUBLE IS ON THE WAY... @BUT THAT JUST MEANS, YOUNG SQUIRE, THAT WE MUST BE DOUBLE THE TROUBLE! @FOLLOW ME!
target: GALDERA ASKO IZANGO DITUZULA PENSATZEN DUT, LAGUN! @LEHENENGO GALDERAREN ERANTZUNA DA... @BAI. BADAKIT BETAURREKO HAUEK DEMASEKOAK DIRELA. @BIGARREN GALDERAREN ERANTZUNA DA... @BAI. GURE MUNDU GUZTIA IPUIN BATEKO LURRALDE BAT BESTERIK EZ DA. @EROKERIA, EZTA? @URTE LUZEZ GORDE IZAN DUT SEKRETU HAU. @BAINA, NOLABAIT, PETRALTZAR HIGUINGARRI HORREK JAKIN EGIN DU. @TAMALGARRIA! @EGIA HORI EZAGUTU DU ETA NORK DAKI ZER NOLAKO GAIZTAKERIA PRESTATZEN ARI DEN. @ARAZO HANDIA DATORRENAREN SUSMOA DUT... @ETA HORREK ZER ESAN NAHI DUEN, EZKUTARI GAZTEA? LAN HANDIA IZANGO DUGULA! @JARRAITU NIRI!

source: FIRST ORDER OF BUSINESS... GETTING IN AND OUT OF THE BOOK! @SEE THAT GREEN SPARKLY STUFF OVER THERE?
target: EGUNEKO LEHENENGO IKASGAIA... LIBURUAN SARTU ETA ATERA! @IKUSTEN DUZU GAUZA BERDE DISTIRATSU HORI?

source: METAMAGIC, THAT IS. IT LETS YOU BREAK THE FOURTH WALL. @WHICH IS ANOTHER WAY OF SAYING... JUMP OUT OF THE BOOK. @WALK INTO THE PORTAL AND TRY HOLDING THE {Action_Action} BUTTON! @WHAT'S A {Action_Action} BUTTON? @... @NOT ENTIRELY SURE. @BUT YOU SHOULD PRESS AND HOLD IT!
target: METAMAGIA DU IZENA. LAUGARREN PARETA PUSKATZEKO BALIO DU. @BESTE MODU BATERA ESANDA... LIBURUTIK KANPORA JAUZI EGITEKO. @IBILI ATARIRANTZ ETA PROBATU {Action_Action} BOTOIA EUSTEN! @ZER DEN {Action_Action} BOTOIA? @... @EZ NAGO ERABAT ZIUR. @BAINA ZUK SAKATU ETA EUTSI!

source: INDEED! I'M TALKING TO YOU VIA A DEVICE KNOWN AS A RUNETOOTH HEADSET. @THIS IS A STRANGE MAGICAL FORM OF COMMUNICATION KNOWN AS... A 'CONFERENCE CALL'. @ALL VERY EXCITING. @NOW LISTEN UP! THIS BUSINESS WITH HUMGRUMP IS RATHER WORRYING. @WE MUST CONSULT WITH QUEEN CHROMA AT ARTIA CITY. YOU THREE SHOULD HEAD THERE NOW! @I'VE GOT SOME WIZARD BUSINESS TO ATTEND TO AND A DONUT TO EAT... @I'LL JOIN YOU KIDS LATER. @VIOLET, THRASH - I'LL FILL YOU IN ON THE SITUATION WHILE YOU TRAVEL. @MOONBEARD OUT!
target: HALA NAIZ! BLUTUZ IZENEZ EZAGUNA DEN GAILU BATEKIN ARI NATZAIZUE. @KOMUNIKAZIO MAGIKO MOTA BITXI BAT DA ETA IZENA DU... 'TELEKONFERENTZIA'. @OSO ZIRRARAGARRIA. @ORAIN ENTZUN! PETRALTZARREN KONTU GUZTI HAU KEZKAGARRIA DA. @ARTIA HIRIAN DAGOEN KROMA ERREGINAREKIN HITZ EGIN BEHAR DUGU. @HARANTZ JOAN BEHAR ZENUKETE ORAINTXE! @AZTI KONTU BATZUEZ ARDURATU ETA DONUT BAT JAN BEHAR DUT... @BERANDUAGO ELKARTUKO NAIZ ZUEKIN. @VIOLET, THRASH... ZUEN BIDAIAN ZEHAR AZALDUKO DIZUET GERTATUTAKOA. @ILARGIBIZARREK MOZTU!

source: ROCKING, JOT!
GOOD JOB, LAD. NOW... ONTO THE NEXT LESSON.
target: LAN APARTA, LAGUN. ORAIN... HURRENGO LEZIORA.

source: I'LL SHOW YOU A NEW SWORD TRICK, LAD. @PRESS AND RELEASE ꝉ TO THROW YOUR SWORD AT A TARGET! @IF YOUR SWORD EVER GETS STUCK JUST PRESS ꝉ AND IT WILL FLY BACK LIKE A BOOMERANG!
target: EZPATA TRUKO BERRI BAT ERAKUTSIKO DIZUT, LAGUN. @SAKATU ETA ASKATU ꝉ ZURE EZPATA BOTATZEKO! @EZPATA LEKUREN BATEAN TRABATUTA GELDITZEN BADA SAKATU ꝉ ETA BOOMERANG BAT BEZALA ITZULIKO ZAIZU!

source: POP TIME!
AHHHHHH. @THAT'S THE TICKET. THANKS, LAD.
target: AHHHHHH. @HORIXE BEHAR NUEN. ESKERRIK ASKO, LAGUN.

source: THOSE TURN GAUNTLETS CAN BE VERY HANDY, DON'T YOU THINK? @I WAS THE ONE THAT PUT THEM ON THE DESK! @I'VE STORED A NUMBER OF USEFUL ITEMS OUT THERE, BUT THERE'S ONE SMALL PROBLEM... @I'M NOT SURE OF THEIR PRECISE LOCATION. @THINGS GET MOVED AROUND... SAM IS FULL OF ENERGY, YOU KNOW... IT'S CHAOS OUT THERE! @WHEN YOU NEED ONE OF THOSE ITEMS ON THE DESK, YOU'LL JUST HAVE TO SEARCH FOR YOURSELF! @LAST POINT OF ORDER...
target: ORRI-ESKULARRU HORIEK OSO ERABILGARRIAK DIRA, EZ DUZU USTE? @NI IZAN NINTZEN MAHAIAN JARRI ZITUENA! @HAINBAT GAUZA ERABILGARRI UTZI DITUT HOR ZEHAR, BAINA ARAZOTXO BAT DAGO... @EZ NAGO GUZTIZ ZIUR NON EGON DAITEZKEEN. @GAUZAK MUGITU EGITEN DIRA... SAM ENERGIAZ BETERIK DAGO, BADAKIZU... KAOSA DA! @MAHAIKO ZERBAIT BEHAR DUZUNEAN, ZUK ZEUK BILATU BEHARKO DUZU! @GAIORDENEKO AZKENEKO PUNTUA...

source: MINIBEARD!
YO.

I HEAR YOU'VE ALREADY MET? @MINIBEARD IS A TINY SIMULACRUM OF ME. I CREATED HIM TO HELP OUT AROUND THE HOUSE. @HE'S QUITE HELPFUL - AND RATHER GOOD AT PUZZLES, YOU KNOW. @IF YOU'RE HAVING TROUBLE WITH A PUZZLE AND YOU SEE HIM AROUND, WHY NOT ASK HIS ADVICE? @THERE'S A LOT OF WISDOM STORED IN THAT TINY BEARDED HEAD.
target: ELKAR EZAGUTZEN DUZUELA JAKIN DUT, EZTA? @MINILARGI NIRE SIMULAZIOTXO BAT DA. ETXEAN ZEHAR LAGUNTZEKO SORTU NUEN. @OSO LAGUNGARRIA DA, ETA NAHIKO ONA PUZZLEETAN, BADAKIZU? @PUZZLEREN BATEKIN ARAZOAK BADITUZU ETA BERA INGURUAN BADABIL, ESKATU AHOLKUA! @BURU BIZARDUN TXIKI HORRETAN JAKITURIA HANDIA DAGO GORDETA.

source: JOT! @OUR LAND HAS NEVER BEEN TROUBLED BY SOMETHING QUITE LIKE HUMGRUMP'S METAMAGIC BEFORE. @THERE MAY BE GREAT UPHEAVALS AND BIG BATTLES AHEAD. @BUT I HAVE FAITH YOU'LL RISE TO WHATEVER CHALLENGES ARE THROWN OUR WAY. @YOU ARE THE PLUCKY SQUIRE, AFTER ALL. @I BELIEVE IN YOU! @ALWAYS HAVE, LAD. @NOW, I EXPECT THAT YOUR FRIENDS ARE WAITING FOR YOU. @IF YOU LEAVE THE BOOK AND TURN TO THE NEXT PAGE I THINK YOU'LL FIND THEM!
target: JOT! @GURE LURRALDEAN EZ DUGU INOIZ PETRALTZARREN METAMAGIA ADINAKO ARRISKURIK EZAGUTU. @BALITEKE ASALDURA ETA BORROKA HANDIAK AURKITZEA. @BAINA BADAKIT AURREAN JARRIKO ZAIZUN EDOZEIN ERRONKA GAINDITUKO DUZULA. @AZKEN FINEAN, EZKUTARI AUSARTA ZARA. @ZUGAN SINESTEN DUT! @BETIDANIK, LAGUN. @ORAIN, ZURE LAGUNAK ZAIN IZANGO DITUZU. @LIBURUTIK ATERA ETA HURRENGO ORRIRA BAZOAZ, BERTAN AURKITUKO DITUZU!

source: GRAND WORK! THAT WILL COME IN VERY HANDY AGAINST FAR OFF ENEMIES! @REMEMBER THAT YOU CAN ALSO AIM MORE PRECISELY IF YOU HOLD ꝉ... @...WHATEVER THAT IS.
target: LAN BIKAINA! HORI OSO ERABILGARRIA IZANGO DA URRUNEAN DAUDEN ETSAIEKIN! @GOGORATU ZEHATZAGO APUNTATU DEZAKEZULA ꝉ EUSTEN BADUZU... @HORI EDOZER DELA ERE...

source: WE SHOULDN'T HAVE JUST LET HIM COME UP HERE BY HIMSELF... @WE SHOULD HAVE HAD HIS BACK...
target: EZ GENION HONA GORA BERARI BAKARRIK ETORTZEN UTZI BEHAR... @LAGUN EGIN BEHAR GENION...

source: WE'VE... LOST... JOT... I CAN'T BELIEVE IT...
target: JOT... GALDU... DUGU... EZIN DUT SINETSI...

source: BUT... WHAT COULD WE HAVE DONE? @WE'RE NOT WARRIORS, LIKE HIM... @NEVER HAVE BEEN, NEVER WILL BE... @WHO WILL PROTECT MOJO NOW THAT HE'S... HE'S... GONE!!!
target: BAINA... ZER EGINGO GENUEN GUK? @BERA BAI, BAINA GU EZ GARA GERLARIAK... @EZ GARA INOIZ IZAN, EZTA IZANGO ERE... @NORK BABESTUKO DU MOJO... BERA EZ BADAGO HEMEN!!!

source: HELLO GANG!
WAIT... @YOU'RE NOT A GHOST, ARE YOU?
{200}DUDE!
MOONBEARD?? IS THAT YOU???
CONFERENCE CALL?
OF COURSE HE ISN'T, THRASH! @LOOK AT HIS FACE! THAT'S HIS NORMAL SQUIDGY FACE. @SO HAPPY TO SEE IT! @JOT, WHERE WERE YOU??
target: NOSKI EZ DELA, THRASH! @BEGIRA BERE AURPEGIARI! BERE BETIKO TXIBI AURPEGIA DA. @POZTEN NAIZ ZU IKUSTEAZ! @JOT, NON IBILI ZARA??

source: WELL... YOU HEARD HIM. A TRIP TO ARTIA CITY... MY HOME TOWN! @OH JOT, I'M SO GLAD YOU'RE OK. @ C'MON, LET'S SCOOT!
target: TIRA... ENTZUN DIOZU. ARTIA HIRIRA BIDAIA... NIRE JAIOTERRIRA! @OH JOT, ASKO POZTEN NAIZ ZU ONGI IKUSITA. @TIRA BA, WAZEMANK!!

source: YOU'RE ALRIGHT!!!
HOLD ON JOT! WE CANT LEAVE WITHOUT YOUR SWORD!
target: EGON JOT! EZIN GARA ZURE EZPATA GABE JOAN!

source: AND SO OUR HEROES SET OFF TO ARTIA CITY, #TO VISIT THE GOOD QUEEN CHROMA.
target: ETA HORRELA GURE HEROIAK ARTIA HIRIRANTZ ABIATU ZIREN, #KROMA ERREGINA ZINTZOA BISITAN.

source: NO TIME FOR WANDERING, JOT! I HAVE A MIGHTY THIRST!
target: EZ DUGU BUELTAKA IBILTZEKO ASTIRIK, JOT! EGARRIAK PASATA NAGO!

source: USE THE PORTAL TO RETURN, JOT!
MY FIZZY POP! THAT WILL DO VERY NICELY. @HEAD BACK HERE AND DROP OFF THAT POP!
target: NIRE GASEOSA! BIKAIN DATORKIT. @ZATOZ ONA BUELTAN ETA EKARRI FRESKAGARRIA!

source: HERE WE GO, LET'S TAKE A LOOK AT THIS.. @SEEMS LIKE YOU CAN USE {Axis_MoveRight_Negative}{Axis_MoveRight_Positive} TO TURN PAGES. @BEST GET TO IT THEN!
target: TIRA, IKUS DEZAGUN ZER DAGOEN HEMEN... @BADIRUDI {Axis_MoveRight_Negative}{Axis_MoveRight_Positive} ERABILITA ORRIAK PASA DITZAKEZULA. @PROBATZEA DUZU ONENA!

source: METAMAGIC, THAT IS. IT LETS YOU BREAK THE FOURTH WALL. @WHICH IS ANOTHER WAY OF SAYING... JUMP OUT OF THE BOOK. @WALK INTO THE PORTAL AND TRY HOLDING THE {Action_Action} BUTTON! @WHAT'S A {Action_Action} BUTTON? @... @NOT ENTIRELY SURE. @BUT YOU SHOULD PRESS AND HOLD IT!
target: METAMAGIA DU IZENA. LAUGARREN PARETA PUSKATZEKO BALIO DU. @BESTE MODU BATERA ESANDA... LIBURUTIK KANPORA JAUZI EGITEKO. @IBILI ATARIRANTZ ETA PROBATU {Action_Action} BOTOIA EUSTEN! @ZER DEN {Action_Action} BOTOIA? @... @EZ NAGO ERABAT ZIUR. @BAINA ZUK SAKATU ETA EUTSI!

source: METAMAGIC, THAT IS. IT LETS YOU BREAK THE FOURTH WALL. @WHICH IS ANOTHER WAY OF SAYING... JUMP OUT OF THE BOOK. @WALK INTO THE PORTAL AND TRY HOLDING THE {Action_Action} BUTTON! @WHAT'S A {Action_Action} BUTTON? @... @NOT ENTIRELY SURE. @BUT YOU SHOULD PRESS AND HOLD IT!
target: METAMAGIA DU IZENA. LAUGARREN PARETA PUSKATZEKO BALIO DU. @BESTE MODU BATERA ESANDA... LIBURUTIK KANPORA JAUZI EGITEKO. @IBILI ATARIRANTZ ETA PROBATU {Action_Action} BOTOIA EUSTEN! @ZER DEN {Action_Action} BOTOIA? @... @EZ NAGO ERABAT ZIUR. @BAINA ZUK SAKATU ETA EUTSI!

source: METAMAGIC, THAT IS. IT LETS YOU BREAK THE FOURTH WALL. @WHICH IS ANOTHER WAY OF SAYING... JUMP OUT OF THE BOOK. @WALK INTO THE PORTAL AND TRY HOLDING THE {Action_Action} BUTTON! @WHAT'S A {Action_Action} BUTTON? @... @NOT ENTIRELY SURE. @BUT YOU SHOULD PRESS AND HOLD IT!
target: METAMAGIA DU IZENA. LAUGARREN PARETA PUSKATZEKO BALIO DU. @BESTE MODU BATERA ESANDA... LIBURUTIK KANPORA JAUZI EGITEKO. @IBILI ATARIRANTZ ETA PROBATU {Action_Action} BOTOIA EUSTEN! @ZER DEN {Action_Action} BOTOIA? @... @EZ NAGO ERABAT ZIUR. @BAINA ZUK SAKATU ETA EUTSI!

source: JOT! WHAT YOU'RE LOOKING FOR IS IN OUR BOOK!
target: JOT! BILA ZABILTZAN HORI GURE LIBURUAN DAGO!

source: TURN THE BOOK'S PAGES TO FIND MY FIZZY POP! @MOONBEARD OUT!
target: PASA LIBURUAREN ORRIAK FRESKAGARRIA AURKITZEKO! @ILARGIBIZARREK MOZTU!

source: TURN THE BOOK'S PAGES TO REUNITE WITH YOUR FRIENDS! @MOONBEARD OUT!
target: PASA LIBURUAREN ORRIAK ZURE LAGUNEKIN ELKARTZEKO! @ILARGIBIZARREK MOZTU!

source: I SUPPOSE YOU MUST HAVE A GREAT NUMBER OF QUESTIONS, LAD! @THE ANSWER TO THE FIRST QUESTION IS...
target: GALDERA ASKO IZANGO DITUZULA PENSATZEN DUT, LAGUN! @LEHENENGO GALDERAREN ERANTZUNA DA...

source: YES. I AM AWARE OF HOW COOL THESE SUNGLASSES LOOK.

THE ANSWER TO THE SECOND QUESTION IS... @YES. OUR ENTIRE WORLD IS INDEED A LAND IN A STORYBOOK. @BANANAS, HUH? @I'VE KEPT THIS KNOWLEDGE A CLOSELY GUARDED SECRET FOR MANY A YEAR. @SOMEHOW, THAT GREASY NINCOMPOOP HUMGRUMP FOUND OUT. @VERY REGRETTABLE! @NOW HE KNOWS THE TRUTH, WHO KNOWS WHAT MISCHIEF HE'S PLANNING. @I HAVE A HUNCH THAT BIG TROUBLE IS ON THE WAY... @BUT THAT JUST MEANS, YOUNG SQUIRE, THAT WE MUST BE DOUBLE THE TROUBLE! @FOLLOW ME!
target: BIGARREN GALDERAREN ERANTZUNA DA... @BAI. GURE MUNDU GUZTIA IPUIN BATEKO LURRALDE BAT BESTERIK EZ DA. @EROKERIA, EZTA? @URTE LUZEZ GORDE IZAN DUT SEKRETU HAU. @BAINA, NOLABAIT, PETRALTZAR HIGUINGARRI HORREK JAKIN EGIN DU. @TAMALGARRIA! @EGIA HORI EZAGUTU DU ETA NORK DAKI ZER NOLAKO GAIZTAKERIA PRESTATZEN ARI DEN. @ARAZO HANDIA DATORRENAREN SUSMOA DUT... @ETA HORREK ZER ESAN NAHI DUEN, EZKUTARI GAZTEA? LAN HANDIA IZANGO DUGULA! @JARRAITU NIRI!

source: FIGHT
TALK
GUARD
SLASH
STAB
BRUTAL SLASH
RUSHING STAB
Humgrump isn't my boss!'
Let's stop all this fighting business'
Really! Humgrump is my enemy!'
I don't have a boss!'
I'm on a quest to defeat him!'
I'm trying to stop his nefarious plans.'
target: Bere plan zitalak gelditu nahian nabil.'

source: EXIT
'Show me what you've got, rascal!'
'Now is not the time for words...but for battle!'
target: 'Orain ez da hizketarako ordua... borrokarakoa baizik!'

source: 'I do not converse with scoundrels!'
'I will not talk with you...but my arrows will sing!'
target: 'Nik ez dut zurekin hitz egingo...baina nire geziek abestuko dute!'

source: 'It seems that you really wish to talk! I do not!'
'Your insistence on conversation grows wearisome!'
'You are becoming quite annoying.'
'No more words, scoundrel!'
'It is the end for you!'
'Be silent while I vanquish you!'
'You...expect me to believe that??'
'Not until you are defeated!'
'Your...enemy...? But what do you mean?'
'How lucky for you.'
'You mean...you are not his underling?'
'You shall not have this bow...but you shall have its fury!'
target: 'Ez duzu arku hau izango...baina bere amorrua ezagutuko duzu!'

source: 'How do you like the points of these arrows, scoundrel?'
'I see panic in your beady eyes!'
'No doubt you rue entangling with a forest elf!'
target: 'Ziur elfo basozain baten aurka aritzeaz damutuko zarela!'

source: 'The feather in your cap quivers with fear, scoundrel!'
target: 'Txapeleko luma beldurrarekin dardarka duzu, zital hori!'

source: 'You will not soon forget the song of my arrows!'
'You're a little hardier, it seems...but fall to my arrows, you shall!'
target: 'Gogor samarra zara, dirudienez...baina nire gezien mende geratuko zara!'

source: 'I have been too kind thus far!'
'Still no match for me, crimson rascal!'
target: 'Ez zara nire mailako arerioa, alproja hori!'

source: 'Our forests will be happier with you gone!'
target: 'Gure basoak lasaiago egongo dira zu joatean!'

source: 'You don't give up, do you, rapscallion?'
'You will never defeat the elvish spirit!'
'This bow shall not be yours!'
target: 'Gezi hau ez da inoiz zure izango!'

source: 'Begone...away from these forests...forever!'
'You will not succeed with your nefarious plans!'
target: 'Ez duzu arrakastarik izango zure plan zitalean!'

source: 'Jot! It is I, Page the Bookworm!'
'You seem to be in a desperate predicament!'
'Let me revivify you!'
'Your vitality is restored! I may have also...spruced up your offensive capabilities...'
target: 'Bizia berreskuratuta! Eta agian... zure eraso gaitasuna hobetu dut...'

source: 'Alas, Jot, that was a one-time spell; I can revitalise you no more.'
target: 'Zoritxarrez, Jot, aldi bakarreko konjurua izan da; Ezin izango zaitut berriz suspertu.'

source: 'The outcome of this skirmish is now entirely up to you, Plucky Squire!'
target: 'Hemendik aurrera, borroka honen emaitza zure esku dago, Ezkutari Ausarta!'

source: 'This sorcery matters naught...I shall dispatch you once and for all!'
target: 'Sorginkeria hutsala da... zurekin bukatuko dut behingoz!'

source: 'Battle on!'
'Still...you persist...intruder!'
'I will destroy this elven bow before I give it to you!'
target: 'Elfoen arkua txikitu egingo nuke zuri eman baino lehen!'

source: 'The elves will never let their weapons be used for evil purposes.'
target: 'Elfoek ez dute inoiz onartuko beraien armak helburu gaiztoetarako erabiltzerik!'

source: 'You can tell that to your boss...what was his name now?'
'Ah yes....Humgrump!!'
'And now...let us finish it!'
'Jot...did you hear that??'
'It seems that she has erroneously identified you as an agent of Humgrump's'
target: 'Badirudi Petraltzarren lekaio bezala oker identifikatu zaituela'

source: 'You must talk to her, Jot - inform her of the truth!'
target: 'Berekin hitz egin behar duzu, Jot. Esaiozu egia!'

source: 'I think I can reproduce the spell that she cast to buy us some time...'
target: 'Nik uste berak erabili duen konjurua kopiatu dezakedala, denbora pixka bat lortzeko...'

source: 'Most assuredly not!'
'Jot is a champion of his land...'
'...striving to defeat the dastardly Humgrump and put a stop to his mischief!'
target: '...Petraltzar gaiztoaren aurka borrokan, bere gaiztakeriak geldiarazteko!'

source: 'Alowynia, we wholeheartedly apologize for the disturbance we have precipitated.'
target: 'Alowynia, barkamenik zintzoenak eskatzen dizkizugu nahigabeko harrabots honegatik.'

source: 'We are searching for a weapon to help clean up Humgrump's chaos.'
target: 'Petraltzarrek sortutako kaosa zuzentzeko arma baten bila gabiltza.'

source: 'Your elven bow...seemed like it could be advantageous in that regard...'
target: 'Zure elfo arkuak...gure helburu horretarako oso egokia dela dirudi...'

source: 'But we did not mean to cause any turmoil in your forests.'
target: 'Baina ez dugu zure basoetan inongo asaldurarik sortu nahi izan.'

source: 'Exceptional!'
'Is that so? Now that I take a closer look at him...'
'...he does seem to have a somewhat heroic countenance...'
'I have decided...I shall lend the elven bow to you!'
'Any enemy of Humgrump is a friend of mine.'
'I can see the aura of good about you now, Jot!'
target: 'Zure inguruan aura zintzoa ikusten dut orain, Jot!'

source: 'When the bow has finished assisting you it will return itself to these forests.'
target: 'Arkuak zuri laguntzen bukatzen duenean bera bakarrik itzuliko da baso hauetara.'

source: 'Good luck on your quest, young Jot!'
'Our battle was most...bracing.'
'Oh sacred forests! I have fallen to the sword of this intruder!'
target: 'Oh baso sakratuak! Kanpotar honen ezpatak garaitu nau!'

source: 'But...I take the elven bow with me!'
'Jot! You extinguished her elven spirit!'
'And the bow...it is gone with her...'
'When the bow has finished assisting you it will return itself to these forests.'
target: 'Arkuak zuri laguntzen bukatzen duenean bera bakarrik itzuliko da baso hauetara.'

source: 'Good luck on your quest, young Jot!'
'Our battle was most...bracing.'
'What's this?'
'Another intruder! I can see a thieving gleam in your eye...'
target: 'Beste kanpotar bat! Lapurreta distira nabari dezaket zure begiradan...'

Jot used Brutal Slash!

##Alowynia received heavy damage!

Jot used Stab!

##Alowynia received damage!
##Alowynia received heavy damage!
##Jot's stab misses!
##Jot's rushing stab misses!
target: Jotek sastakada azkarrrean huts egin du!

source: Jot tried talking to Alowynia.
target: Jot Alowyniarekin hitz egiten saiatu da.

source: Jot takes a defensive position.
Alowynia used Arrow Strike!
##Jot received damage!
Alowynia used Arrow Barrage!
##Jot received heavy damage!
##Alowynia's attack missed!
Page casts a magic spell.
##Jot suddenly feels splendid!
Alowynia cast a Spell Of Protection.
##Her Defense Power rose. Her Attack Power fell.
target: ##Babes Boterea igo zaio. Eraso Boterea jaitsi zaio.

source: Page cast a Spell Of Protection.
##Jot's Defense Power rose. His Attack Power fell.
target: ##Joti Babes Boterea igo zaio. Eraso Boterea jaitsi zaio.

source: You received the elven bow!
The mighty ranger awaits her next foe...
target: Basozain boteretsua hurrengo arerioaren zain dago...

source: Jot
Page
Alowynia
Alowynia, the elf ranger
ARTIA!
CHAPTER FIVE
ARTIA
AFTER SOME TIME THEY ARRIVED...

GREETINGS, GANG! @SORRY WE LOST CONTACT IN THE SONNET SWAMPS, RUNETOOTH COVERAGE IS STILL RATHER LIMITED. @ANYWAY, GLAD YOU WEREN'T ALL DEVOURED BY LEECHES. @I'M ON MY WAY TO ARTIA CITY, I'LL JOIN YOU SHORTLY. @IN THE MEANTIME, STRETCH YOUR PINS, TAKE A LOOK AROUND! @MOONBEARD OUT!
target: KAIXO, TALDE! SENTITZEN DUT SONETO ZINGIRETAN KONEXIOA GALDU IZANA. @BLUTUZAREN ESTALDURA NAHIKO MUGATUA DA. @EDONOLA ERE, POZTEN NAIZ IZAINEK EZ ZAITUZTETELA JAN IKUSTEAZ. @ARTIA HIRIRANTZ NOA, LASTER ELKARTUKO NAIZ ZUEKIN. @BITARTEAN, PROBESTU HANKAK PIXKA BAT LUZATU ETA HIRIA IKUSTEKO! @ILARGIBIZARREK MOZTU!

source: YOU'RE LOOKING ALL SMUDGED! I MEAN, MORE THAN USUAL... @WHAT HAVE YOU BEEN UP TO NOW??
target: OSO ZIKIN ZAUDE ETA! ZERA, OHIKOA BAINO GEHIAGO... @ZERTAN ARITU ZARA ORAINGOAN??

source: ALWAYS IS, THAT ONE. @WELL IT'S GOOD TO SEE YOU ALL. INCLUDING YOU, JOT! @I READ YOUR LATEST ADVENTURE... QUITE THE PAGE TURNER! @THE BIT WHERE YOU LEAPT OVER THE...
target: BETI BERDIN DABIL HORI. @TIRA, POZTEN NAIZ ZUEK IKUSTEAZ. BAITA ZU ERE, JOT! @ZURE AZKEN ABENTURA IRAKURRI DUT... ZELAKO ZIRRARA! @ZERA, JAUZI EGIN ZENUEN HORI...

source: ALRIGHT, ALRIGHT... @VIOLET, LISTEN... YOUR UNCLE UMBER - HE'S GOT HIMSELF IN A PICKLE... @SOUNDS LIKE HE NEEDS SOME HELP... COULD YOU GO TALK TO HIM?
target: TIRA, TIRA... @VIOLET, ENTZUN... ZURE OSABA OKREK ARAZOTXO BAT DAUKA... @LAGUNTZA BEHAR DUELA USTE DUT... BEREKIN HITZ EGINGO ZENUKE?

source: HEY MRS LIGHTBRUSH! @YEAH, THINGS HAVE GOT PRETTY GNARLY, HUMGRUMP IS UP TO SOME KIND OF HUMGRUMPY MISCHIEF...
target: KAIXO PINTZELARGI ANDREA! @BAI, GAUZAK PIXKA BAT OKERTU DIRA, PETRALTZAR BERE PETRALKERIETAN DABIL...

source: HERE WE ARE! HOME SWEET HOME!
HEY MUM! @WELL... WE'VE BEEN, Y'KNOW... ADVENTURING...
target: KAIXO AMA! @ZERA... IBILI GARA... BA'KIZU... ABENTURETAN...

source: MUM! JOT'S HEARD IT ALREADY!
HUH, IT FIGURES! OK MUM, I'M ON IT.
target: UI, EZ NAU GEHIEGI HARRITZEN... ONGI, AMA. NERE KONTU.

source: I AM NOT A DOG.
C'MON FELLA, WHY DON'T YOU BUDGE OVER? @YOU'RE SITTING ON SOMETHING KIND OF IMPORTANT...
target: TIRA LAGUN, MUGI ZAITEZ PIXKA BAT, EZ? @GAUZA GARRANTZITSU BATEN GAINEAN ZAUDE ESERITA...

source: ... @UHHH... DOESN'T LOOK LIKE HE'S BUDGING...
MAYBE IF WE FIND HIS OWNER, HE'LL HAVE AN IDEA...
target: BERE JABEA AURKITZEN BADUGU, IZANGO IDEIAREN BAT...

source: HEY, LOOK AT THAT! GREEN SPARKLES UNDER THAT DOGGY! @LOOKS LIKE HE'S SAT RIGHT ON TOP OF A PATCH OF MAGIC!
target: HARA, BEGIRA HORI! TXAKURTXO HORREN AZPIAN DISTIRA BERDEA IKUSTEN DA! @MAGIA PARTXE BATEN GAINEAN ESERITA DAGOELA DIRUDI!

source: HOW ARE WE GOING TO GET HIM TO MOVE?
OH! YEAH I KNOW HIS OWNER! @MR. MAGRI - SMART CHAP IN A MATCHING BOWLER HAT!
target: OH! BERE JABEA EZAGUTZEN DUT! @MAGRI JAUNA
column4: ONDDO-KAPELA DARAMAN GIZON OSO ARGI BAT DA!

source: UNCLE UMBER WILL APPRECIATE YOUR HELP!
target: OSABA OKREK ZURE LAGUNTZA ESKERTUKO DU!

source: NAHHH. SIMILAR HAT, BUT THIS ISN'T MR. MAGRI.
target: MEEZZ. ANTZEKO TXAPELA, BAINA EZ DA MAGRI JAUNA

source: IS THIS THE DOG'S OWNER?

OH, BONJOUR, YOUNG VIOLET. @YOU KNOW, IT'S NICE TO SEE YOU IN THE TOWN AGAIN. @YOU'VE GROWN A LITTLE TALLER. @OR MAYBE THE WORLD HAS GROWN A LITTLE SHORTER. @IT'S HARD TO SAY WHICH. HOW CAN I HELP YOU?
target: OH, BONJOUR, VIOLET GAZTEA. @POZGARRIA DA ZU BERRIZ HERRI HONETAN IKUSTEA. @PIXKA BAT HAZI ZARELA DIRUDI. @EDO MUNDUA DA TXIKITU DENA. @EZIN JAKIN ZER GERTATU DEN. ZERTAN LAGUNDU ZAITZAKET?

source: AN INTERESTING QUESTION. @MY MIND, UNFORTUNATELY, IS A BLANK. @I NEED SOME INSPIRATION TO SPARK SOME THOUGHT. @AND I NEED AN OBJECT TO SEED MY INSPIRATION. @I NEED... @I NEED...... @AN APPLE!!!
target: GALDERA INTERESGARRIA. @NIRE GOGOA, ZORITXARREZ, HUTSIK DAGO. @NOLABAITEKO INSPIRAZIOA BEHAR DUT IDEIAK NIREGANATZEKO. @ETA NIRE INSPIRAZIOAREN HAZIA IZANGO DEN OBJEKTU BAT BEHAR DUT. @NIK... @NIK BEHAR DUT... @SAGAR BAT!!!

source: WHERE ARE WE GOING TO GET AN APPLE?
target: NONDIK ATERAKO DUGU GUK SAGAR BAT?

source: HEY MR. MAGRI!
IT'S YOUR DOG! HE'S SITTING ON SOMETHING QUITE IMPORTANT! @DO YOU HAVE ANY... UHH... ADVICE ON HOW TO SHIFT HIM?
target: ZURE TXAKURRA GAUZA OSO GARRANTZITSU BATEN GAINEAN DAGO ESERITA! @BA AL DUZU INOLAKO... EHH... AHOLKURIK BERA MUGIARAZTEKO?

source: ... @UMM... OK! @WE'LL GET YOU AN APPLE!
UHH... SOMEWHERE FRUITY, I SUPPOSE...
target: EHH... FRUTAK DAUDEN LEKU BATETIK, EZTA?

source: AN APPLE, S'IL TE PLAÎT.
... @OH. HELLO PINNY. HELLO CLIPSO.
WELL LOOK WHO WE HAVE HERE!
HEHEH
LONG TIME NO SEE... @...SPLAT!
HI THERE, VIOLET! WHAT CAN I DO FOR YOU?
WELL WELL! YOU HAVE COME TO THE RIGHT PLACE! @I HAVE A FRESH GREEN APPLE RIGHT HERE!
target: TIRA TIRA! LEKU EZIN HOBERA ETORRI ZARA! @SAGAR BERDE FRESKO BAT DUT HEMENTXE!

source: PRETTY SHINY HUH? THAT'S A GOOD APPLE, THAT IS. @I KNOW MY APPLES. I'M SUROUNDED BY FRUIT. @YOU CAN HAVE THIS ONE, FREE OF CHARGE!
target: DISTIRATSUA, EZTA? SAGAR ONA DA HORI. @EZAGUTZEN DITUT NIRE SAGARRAK. FRUTAZ INGURATUTA NAGO. @HAR EZAZU HAU, DEBALDE!

source: HEY MR. BERRY!
FUNNY YOU SHOULD ASK. THE THING IS... @WE'RE LOOKING FOR AN APPLE...
target: BITXIA DA GALDETZEA. IZAN ERE... @SAGAR BATEN BILA GABILTZA...

source: BRILLIANT! THANK YOU MR. BERRY!
HEY!! WHAT'S WITH ALL THESE MAJORLY MEAN VIBES??
TOTALLY UNCOOL. WHAT IS UP WITH THOSE TWO?
target: OSO GAIZKI EGON DA HORI. ZER GERTATZEN ZAIE BI HORIEI?

source: I MEAN... WE ALL MAKE MISTAKES, YOU KNOW. @NO NEED TO KEEP RAGGING ON SOMEONE FOR THEIR CATASTROPHES! @UHH... MISHAPS.
target: TIRA... GUZTIOK SARTZEN DUGU HANKA, EZTA? @EZ DA KONTUA BEHIN ETA BERRIZ NORBAITI BERE KATASTROFEAK LEPORATZEA! @EHH... AKATSA TXIKIAK.

source: UGH. THEY'VE ALWAYS BEEN LIKE THAT. @THEY WERE A REAL JOY IN SCHOOL. @THAT'S WHERE THEY GAVE ME MY NICKNAME. @YOU SEE... I REALLY WANTED TO GET GOOD AT PAINTERLY MAGIC... BUT... @THERE WERE A FEW... ACCIDENTS. @... @I FLOODED THE WHOLE CLASSROOM WITH MULTI-COLOURED PAINT. @PEOPLE COULDN'T HEAR PROPERLY FOR WEEKS. PAINT IN THE EARS. @THAT'S WHEN I BECOME KNOWN AS 'SPLAT' @THEY NEVER LET ME LIVE IT DOWN.
target: ARG. BETI IZAN DIRA HORRELAKOAK. @GELAKIDEAK GINENEAN ERE BERDIN. @ORDUAN JARRI ZIDATEN GOITIZENA. @ZERA... MARGOLARI MAGIKO IZAN NAHI IZAN DUT BETIDANIK... BAINA... @ISTRIPU BATZUK... IZAN ZIREN. @... BEHIN, GELA OSOA MARGO KOLORE-ANITZETAN URPERATU NUEN. @NIRE GELAKIDEEK ASTEAK EMAN ZITUZTEN EZIN ONGI ENTZUNEZ, MARGOA BELARRIETAN ZUTELAKO. @HORREN ONDOREN HASI ZIREN 'ZPLAT' DEITZEN @ALDI ORO GOGORARAZTEN DIDATE.

source: THANKS, THRASH. @ANYWAY, THAT WAS A LONG TIME AGO. @IT DOESN'T BOTHER ME ANYMORE. @NOT A BIG DEAL. NOPE. @... @COME ON, LET'S GO SEE MR. MAGRI!
target: MILA ESKER, THRASH. @EDONOLA ERE, ASPALDIKO KONTUA DA. @DAGOENEKO EZ DIT ENBARAZURIK EGITEN. @EZ DU GARRANTZIARIK . EZ HORIXE. @... @TIRA, GOAZEN MAGRI JAUNARENGANA!

source: OH, HELLO AGAIN, SPLAT... @NICE HAT, SPLAT. STILL TRYING THE WHOLE MAGIC THING?
target: OH, KAIXO BERRIZ, ZPLAT... @TXAPEL POLITA, ZPLAT. ORAINDIK MAGIA KONTUETAN ZABILTZA?

source: I'M NOT SO SURE... TAKE A CLOSER LOOK AT HER FACE...
target: EZ NAGO HAIN ZIUR... BEGIRATU BERE AURPEGIA HURBILETIK...

source: SEE YOU AROUND, SPLAT!
AT LEAST YOU HAVEN'T TURNED YOURSELF INTO A FROG YET.
target: ORAINDIK EZ DUZU ZURE BURUA IGEL BIHURTU, BEHINTZAT.

source: HEHEHEH

OH! MERVEILLEUX! @I CAN FEEL THE INSPIRATION! @AND... I CAN RESPOND TO THE QUESTION THAT YOU POSED TO ME BEFORE... @YES... THE ANSWER, IT IS SPARKING IN MY MIND! @THE WAY TO MOVE REN, MY DOG, IS... @REMIND HIM... THAT IT IS TIME FOR HIS NAP. @HE'LL WALK ON OVER TO TAKE A NAP NEXT TO ME.
target: OH! MERVEILLEUX! @INSPIRAZIOA SUMA DEZAKET! @ETA... LEHEN EGIN DIDAZUEN GALDERARI ERANTZUN DIEZAIOKET... @BAI... ERANTZUNA, DISTIRA DUT GOGOAN! @REN, NIRE TXAKURRA, MUGITZEKO MODUA DA... @GOGORARAZI IEZAIOZUE... BERE SIESTARAKO ORDUA DELA. @HANDIK ALDE EGIN ETA NIRE ONDORA ETORRIKO DA LOTARA.

source: DE RIEN!
HERE YOU GO, MR. MAGRI! A FRESH GREEN APPLE!
target: HEMENTXE DUZU, MAGRI JAUNA! SAGAR BERDE FRESKOA!

source: OH! THAT'S IT? @WELL... OK! WE'LL GIVE THAT A GO! @THANK YOU MR. MAGRI!
target: OH! HORI DA DENA? @TIRA... ONGI! PROBATUKO DUGU! ESKERRIK ASKO MAGRI JAUNA!

source: AN APPLE... WHAT SYMBOLISM THIS SIMPLE FRUIT POSSESSES.
target: SAGAR BAT... ZENBATERAINOKO SINBOLISMOA IZAN DEZAKEEN FRUTA ARRUNT BATEK.

source: I WONDER WHAT A DOG DOES ON ITS DAY OFF...? @IT CAN'T LIE AROUND, BECAUSE THAT'S ITS JOB.
target: TXAKURREK BERAIEN EGUN LIBREETAN ZER EGITEN OTE DUTE...? @ALFERKERIAN EGON EZ, HORI BAITA BERAIEN LANA.

source: ... @... @SO IT IS. @I SHALL SLEEP BY THE LAKESIDE. @IF THE DREAM IS A TRANSLATION OF WAKING LIFE... @THEN WAKING LIFE IS ALSO A TRANSLATION OF THE DREAM. AU REVOIR.
column4: BAI. @LAKUAREN INGURUAN EGINGO DUT LO. @AMETSA BIZITZEN DUGUNAREN ISLA BALDIN BADA... @ORDUAN BIZITZA BERA AMETSEN ISLA ERE BADA. AU REVOIR.

source: PHEW! AND THERE WE HAVE IT, DUDES! @A SHINY SPARKLY PORTAL!
target: FIU! ETA HEMENTXE DUGU, LAGUNAK! @ATARI DISTIRATSU BAT!

source: HEY THERE REN DOGGY! @UM... YOUR OWNER MR. MAGRI WANTED US TO REMIND YOU... @IT'S TIME FOR YOUR NAP!
target: KAIXO REN TXAKURTXOA! @EM... ZURE JABE MAGRI JAUNAK NAHI DU ZURI ESATEA... @ZURE SIESTA ORDUA DELA!

source: HANG ON THERE! @LOOKS LIKE YOU GOT UMBER'S RUBBOINKS BACK SAFE AND SOUND. @WELL DONE, YOU THREE! @NOW, I KNOW YOU'RE IN THE MIDDLE OF SOME IMPORTANT MISSION OR OTHER... @JUST REMEMBER NOT TO OVERDO THINGS!
target: EGON PIXKA BAT! @OKREREN BORRAGOINK GUZTIAK ONIK EKARRI DITUZUELA DIRUDI. @ONGI EGINA, HIRUKOTE! @ORAIN, BADAKIT ABENTURA OSO GARRANTZITSU BATEN ERDIAN ZAUDETELA... @EZ SAIATU GAUZA GEHIEGI EGITEN!

source: WELL EVEN THE PLUCKY SQUIRE MAY NEED SUPPORT FROM TIME TO TIME. @THE IMPORTANT THING IS THAT YOU KIDS LOOK OUT FOR EACH OTHER, OK?
target: TIRA, EZKUTARI AUSARTAK ERE BEHARKO DU TARTEKA LAGUNTZAREN BAT. @GARRANTZITSUENA ZUEK HIRUOK ELKARRI LAGUNTZEA DA, BAI?

source: TRIPLE... TROUBLE...?
OH... WELL... THEN... @GIVE HER MAJESTY MY REGARDS!
YOU'VE GOT IT, MRS. LIGHTBRUSH! @TRIPLE TROUBLE TAKES CARE OF EACH OTHER!
target: LASAI, PINTZELARGI ANDREA! @HIRUKO BIHURRIA BETI ELKARREKIN!

source: MUM, WE'LL BE OK! NOTHING JOT CAN'T HANDLE. YOU'VE READ HIS BOOKS!
target: AMA, EZ GARA GALDUKO! EZ DAGO JOTEK EZIN DUENIK. IRAKURRI DITUZU LIBURUAK!

source: WE'LL BE FINE, MUM! @GOTTA GO, WE'RE MEETING THE QUEEN!
target: ONGI EGONGO GARA, AMA! @ALDE EGIN BEHAR DUGU, ERREGINAREKIN ZITA DUGU!

source: WILL DO! LOVE YOU!
{150}HOLLO THERE!

MY RUBBOINKS! MY LITTLE ROUND PIGGIES! @THEY STARTED BEHAVING STRANGELY A DAY AGO... @ROLLING AROUND LIKE SQUISHY PINK BOWLING BALLS... @THEY BUSTED CLEAN OUT OF THE FARM! @WILL YOU FIND MY RUBBOINKS AND RETURN THEM TO ME?
target: NIRE BORRAGOINKAK! NIRE TXERRITXO BOROBILTXOAK! @ATZO NAHIKO ARRARO PORTATZEN HASI ZIREN... @BOLOTAKO BOLA ARROXAK BALIRA HASI ZIREN INGURUAN BIRAKA... @ETA BASERRITIK ALDE EGIN ZUTEN! @NIRE BORRAGOINKAK AURKITU ETA BUELTAN EKARRIKO ZENITUZKE?

source: UNCLE UMBER! WHAT'S GOING ON?
UNCLE, FINDING PIGGIES IS OUR SPECIALITY. @WELL, WE'VE NEVER DONE THAT BEFORE, ACTUALLY. BUT I'M SURE WE'LL BE GOOD AT IT!
target: OSABA, TXERRIAK AURKITZEA DA GURE ESPEZIALITATEA. @TIRA, EZ DUGU INOIZ EGIN, EGIA ESA. BAINA ZIUR NAGO ONGI MOLDATUKO GARELA!

source: YOU KNOW, EVERYTHING MOONBEARD TOLD US ON THE WAY HERE... IT'S REAL TRIPPY. @OUR WORLD IS... A LOCATION IN... A STORYBOOK...? @... @I'M HAVING A BIT OF A HARD TIME WRAPPING THE OLD NOGGIN AROUND IT, TO BE HONEST.
target: AIZUE, HONANTZ GENTOZELA ILARGIBIZARREK KONTATUTAKO GUZTIA... NAHIKO EROA DA, EZTA? @GURE MUNDUA... IPUIN... BATEKO KOKALEKUA...? @... @HORI DENA PROZESATZEA KOSTATZEN ARI ZAIT, EGIA ESAN.

source: HEY GANG! @THRASH IS RIGHT! IF YOU TRY CARRYING TINY YOU'LL SPRAIN... WELL, EVERYTHING! @NO, THIS IS A PLUCKY JOB. @JOT, I THINK THERE'S AN ITEM OUT THERE ON THE DESK THAT CAN HELP YOU... @WHY DON'T YOU JUMP OUT AND GO FIND IT? @MOONBEARD OUT!
target: AIZUE TALDE! @THRASH ZUZEN DAGO! ÑIMIÑO MUGITZEN SAIATUTA... MINA HARTUKO DUZUE! @EZ, AUSARDIA BEHAR DA LAN HONETARAKO. @JOT, MAHAIEAN LAGUNDU ZAITZAKEEN ZERBAIT DAGOELA USTE DUT... @ZERGATIK EZ ZARA BILA JOATEN? @ILARGIBIZARREK MOZTU!

source: NOW THAT'S A HEAVY FELLOW.
UMMMM... @I'M FLATTERED THAT YOU THINK WE'VE GOT THE UPPER BODY STRENGTH... BUT... @WE'RE NOT CARRYING THIS TINY DUDE AN INCH!
target: EEMMM... @HAIN INDARTSUAK GARELA PENTSATZEA ATSEGIN DUT... BAINA... @LAGUNTXO HAU EZ DUGU ZENTIMETRO ERDIA ERE MUGITUKO!

source: HUH... AN ITEM THAT COULD SHIFT THIS PIGGY... THAT'D BE SOMETHING...
target: HMM... TXERRITXO HAU MUGITUKO DUEN OBJEKTU BAT... ONGI LEGOKE...

source: HEYYY... IT'S TINY! HE'S THE SWEETEST RUBBOINK, BUT HE DOES SPEND A LOT OF TIME SLEEPING. @HE SHOULD BE IN HIS MUD BATH BACK AT UMBER'S FARM. LET'S CARRY HIM OVER THERE!
target: HARA! ÑIMIÑO DA! BORRAGOINK GOXOENA DA, BAINA DENBORA GEHIENA LO PASATZEN DU. @OSABA OKREREN BASERRIAN EGON BEHAR LUKE LOKATZ BAINUA HARTZEN. ERAMAN DEZAGUN HARANTZ!

source: SOUNDS LIKE WE'LL NEED TO FIND ONE OF THOSE SWIRLY GREEN PORTALS!
target: BADIRUDI ATARI BIRAKARI BERDE HORIETAKO BAT BILATU BEHARKO DUGULA!

source: HEY GANG! @THRASH IS RIGHT! IF YOU TRY CARRYING TINY YOU'LL SPRAIN... WELL, EVERYTHING! @NO, THIS IS A PLUCKY JOB. @JOT, THE TILT GAUNTLETS YOU GOT FROM THE DESK... WHY DON'T YOU TRY USING THEM? @MOONBEARD OUT!
target: AIZUE TALDE! @THRASH ZUZEN DAGO! ÑIMIÑO MUGITZEN SAIATUTA... MIN HARTUKO DUZUE! @EZ, AUSARDIA BEHAR DA LAN HONETARAKO. @JOT, ZERGATIK EZ ZARA SAIATZEN... MAHAITIK HARTU DITUZU OKERTZEKO ESKULARRUEKIN? @ILARGIBIZARREK MOZTU!

source: WE SPIED HIM ROLLING RIGHT BACK INTO HIS MUD BATH!
target: BERE LOKATZ BAINURA JIRA-BIRAKA NOLA ZETORREN IKUSI DUGU!

source: JOT DUDE, WELCOME BACK! @THE TINY PROBLEM GOT FIXED WHILE YOU WERE GONE!
target: JOT TXO, ONGI ETORRI! @ÑIMIÑOREN ARAZOA KANPOAN ZEUNDEN BITARTEAN MOLDATU DA!

source: SORRY YOU HAD TO TREK AROUND OUTSIDE FOR NOTHING...
target: SENTITZEN DUT KANPORA EZERTARAKO JOAN BEHAR IZATEA...

source: HELLO GANG! GOOD JOB ON GETTING THOSE PIGGIES BACK. @I'VE JUST ARRIVED AT THE CASTLE GATES! HEAD ON OVER!
target: KAIXO TALDE! LAN EDERRA EGIN DUZUE TXERRITXOAK BERRESKURATZEN. @GAZTELUKO ATERA AILEGATU BERRI NAIZ! ZATOZTE HONA!

source: WOOHOO! ALL MY PIGGIES ARE BACK SAFE AND SOUND! @VIOLET... VIOLET'S UNUSUAL-LOOKING FRIENDS... @THANK YOU!!!
target: UOOO! NIRE TXERRITXO GUZTIAK ONIK ITZULI DIRA! @VIOLET... VIOLETEN EZ-OHIKO LAGUNAK... @ESKERRIK ASKO!!!

source: AS A TOKEN OF MY APPRECIATION, PLEASE TAKE THIS.
target: NIRE ESKER ONAREN SEINALE MODUAN, HAR EZAZUE HAU.

source: NOW I CAN GO BACK TO FARMING ERASER DUST FROM MY LOVELY RUBBOINKS.
target: ORAIN NIRE BORRAGOINK MAITATUEI ESKER BORRAGOMA HAUTSA GARATZEN JARRAITU DEZAKET.

source: THINK NOTHING OF IT, UNCLE!
HEY JOT! @DON'T YOU WANT TO GIVE THOSE SOUPED-UP GAUNTLETS OF YOURS A WHIRL?
target: AIZU JOT! EZ DITUZU ESKULARRU BERRI ELEGANTE HORIEK PROBATU NAHI?

source: HEY JOT! @TIME TO TRY OUT THESE POWERED UP GAUNTLETS OF YOURS! @WALK UP TO THE BOOK AND PRESS {Action_BookInteract}. @YOU SHOULD BE ABLE TO ANGLE THINGS IN A WHOLE NEW WAY. @MOONBEARD OUT!
target: AIZU JOT! @PROBATU BEHARKO DITUZU LORTU BERRI DITUZUN ESKULARRU HORIEK
column4: EZTA?! @ZOAZ LIBURURANTZ ETA SAKATU {Action_BookInteract}. @GAUZAK MODU ERABAT BERRIAN OKERTZEKO GAI IZAN BEHAR ZENUKE. @ILARGIBIZARREK MOZTU!

source: PLEASE! WILL YOU FIND MY RUBBOINKS AND RETURN THEM TO ME?
target: NIRE BORRAGOINKAK AURKITU ETA BUELTAN EKARRIKO DITUZUE, MESEDEZ?

source: YOU FOUND ONE OF MY RUBBOINKS! BUT THERE ARE STILL MORE OUT THERE!
target: NIRE BORRAGOINK BAT AURKITU DUZUE! BAINA GEHIAGO DABILTZA ORAINDIK HOR ZEHAR!

source: AH, ANOTHER ONE OF MY RUBBOINKS! WHERE DID THESE RASCALS RUN OFF TO!
target: AH, NIRE BESTE BORRAGOINK BAT! NORA JOAN OTE DIRA URDE HAUEK!

source: EXCELLENT WORK PLUCKY SQUIRE! YOU'VE ALMOST FOUND ALL MY NAUGHTY RUBBOINKS!
target: LAN BIKAINA EZKUTARI AUSARTA! NIRE IA BORRAGOINK GUZTIAK AURKITU DITUZU!

source: THANK YOU SO MUCH PLUCKY SQUIRE! YOU'VE FOUND ALL MY RUBBOINKS!
target: MILA MILA ESKER EZKUTARI AUSARTA! NIRE BORRAGOINK GUZTIAK AURKITU DITUZU!

source: THANKS FOR BRINGING BACK MY PRECIOUS RUBBOINKS! @BUT THERE'S STILL ONE LEFT... @TINY IS A BIG LAD, I DON'T THINK YOU'LL BE ABLE TO PICK HIM UP
target: ESKERRIK ASKO NIRE BORRAGOINK MAITEAK BUELTAN EKARTZEAGATIK! @BAINA ORAINDIK BAT FALTA DA... @TXIKI NAHIKO HANDIA DA, EZ DUT USTE JASOTZEKO GAI IZANGO ZARENIK

source: TINY IS BACK IN HIS MUD BATH! @HAPPY AS A PIG IN... MUD!
target: ÑIMIÑO BERE LOKATZ BAINUAN DAGO BUELTAN! @TXERRI BAT LOKATZETAN BEZAIN... POZIK!

source: FRUIT IS THE KEY TO HEALTH AND HAPPINESS!
target: FRUTA DA OSASUN ETA ZORIONAREN GILTZA!

source: I'M GOING TO PICK SOME PAINT BRUSHES UP LATER TODAY. @BUYING NEW STATIONERY IS SO INVIGORATING!
target: GEROXEAGO PINTZEL BERRIAK EROSTERA JOANGO NAIZ. @EZ DAGO MATERIAL BERRIA EROSTEA BEZAIN GAUZA MOTIBAGARRIAGORIK!

source: A GOOD PAINTBRUSH IS A WONDERFUL FRIEND. @A WONDERFUL, BRISTLY FRIEND.
target: PINTZEL ONA LAGUN EDERRA DA. @LAGUN EDER ETA PUNTADUNA.

source: SHH. YOU HAVEN'T SEEN ME.
I LIKE TO MAKE MY ART WHEN NO-ONE'S LOOKING. @I HIDE IN THE TREES UNTIL I SPOT MY MOMENT.
target: NIRE ARTEA INOR BEGIRA EZ DAGOELA EGITEA GUSTATZEN ZAIT. @ZUHAITZ ARTEAN GORDETZEN NAIZ NIRE UNEA AILEGATU ARTE.

source: I SPEND MOST OF MY TIME HIDING IN TREES.
target: IA DENBORA GUZTIA ZUHAITZ ARTEAN EZKUTATURIK EMATEN DUT.

source: THE PLUCKY SQUIRE! WHAT AN... AN HONOUR!! @I'M SORRY IF I'M FUMBLING... I JUST... DON'T OFTEN RUN INTO CELEBRITIES!
target: EZKUTARI AUSARTA! HAU BAI... OHOREA!! @BARKATU NIRE URDURITASUNA... NIK... EZ DUT JENDE OSPETSUA ASKOTAN EZAGUTZEN!

source: HAVE YOU SEEN OUR PAINT FOUNTAIN? @SOMETIMES WHEN NO-ONE'S LOOKING I LIKE TO JUMP IN FOR A WALLOW.
target: IKUSI AL DUZUE GURE PINTURA ITURRIA? @BATZUTAN, INOR BEGIRA EZ DAGOENEAN, SALTO EGIN ETA BERTAN BAINATZEA GUSTATZEN ZAIT.

source: ANOTHER LOVELY DAY IN ARTIA CITY! @IT'S ALWAYS SO INSPIRING TO TAKE A WALK THROUGH ITS PAINT-SPLATTERED STREETS.
target: BESTE EGUN ZORAGARRI BAT ARTIA HIRIAN! @HAIN DA INSPIRAGARRIA BERTAKO PINTURAZ ZIPRIZTUNDUTAKO KALEETAN IBILTZEA.

source: THIS JUICE IS DELICIOUS. @WOULD PROBABLY MAKE QUITE A NICE PIGMENT, TOO.
target: ZUKU HAU OSO GOZOA DAGO. @ETA ZIURRENIK PIGMENTU ITZELA LITZATEKE.

source: I'M A VERY EARLY RISER. I DON'T LIKE TO MISS THAT BEAUTIFUL EARLY MORNING LIGHT.
target: NI OSO GOIZTIARRA NAIZ. EZ DUT GOIZEKO ARGI EDER HAU GALDU NAHI IZATEN.

source: I CALL THIS SCULPTURE... 'OVERGROUND'!
I HAVE 420 OTHER CONFIGURATIONS, YOU KNOW.
HELLO! I'M WORKING ON A SELF PORTRAIT. @IF YOU THINK ABOUT IT... @I'M REALLY THE ONLY ONE QUALIFIED TO DRAW A SELF PORTRAIT OF MYSELF.
target: KAIXO! AUTORRETRATU BAT EGITEN ARI NAIZ. @ONGI PENTSATZEN BADUZU... @NI NAIZ NIRE BURUAREN AUTORRETRATU BAT EGITEKO GAI DEN BAKARRA.

source: MY WORK IS A GAME. A VERY SERIOUS GAME.
target: NIRE LANA JOKO BAT DA. OSO JOKO SERIOA.

source: DO YOU LIKE MY FLOWERS? THEY FILL MY HEART WITH JOY. @ONLY ONE FLOWER CAN KNOW THE SPIRIT OF ANOTHER FLOWER.
target: NIRE LOREAK GUSTATZEN? NIRE BIHOTZA POZEZ BETETZEN DUTE. @LORE BATEK BAKARRIK EZAGUTU DEZAKE BESTE LORE BATEN ESPIRITUA.

source: I LIKE TO PAINT THESE FLOWERS. I PAINT THEM SO THEY WILL NOT DIE.
target: LOREAK PINTATZEA GUSTATZEN ZAIT. ZIMELDU EZ DAITEZEN PINTATZEN DITUT.

source: I PAINT WHATEVER PASSES THROUGH MY HEAD WITHOUT ANY OTHER CONSIDERATION.
target: NIRE BURUTIK PASATZEN ZAIDAN LEHENENGO GAUZA PINTATZEN DUT GEHIEGI PENTSATU GABE.

source: WHAT AM I READING? THE ADVENTURES OF THE PLUCKY SQUIRE, OF COURSE! @THE HOTTEST BOOKS IN ALL THE LAND. @I WISH I COULD MEET THAT PLUCKY SQUIRE ONE DAY.
target: ZER ARI NAIZEN IRAKURTZEN? EZKUTARI AUSARTAREN ABENTURAK, NOSKI! @GURE LURRALDEKO LIBURURIK HOBERENAK. @EGUNEN BATEAN EZKUTARI AUSARTA EZAGUTU NAHI NUKE.

source: I LIVE A PRETTY SERENE LIFE. @THAT'S PROBABLY WHY I ENJOY READING ABOUT EXCITING ADVENTURES SO MUCH.
target: OSO BIZI LASAIA DARAMAT. @HORREGATIK GUSTATUKO ZAIT HAINBESTE ABENTURA LIBURU ZIRRARAGARRIAK IRAKURTZEA.

source: I'M HAVING A LITTLE VACATION IN ARTIA. @ART IS NOURISHING FOR THE SOUL, I FIND.
target: ARTIARA OPORTXO BATZUK PASATZERA ETORRI NAIZ. @ARTEAK ARIMA BIZIBERRITZEN DU.

source: MAYBE ONE DAY I COULD MOVE HERE AND BECOME AN ARTIST. @I CAN'T REALLY DRAW, BUT I CAN FINGERPAINT.
target: AGIAN EGUNEN BATEAN HONA BIZITZERA ETORRI ETA ARTISTA BIHURTU NINTEKE. @BENETAN EZ DAKIT MARRAZTEN, BAINA ESKUEKIN PINTATU DEZAKET.

source: WHAT AM I DRAWING? @A GLISTENING FORM... WITH GLOSSY LIPS... A SKULL! A RIBCAGE! @IT IS...A BIRTHDAY CARD FOR MY FRIEND.
target: ZER ARI NAIZEN PINTATZEN? @ARGIZKO FORMA BAT... EZPAIN DISTIRATSUDUN... KASKEZUR BAT! ETA SAHIETSAK! @NIRE LAGUN BATENTZAKO... URTEBETETZE TXARTELA DA.

source: I ALWAYS TRY TO REMEMBER MY FRIEND'S BIRTHDAYS. @I WANT THEM TO FEEL APPRECIATED.
target: BETI SAIATZEN NAIZ LAGUNEN URTEBETETZEEZ GOGORATZEN. @PREZIATUAK SENTI DAITEZEN NAHI DUT.

source: I CAN REALLY RECOMMEND LIVING INSIDE A PUMPKIN. @IF YOU'RE HUNGRY YOU CAN JUST NIBBLE ON THE FURNITURE.
target: KALABAZA BATEN BARRUAN BIZITZEA BENETAN GOMENDATZEN DUT. @GOSETZEN HASIZ GERO, BETI DUZU ALTZARIREN BAT JATEKO AUKERA.

source: ARTIA IS MY FAVOURITE CITY IN ALL OF MOJO. @I AM A VERY VISUAL WORM, THOUGH.
target: ARTIA DA MOJO GUZTIKO NIRE HIRIRIK GOGOKOENA. @BEGIEI ATSEGIN EMATEA GUSTUKO DUT.

source: ARTIA IS A HOME FOR ALL KINDS OF #ARTISTS. @ME, I LIKE TO DRAW GAMES.
target: ARTIAN GISA GUZTIETAKO ARTISTAK #BIZI DIRA. @NIRI JOKOAK MARRAZTEA GUSTATZEN ZAIT.

source: DRAWINGS YOU CAN PLAY WITH... WHAT COULD BE MORE FUN?
target: JOLASERAKO ERABIL DITZAKEZUN PINTURAK... BA AL DAGO GAUZA HOBERIK?

source: I LOVE THIS LITTLE AREA OF THE TOWN. @MAYBE I'LL PAINT IT SOME DAY.
target: HERRIKO TXOKO TXIKI HAU ATSEGIN DUT. @BEHARBADA EGUNEN BATEAN PINTATU EGINGO DUT.

source: THE MORE I PAINT THE MORE I LIKE EVERYTHING.
target: GERO ETA GEHIAGO PINTATU, ORDUAN ETA GEHIAGO GUSTATZEN ZAIT DENA.

source: THE PLUCKY SQUIRE! HOW NICE TO SEE YOU HERE. @YOU KNOW, MANY PEOPLE COME HERE TO SEE MY SMILE. @I TRY NOT TO GET TOO SELF-CONSCIOUS ABOUT IT.
target: EZKUTARI AUSARTA! ZEINEN ATSEGINA ZU HEMEN IKUSTEA. @JENDE ASKO ETORTZEN DA HONA NIRE IRRIBARREA IKUSTERA, BADAKIZU? @GARRANTZI HANDIEGIRIK EZ EMATEN SAIATZEN NAIZ.

source: SOME PEOPLE SEEM TO HAVE A PROBLEM READING MY #MOOD. @I ASSURE YOU, I'M QUITE HAPPY!
target: BADIRUDI PERTSONA BATZUK EZIN DUTELA NIRE #UMOREA IGARRI. @BENETAN DIOTSUT, OSO ZORIONTSUA NAIZ!

source: THIS SEASON I'M GOING FOR VIVID COLOURS.
target: DENBORALDI HONETAN KOLORE BIZIAK ERABILIKO DITUT.

source: MY SISTER IS MORE TASTEFUL. ME, I LIKE TO DRESS BOLD! @{150}BOLD BOLD BOLD!{100}
target: NIRE AHIZPAK NIK BAINO GUSTU HOBEA DU. NIRI DEIGARRI JANZTEA GUSTATZEN ZAIT! @{150}DEIGARRI DEIGARRI!{100}

source: SORRY PLUCKY SQUIRE, THE QUEEN IS NOT QUITE READY TO SEE YOU YET. @PLEASE TAKE A LOOK AROUND THE TOWN WHILE YOU WAIT.
target: BARKATU EZKUTARI AUSARTA, ERREGINA EZ DAGO PREST ORAINDIK ZUREKIN ELKARTZEKO. @MESEDEZ, IBIL ZAITEZ HERRIAN ZEHAR ITXAROTEN DUZUN BITARTEAN.

source: MY JOB MOSTLY INVOLVES STANDING. @IN THAT SENSE, I FEEL SPIRITUAL KINSHIP WITH A TABLE
target: NIRE LANA ZUTIK EGOTEA DA, BATEZ ERE. @ZENTZU HORRETAN MAHAIAREKIN BAT EGITEN DUT ESPIRITUALKI.

source: I AM NOT HERE.
I WAS POSSIBLY HERE BEFORE. BUT NOW I AM DEFINITELY NOT. @ALTHOUGH I MAY BE HERE AGAIN SHORTLY.
target: BALITEKE LEHEN HEMEN EGOTEA. BAINA ORAIN EZ NAGO. @HALA ERE BALITEKE LASTER HEMEN EGOTEA.

source: WHAT DO I MEAN? I DO NOT MEAN ANYTHING. IT IS ALL A MYSTERY.
target: ZER ESAN NAHI DUDAN? EZ DUT EZER ESAN NAHI. DENA MISTERIO HUTSA DA.

source: I AM ENTRANCED BY THE MYSTERY OF THIS PYRAMID. @I HAVE BEEN STANDING HERE LOOKING AT IT FOR THREE DAYS STRAIGHT.
target: PIRAMIDE HONEN MISTERIOAK LILURATUTA NAUKA. @HIRU EGUN DARAMATZAT JARRAIAN HONI BEGIRA ZUTIK.

source: ... @IT IS SO... @... @BLUE
I WILL DO WATER - BEAUTIFUL BLUE WATER. @AND LILY PADS. I QUITE LIKE THOSE, TOO.
target: GUSTUKO DUT URA. UR URDINA ZORAGARRIA DA. @ETA NENUFAREAK. HORIEK ERE ATSEGIN DITUT.

source: MY WISH IS TO STAY ALWAYS LIKE THIS, LIVING QUIETLY IN A CORNER OF NATURE.
target: BETIRAKO EGON NAHI NUKE HORRELA, NATURAREN TXOKO BATEAN ISILIK BIZIZ.

source: OOOOOOOOOOHHHH! @WHAT A SCARY LOOKING SCULPTURE!
AAAAAAHHHHHHHHH! @REALLY, QUITE UNNERVING.
GAAAAAAAAAHHHHHH! @IT HASN'T GOT ANY LESS SCARY.
YOU'RE THE FAMOUS PLUCKY SQUIRE, AREN'T YOU? @I'D LOVE TO MAKE A THOUSAND PICTURES OF YOUR FACE.
target: ZU ZARA EZKUTARI AUSARTA, EZTA? @ZURE AURPEGIAREN EHUNDAKA ARGAZKI EGIN NAHI NITUZKE.

source: MY IDEA OF A GOOD PICTURE IS ONE THAT'S IN FOCUS AND OF A FAMOUS PERSON.
target: NIRE USTEZ, ARGAZKI BATEK ONA IZATEKO, FOKATUA EGON ETA OSPETSUREN BATEK AGERTU BEHAR DU.

source: I'M JUST A COPY OF THE GENUINE ARTICLE. @OR IS IT THE OTHER WAY AROUND? IT DOESN'T MATTER ANYWAY.
target: BEREZKO ARTIKULUAREN KOPIA BAINO EZ NAIZ. @EDO ALDERANTZIZ OTE ZEN?

source: I THINK IT'D BE TERRIFIC IF EVERYONE WAS ALIKE.
target: NIK USTE ZORAGARRIA LITZATEKEELA DENOK BERDINAK BAGINA.

source: I LIKE TO PAINT THE PEOPLE OF ARTIA. @I PAINT PEOPLE AS I THINK THEM, NOT AS I SEE THEM!
target: ARTIAKO JENDEA PINTATZEA GUSTATZEN ZAIT. @BEGIEKIN IKUSITAKOERAN ORDEZ, NIRE GOGOAN IKUSTEN DITUDAN MODUAN PINTATZEN DITUT!

source: IF I DON'T HAVE RED, I USE BLUE! @ACTUALLY... I REALLY LIKE BLUE.
target: GORRIRIK EZ BADUT, URDINA DARABILT! @EGIA ESATE ALDERA... BENETAN GUSTUKO DUT URDINA.

source: GO AND DO THINGS YOU CAN'T. THAT IS HOW YOU GET TO DO THEM.
target: ZOAZ ETA EGIN ITZAZU EGIN EZIN DITUZUN GAUZAK. HORRELA LORTUKO DUZU EGITEA.

source: I AM NOT A DOG.
LIKE I SAID... DEFINITELY NOT A DOG.
target: ESAN BEZALA... INONDIK ERE EZ NAIZ TXAKURRA.

source: I'M NOT A CAT, EITHER, IN CASE YOU WERE WONDERING.
target: KATUA ERE EZ NAIZ. ZALANTZARIK BAZENU.

source: GRRRAAWWWRRRR!
GRRRR. GRRRR. GRRRP!
CONGRATULATIONS! YOU HAVE MADE THE MOST WONDERFUL #DISCOVERY. @ME!
target: ZORIONAK! INOIZ EGINDAKO AURKIKUNTZARIK EDERRENA #EGIN DUZUE. @NI!

source: INTELLIGENCE WITHOUT AMBITION IS A BIRD WITHOUT WINGS.
target: ANBIZIORIK GABEKO INTELIGENTZIA HEGALIK GABEKO TXORIAREN PAREKOA DA.

source: DRAWING IS THE HONESTY OF THE ART. @THERE IS NO POSSIBILITY OF CHEATING. IT IS EITHER GOOD OR BAD.
target: PINTATZEA ARTEAREN ZINTZOTASUNA DA. @EZ DAGO TRANPA EGITEKO AUKERARIK. KOADRO BAT ONA DA EDO EZ DA ONA

source: I AM NOT STRANGE. I AM JUST NOT NORMAL.
target: EZ NAIZ ARRAROA. EZ NAIZ NORMALA, HORI DA DENA.

source: EACH MORNING WHEN I AWAKE, I EXPERIENCE AGAIN A SUPREME PLEASURE - THAT OF BEING ME.
target: GOIZERA JAIKITZEN NAIZENEAN, INOIZKO PLAZERIK HANDIEN SENTITZEN DU. NI IZATEA.

source: THE ONLY DIFFERENCE BETWEEN ME AND A MADMAN IS THAT I'M NOT MAD.
target: ERO BATEN ETA NIRE ARTEKO DESBERDINTASUN BAKARRA DA NI EZ NAGOELA EROA.

source: THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN FALSE MEMORIES AND TRUE ONES IS THE SAME AS FOR JEWELS. @IT IS ALWAYS THE FALSE ONES THAT LOOK THE MOST REAL, THE MOST BRILLIANT.
target: EGIAZKO ETA GEZURREZKO OROITZAPENAK HARRIBITXIAK BEZALA DIRA. @GEZURREZKOAK DIRUDITE ERREALENAK ETA DISTIRATSUENAK.

source: THE ONE THING THE WORLD WILL NEVER HAVE ENOUGH OF IS THE OUTRAGEOUS.
target: MUNDUAN INOIZ GEHIEGI IZANGO EZ DUGUNA ESKANDALUGARRIA DENA DA.

source: THE THERMOMETER OF SUCCESS IS MERELY THE JEALOUSY OF THE MALCONTENTS.
target: ARRAKASTAREN TERMOMETROA INOIZ POZIK EZ DAUDENEN INBIDIA BESTERIK EZ DA.

source: I SEATED UGLINESS ON MY KNEE, AND ALMOST IMMEDIATELY GREW TIRED OF IT.
target: ITSUSITASUNA NIRE ALTZOAN HARTU NUEN, ETA BEREHALA ASPERTU NINDUEN.

source: THOSE WHO DO NOT WANT TO IMITATE ANYTHING, PRODUCE NOTHING.
target: EZER IMITATU NAHI EZ DUTENEK EZ DUTE EZER SORTUKO.

source: THE SECRET OF MY INFLUENCE HAS ALWAYS BEEN THAT IT REMAINED SECRET.
target: NIRE INFLUENTZIAREN SEKRETUA DA BETI GORDE IZAN DUDALA SEKRETUAN.

source: I'VE SEEN YOU IN PICTURE BOOKS... YOU'RE JOT, THE PLUCKY SQUIRE, AREN'T YOU? @I'M PRETTY PLUCKY MYSELF! @MY MUM SAYS I'M A MISCHIEF-MAKER, BUT I DON'T SEE IT THAT WAY.
target: MARRAZKI LIBURUETAN IKUSI IZAN ZAITUT... ZU JOT ZARA, EZKUTARI AUSARTA, EZTA? @NI ERE OSO AUSARTA NAIZ! @NIRE AMAK BALDAR SAMARRA NAIZELA DIO, BAINA NIRI EZ ZAIT HALA IRUDITZEN.

source: I'M GOING TO TELL MY MUM I RAN INTO JOT, THE PLUCKY SQUIRE! @HOPE SHE BELIEVES ME...
target: BANOA NIRE AMARI KONTATZERA EZKUTARI AUSARTAREKIN AURKITU NAIZELA! @SINESTEA ESPERO DUT...

source: I JUST LOVE PAINTING BUTTERFLIES! @DO YOU THINK THEY'RE REALLY MADE OUT OF BUTTER?
target: TXIMELETAK PINTATZEA MAITE DUT! @ERRAZAGOA LITZATEKE GELDIRIK BALEUDE!

source: MY POPS LOVES HIS RUBBOINKS. @HE'S SHY ABOUT IT, BUT I KNOW HE LIKES TO PAINT THEIR PORTRAITS.
target: NIRE AITAK BERE BORRAGOINKAK MAITE DITU. @LOTSA EMATEN DIO, BAINA BADAKIT BERAIEN ERRETRATUAK PINTATZEN DITUELA.

source: THE SUNFLOWERS ARE BEAUTIFUL. @IF YOU TRULY LOVE NATURE, YOU WILL FIND BEAUTY EVERYWHERE.
target: EKILOREAK OSO EDERRAK DIRA. @NATURA BENETAN MAITE BADUZU, EDONON AURKITUKO DUZU EDERTASUNA.

source: A NEW PAINTING CAN BE A LITTLE DAUNTING. @THE BEGINNING IS PERHAPS MORE DIFFICULT THAN ANYTHING ELSE... @BUT KEEP HEART, IT WILL TURN OUT ALL RIGHT.
target: KOADRO BERRI BATEKIN HASTEAK BATZUTAN BELDURRA EMATEN DU. @GAINONTZEKO GUZTIA BAINO ZAILAGOA IZAN DAITEKE HASIERA... @BAINA SINETS EZAZU, AZKENEAN DENA ONGI ATERAKO DA.

source: EVERYTHING LOOKS BETTER COVERED IN DOTS. @I'M TRYING TO COVER ARTIA IN DOTS... BUT THE GROUNDSKEEPER WON'T LET ME.
target: DENAK ITXURA HOBEA DU TANTOZ ESTALTZEN BADA. @ARTIA GUZTIA TANTOZ ESTALTZEN SAIATZEN ARI NAIZ... BAINA ZAINDARIAK EZ DIT UTZIKO.

source: HAVE YOU EVER CONSIDERED COVERING YOURSELF IN DOTS?
target: INOIZ PENTSATU AL DUZU ZURE BURUA TANTOZ ESTALTZEA?

source: SORRY PLUCKY SQUIRE! WE'RE AREN'T QUITE READY TO SEE YOU YET. @PLEASE TAKE A LOOK AROUND TOWN WHILE YOU WAIT.
target: BARKATU EZKUTARI AUSARTA! EZ GAUDE ZU IKUSTEKO PREST ORAINDIK. @EMAN EZAZU HERRIAN BUELTA BAT ZAIN ZAUDEN BITARTEAN.

source: WORD FROM THE PALACE IS THAT THE QUEEN IS READY TO SEE YOU NOW!
target: PALAZIOTIK ESAN DIGUTE ERREGINA ZUEK IKUSTEKO PREST DAGOELA!

source: HEY, PLUCKY SQUIRE!
PLUCKY SQUIRE, MY PA'S IN A SPOT OF BOTHER... COULD YOU HELP HIM? @OUR FARMHOUSE IS DOWN THIS STREET TO THE LEFT!
target: EZKUTARI AUSARTA, NIRE AITA ESTUASUN BATEAN DAGO... ETOR ZAITEZKE LAGUNTZERA? @GURE BASERRIA KALE HONETAN BEHERA EZKER ALDEAN DAGO!

source: WOAH DUDE, SO YOU REALLY CAN JUMP IN AND OUT OF OUR WORLD...
target: UAU TXO! BENETAN GURE MUNDUTIK SARTU-IRTEN JAUZIAK EGIN DITZAKEZU...

source: BANGER! LET'S GO!
YOUNG ADVENTURERS! GOOD TO SEE YOU ALL TOGETHER!
target: GAZTE ABENTURAZALEOK! ZEINEN ONGI ELKARREKIN IKUSTEA!

source: BETTER COMB YOUR HAIR AND STRAIGHTEN YOUR POCKET SQUARES... WE'RE ABOUT TO MEET ROYALTY!
target: ILEA ORRAZTU ETA ARROPA LIXATZEA KOMENI... ERREGINA IKUSTERA GOAZ!

source: OH, FYI... QUEEN CHROMA KNOWS ALL ABOUT... THE BOOKISH REALITIES OF OUR LAND. @DON'T WORRY ABOUT BLOWING HER MIND... SHE KNOWS THE SCORE. @LET'S GO SEE HER!
target: OH, JAKIN DEZAZUEN... KROMA ERREGINAK BADAKI... GURE LIBURUAREN ERREALITATE KONTU GUZTIA. @EZ DA ZUEN KONTUEKIN HARRITUKO... BADAKIZKI NONDIK-NORAKOAK. @GOAZEN BEREGANA!

source: GREETINGS, ESTEEMED VISITORS! @QUEEN CHROMA WILL GLADLY SEE YOU NOW.
target: ONGI ETORRI, BISITARI ESTIMATUOK! @KROMA ERREGINA ZUEKIN ELKARTZEKO GOGOZ DAGO.

source: HEY THERE! GLAD YOU'RE ALL IN GOOD SHAPE!
target: KAIXO! POZGARRIA DA ONGI ZAUDETELA IKUSTEA!

source: THE QUEEN IS ON THE CASTLE BALCONY. @I WILL LEAD YOU THERE.
target: ERREGINA GAZTELUKO BALKOIAN DAGO. @BERTARA GIDATUKO ZAITUZTET.

source: THIS ENTRANCE IS CLOSED. @YOU MAY ADMIRE THE FABRIC OF THIS CURTAIN, HOWEVER.
target: SARRERA HAU ITXITA DAGO. @BAINA GORTINETAKO EHUNA MIRETSI DEZAKEZUE.

source: SORRY, YOU'RE NOT ALLOWED PAST THIS POINT. @RULES OF THE CASTLE!
target: SENTITZEN DUT, EZIN DUZU PUNTU HAU IGARO. @GAZTELUKO ARAUAK!

source: ARTIA CASTLE RECEIVES YOUR VISIT WITH THE SINCEREST HOSPITALITY. @IF YOU HAVE THE TIME, PLEASE VIEW OUR EXTENSIVE ART COLLECTION. @WE HAVE A VERY NICE PAINTING OF A BAT.
target: ARTIAKO GAZTELUAK ZURE BISITA ZINEZ ABEGIKOR HARTZEN DU. @ASTIRIK IZANGO BAZENU, IKUS EZAZU GURE ARTE ERAKUSKETA ZABALA. @SAGUZAR BATEN KOADRO ZORAGARRIA DUGU.

source: I HEAR HUMGRUMP IS UP TO SOMETHING...
target: PETRALTZAR ZERBAIT PRESTATZEN ARI DELA ENTZUN DUT...

source: HE'LL NEVER EVEN GET CLOSE ENOUGH TO SET HIS BEADY EYES ON IT... @NOT WHILE THE ARTIAN GUARD IS STILL STANDING!
target: EZ DA INOIZ HONA HURBILDU ERE EGINGO... @ARTIAKO ZAINDARIEK ZUTIK DIRAUGUN BITARTEAN EZ BEHINTZAT!

source: I HEARD IT ALL KICKED OFF AT TOME TOWER... @NO SURPRISE... THERE'S SOMETHING ABOUT THAT GIANT OWL THAT GIVES ME THE WILLIES.
target: HAU DENA LIBURUKI DORREAN HASI ZELA ENTZUN DUT... @EZ NAU HARRITZEN... ZIPITZIK ERE GUSTATZEN EZ ZAIDAN ZERBAIT DU HONTZ ERRALDOI HORREK.

source: THE QUEEN HAS ORDERED US TO INCREASE OUR DRILLS. @THERE'S A BIT OF BAD BUSINESS AFOOT. @I'M INCREASING MY SPINACH INTAKE FROM ONE CAN A DAY TO THIRTY.
target: ERREGINAK GOGORRAGO ENTRENATU BEHAR DUGULA AGINDU DIGU. @GAUZA TXARRAK GERTATUKO DIRA. @NIRE EGUNEROKO ZIAZERBA JANALDIA HANDITUKO DUT, POTO BATETIK HOGEITA HAMARRERA.

source: NO GUESTS BEYOND THIS POINT! @SORRY, NOT EVEN YOU, PLUCKY SQUIRE!
target: GONBIDATUAK EZIN DIRA HEMENDIK IGARO. @SENTITZEN DUT, EZTA ZU ERE, EZKUTARI AUSARTA!

source: HER MAJESTY THE QUEEN IS WAITING FOR YOU ON THE BALCONY. @PLEASE ASCEND THE STAIRCASE BEYOND THIS DOORWAY.
target: ERREGINA OHORAGARRIA BALKOIAN DAGO ZUEN ZAIN. @IGO ZAITEZTE SARRERA HONEN ONDOREN DAUDEN ESKAILERETATIK.

source: THE PLUCKY SQUIRE!! @I'VE READ ALL YOUR BOOKS! THEY'RE JUST THE MOST... @AHEM... @PLEASE CONTINUE ON YOUR WAY, DISTINGUISHED VISITORS.
target: EZKUTARI AUSARTA!! @ZURE LIBURU GUZTIAK IRAKURRI DITUT! HAIN DIRA... @EJEM... @MESEDEZ, JARRAITU ZUEN BIDETIK, BISITARI AGURGARRIAK.

source: THAT GRUMP HAS ALWAYS HAD DESIGNS ON THIS THRONE.
target: PETRAL HORREK BETI BEREGANATU NAHI IZAN DU TRONU HAU.

source: WOULD YOU LOOK AT THAT... THE QUEEN'S THRONE! @I HAVE ENCOUNTERED A LOT OF CHAIRS... @BUT THAT IS THE FANCIEST ONE I'VE EVER SEEN...
target: IKUDI AL DUZUE... ERREGINAREN TRONUA! @AULKI ASKO IKUSI DITUT NIRE BIZITZA OSOAN... @BAINA HAU BEZAIN ELEGANTERIK INOIZ EZ!

source: GREETINGS, HEROES. @THE QUEEN IS ON THE CASTLE'S BALCONY WAITING TO MEET WITH YOU. BEST NOT KEEP HER WAITING.
target: ONGI ETORRI, HEROIAK. @ERREGINA ZUEKIN ELKARTZEKO ZAIN DAGO GAZTELUKO BALKOIAN. HOBE DUZUE ZAIN EZ EDUKITZEA.

source: HALT! @THE QUEEN DOESN'T ALLOW VISITORS TO PROCEED THROUGH THIS DOORWAY.
target: GELDI! @ERREGINAK EZ DIE BISITARIEI ATE HONETATIK AURREAR JARRAITZEN.

source: INDEED IT IS, YOUR HIGHNESS. #WITH SOME NEW GREASY TRICKS. @HE HAS A NEW KIND OF METAMAGIC THAT CAN ALLOW PASSAGE IN AND OUT OF OUR BOOK. @HUMGRUMP MAY USE THIS MAGIC TO GAIN POWER OVER OUR LAND. @HE COULD CHANGE THE STORY OF OUR BOOK... FOR THE WORSE! @IF THE STORY GETS WORSE, OUR BOOK COULD BE... PUT AWAY, ON THE SHELF. @IF THAT HAPPENED, THE LIFE FORCE OF THIS LAND WOULD BE UTTERLY DIMINISHED.
target: HALA DA BAI, GORENTASUN. #TRIKIMAILU ZIKIN BERRIEKIN. @GURE LIBURUAN SARTU-IRTEN IBILTZEKO METAMAGIA MOTA BERRI BAT DAUKA. @PETRALTZARREK GURE LURRALDEAREN GAINEAN BOTEREA LORTZEKO ERABILIKO DU. @LIBURUAREN ISTORIOA ALDA LEZAKE... OKERRERA! @ISTORIOAK OKERRERA EGITEN BADU, GURE LIBURUAK... APALEAN BUKA LEZAKE. @HORI GERTATUZ GERO, LURRALDE HONEN BIZI-INDARRA ERABAT MURRIZTUTA GERATUKO LITZATEKE.

source: JOT AND THRASH... THEY'LL GO LOCATE HUMGRUMP AND ATTEMPT TO STOP ANY TROUBLE HE'S BREWING. @VIOLET AND I WILL BEGIN WORK ON A MAGIC TO COUNTER HUMGRUMP'S METAMAGIC.
target: JOT ETA THRASH... PETRALTZARREN BILA JOAN ETA ESKU ARTEAN DUEN PLANA GELDITZEN SAIATUKO DIRA. @VIOLET ETA NI PETRALTZARREN MAGIARI AURRE EGINGO DION MAGIA LANTZEN HASIKO GARA.

source: THE STORY OF OUR LIVES WOULD BE FROZEN FOREVER IN A MOST MISERABLE WAY. @WE CANNOT ALLOW THIS TO HAPPEN!
target: GURE BIZITZEN ISTORIOA MODU MISERABLEAN IZOZTUKO LITZATEKE BETIRAKO. @EZIN DUGU HORI GERTATZEA ONARTU!

source: YES, VIOLET, MY GIRL! @WHAT, YOU DON'T THINK YOU'RE CAPABLE? YOUR TALENT IS ESSENTIAL! @VIOLET, THRASH! YOU MUST HAVE MORE FAITH IN YOUR OWN ABILITIES! @WE ARE ALL GOING TO HAVE TO STEP UP IF WE WISH TO STOP HUMGRUMP!
target: BAI, VIOLET, NIRE NESKATOA! @ZER, EZ DUZU USTE GAI ZARENIK? @ZURE TALENTUA FUNTSEZKOA DA! @VIOLET, THRASH! ZUEN BURUAN GEHIAGO SINETSI BEHAR DUZUE! @GUZTIOK EMAN BEHAR DUGU PAUSUA AURRERANTZ PETRALTZAR GELDIARAZI NAHI BADUGU!

source: MOONBEARD! HOW LOVELY TO SEE YOU AGAIN! @VIOLET, THRASH, PIP... I'M SO HAPPY YOU CAME. @AND JOT... AS ALWAYS... THIS LAND IS INDEBTED TO YOUR BRAVERY AND HEROISM. @THANK YOU FOR ALL THAT YOU HAVE DONE. @MOONBEARD, WHAT CAN YOU TELL ME OF THIS LATEST KERFUFFLE? @IT'S THAT MISCHIEVOUS HUMGRUMP AGAIN, ISN'T IT?
target: ILARGIBIZAR! ZEINEN POZGARRIA ZU BERRIRO IKUSTEA! @VIOLET, THRASH, PIP... POZTEN NAIZ ETORRI IZANAZ. @ETA JOT... NOLA EZ... MOJO ZUREKIN ZORRETAN DAGO ZURE AUSARDIA ETA BALENTRIENGATIK. @ESKERRIK ASKO EGIN DUZUN GUZTIAGATIK. @ILARGIBIZAR, ZER KONTA DIEZADAKEZU AZKEN NAHASTE-BORRASTE HONI BURUZ? @PETRALTZARREN GAIZTAKERIAREN BAT BERRIZ, EZTA?

source: HMMPH! YOU WERE ALWAYS WORRIED THAT HUMGRUMP WOULD DISCOVER THE TRUE NATURE OF MOJO... @AND THAT HE MIGHT USE THAT KNOWLEDGE TO MAGNIFY HIS POWERS.
target: HMMPH! BETI ARDURATU IZAN ZAITU PETRALTZARREK MOJOREN BENETAKO IZAERA EZAGUTZEAK... @ETA EZAGUTZA HORI BERE BOTEREAK AREAGOTZKEO ERABILI AHAL IZATEAK.

source: INDEED WE CAN'T! @MOONBEARD, OLD FRIEND... WHAT CAN BE DONE?
target: NOSKI EZETZ! @ILARGIBIZAR, LAGUN ZAHARRA... ZER EGIN DEZAKEGU?

source: OH, HERE WE GO!
WHOAAHH WHAT A BANGING VIEW! @LOOK... THAT GNARLY MOUNTAIN OVER THERE... THAT'S TRARRG MOUNTAIN, DUDES... MY HUMBLE HOMELAND!
target: UUAAUUU... A ZER BISTA ZORAGARRIA! @BEGIRA, HORKO MENDI IZUGARRI HORI... TRARRG MENDIA DA, LAGUNAK. NIRE SORTERRIA!

source: SOMETHING GOING ON AT TRARRG??
WAIT... WHAT'S THIS?
M... ME? @HELP... YOU...?
WHAT WAS #{150}HAPPENING{100} #IN HIS #{150}HOMELAND?{100}
THRASH #LOOKED #ON IN #{150}SHOCK...{100}
LET'S TAKE THESE TILT GAUNTLETS FOR A SPIN! YOU SHOULD BE ABLE TO TILT THE BOOK ITSELF WITH {Axis_TiltBook_Negative} {Axis_TiltBook_Positive}.
target: EMAN OKERTZEKO ESKULARRU HORIEI BUELTA BAT! @LIBURUA BERA OKERTZEKO GAI IZAN BEHAR ZENUKE {Axis_TiltBook_Negative} {Axis_TiltBook_Positive} ERABILIZ.

source: LOOK AT THAT! @TINY IS BACK WHERE HE BELONGS! @HEAD BACK INTO THE BOOK TO CHECK IN WITH THE GANG.
target: BEGIRA HORI! @ÑIMIÑO DAGOKION LEKURA ITZULI DA! @SARTU BERRIZ LIBURURA ZURE TALDEAREKIN ELKARTZEKO.

source: TEN RUBBOINKS REMAINING! @YOU FOUND ONE!
NINE RUBBOINKS REMAINING! @GOOD GOING!
EIGHT RUBBOINKS REMAINING! @IT'S SO NICE TO SEE MY PIGGIES AGAIN...
target: ZORTZI BORRAGOINK FALTAN! @POLITA DA NIRE TXERRITXOAK BERRIZ IKUSTEA...

source: SEVEN RUBBOINKS REMAINING! @A HAPPY RUBBOINK IS A WONDERFUL SIGHT!
target: ZAZPI BORRAGOINK FALTAN! @BORRAGOINK ZORIONTSU BAT IKUSKIZUN EDERRA DA!

source: SIX RUBBOINKS REMAINING! @THIS ONE LOOKS HAPPY TO BE BACK!
target: SEI BORRAGOINK FALTAN! @BUELTAN ETORTZEAZ POZTEN DA HAU!

source: FIVE RUBBOINKS REMAINING! @WELCOME BACK, LITTLE PIGGY!
target: BOST BORRAGOINK FALTAN! @ONGI ETORRI BUELTAN, TXERRITXO!

source: FOUR RUBBOINKS REMAINING! @MARVELLOUS ROUNDING UP!
target: LAU BORRAGOINK FALTAN! @IZUGARRI ONGI ARI ZARA!

source: THREE RUBBOINKS REMAINING! @YOU'RE GETTING THERE!
TWO RUBBOINKS REMAINING! @IT'S GETTING LIVELIER IN UMBER FARM!
target: BI BORRAGOINK FALTAN! @OKREREN BASERRIA GAINEZKA DAGO!

source: ONE RUBBOINK REMAINING! @THAT'S NEARLY ALL OF THEM!
HEY! UNCLE UMBER LIVES UP THIS STREET!
target: AIZUE! OSABA OKRE KALE HONETAN BIZI DA!

source: HEY CHUCK. @THE ITEM YOU NEED IS IN THE ATTIC OF THE HOUSE UP THERE. @NICE PLACE. DESIRABLE WINDOW SILL LOCATION. @PROPERTY TAX MUST BE ASTRONOMICAL.
target: EH TXIKITO. @BEHAR DUZUN OBJEKTUA HOR GOIKO ETXEKO SOTOAN DAGO. @LEKU POLITA DA. ONDO JARRITAKO LEIHO ERTZAK. @JABETZA ZERGA IZUGARRIA IZANGO DA.

source: ALRIGHT THERE. @THE HOUSE'S DOOR IS LOCKED, SO YOU'LL NEED TO FIND A KEY. @DON'T TRY AND BREAK IN, IT NEVER LOOKS DIGNIFIED.
target: EDERKI BA. @ETXEKO ATEA ITXITA DAGO, GILTZA BAT AURKITU BEHARKO DUZU. @EZ SAIATU MODU TXARREAN SARTZEN, OSO ITSUSIA DA.

source: WELCOME. MAKE YOURSELF AT HOME. @ ALSO, HIT FURNITURE. @WHO KNOWS WHAT USEFUL THINGS YOU MIGHT SHAKE OUT.
target: ONGI ETORRI. JAR ZAITEZ EROSO. @ETA JO ITZAZU ALTZARIAK. @NORK DAKI ZEIN GAUZA ERABILGARRI AURKI DEZAKEZUN?

source: THERE ARE TEN OF THEM!
THERE ARE NINE OF THEM!
THERE ARE EIGHT OF THEM!
THERE ARE SEVEN OF THEM!
THERE ARE SIX OF THEM!
THERE ARE FIVE OF THEM!
THERE ARE FOUR OF THEM!
THERE ARE THREE OF THEM!
HEY, DON'T GO WANDERING INTO RESTRICTED AREAS! @THEY'LL MAKE ME DO 1000 PUSHUPS AGAIN!
target: AIZU, EZ SARTU DEBEKATUTAKO LEKUETAN! @BERRIZ DERRIGORTUKO NAUTE 1000 FLEXIO EGITERA!

source: CHAPTER SIX
VERY METAL
TRARRG MOUNTAIN
OUR HEROES REFLECTED UPON THIS RATHER {150}EXPLOSIVE DEVELOPMENT...
target: GURE HEROIEK {150}GERTAERA LEHERKOR{100} HONEN INGURUAN HAUSNARTU ZUTEN...

source: AND DECIDED THAT JOT AND THRASH SHOULD INVESTIGATE {150}AT ONCE.
target: ETA ERABAKI ZUTEN JOT ETA THRASEK HORI IKERTU BEHAR ZUTELA {150}BEREHALA.

source: AFTER A BRACING TREK ACROSS THE WILDS OF MOJO, JOT AND THRASH ARRIVED...
target: MOJOKO LURRETAN ZEHAR EGINDAKO BIDAIA BIZIGARRIAREN ONDOREN, JOT ETA THRASH AILEGATU ZIREN...

source: AT {200}TRARRG MOUNTAIN!
ASCENDING TO THE {175}TOP
OF ALL THIS BOTHER.
TO GET TO THE {175}BOTTOM
THEY PROCEEDED TO {200}SCALE {100}ITS {200}SLOPES
AFTER A GOOD CLIMB THEY ARRIVED#{80}...AT A {150}LOFTY PLATEAU
target: ESKALADA EDER BATEN ONDOREN#{80}... {150}LAUTADA GARAIRA {80}AILEGATU ZIREN

source: AHHH... BACK AT A NORMAL ELEVATION. FEELS GOOD DUDE! @LET'S PRESS ON TO MY VILLAGE, IT'S STILL A WAYS UP THESE SLOPES.
target: AHHH... ALTUERA NORMALERA BUELTA. HORRELA BAI ONGI, TXO! @GOAZEN NIRE HERRIRANTZ, ORAINDIK GEHIXEAGO IGO BEHAR DUGU.

source: GREETINGS, MATE!
BAD BUSINESS! MEN WITH POINTY STICKS! BIG MACHINES! @ALL AT THE TOP OF THE MOUNTAIN... @AT YOUR VILLAGE!
target: KONTU TXARRAK! JENDEA MAKIL ZORROTZEKIN! MAKINA HANDIAK! @DENAK MENDI TONTORREAN DAUDE... @ZURE HERRIAN!

source: LITTLE BUDDY, WHAT'S BEEN GOING ON AT TRARRG?
target: LAGUNTXO, ZER ARI DA GERTATZEN TRARRGEN?

source: THANKS BUNNY DUDE. WE'RE HEADING THAT WAY!
target: ESKERRIK ASKO, MOTEL. HARA ALDERA GOAZ!

source: HEY YO, IT'S A ROCK BUNNY!
HMM... BLOCKED! @AND IT WAS GOING SO SMOOTHLY...
DUDE, YOU NEVER FAIL TO IMPRESS.
target: TXO, BETI AURKITZEN DUZU NI HARRITZEKO MODUA.

source: HELLO... HELLO?

STRONG RUNETOOTH COVERAGE ON THE MOUNTAIN, IT SEEMS. I'M GETTING FOUR BARS! @LOOKS LIKE THERE ARE EXPLOSIVE CANNON PORTALS IN THESE PARTS. @HANDY FOR LAUNCHING YOU PLACES, JOT. @GO NOW... LAUNCH YOUR BODY! BE A CANNON BALL! @MOONBEARD OUT.
target: MENDIAN BLUTUZ ESTALDURA ONA DAGOELA DIRUDI. LAU BARRA DITUT! @BADIRUDI INGURUAN ATARI KANOI LEHERGAILUAK DAUDELA. @ZUEK LEKUETARA BOTATZEKO EGOKIAK, JOT. @TIRA... EGIN TIRO! IZAN KANOI-BOLA! @ILARGIBIZARREK MOZTU.

source: HEY MOONBEARD!
IS... IS THAT YOU, THRASH... ? @BY TRARRG, IT HAS BEEN MANY A YEAR...
target: ZU... ZU AL ZARA, THRASH...? @TRARRGEN IZENEAN, DENBORA ASKO IGARO DA...

source: HUMGRUMP'S TROOPS... THEY HIT US WITH A SNEAK ATTACK! @THEY BLASTED THE MOUNTAIN TOP AND NOW THEY'RE MINING OUR METAL UP THERE... @I TRIED TO DEFEND THE VILLAGE... THE TROOPS GRABBED ME AND THREW ME DOWN HERE. @IT TOOK TWENTY OF 'EM THOUGH, LAD! OLD KRONG BUSTED MANY A HEAD... @THRASH... BOY... THEY'VE IMPRISONED THE VILLAGERS... YOUR PARENTS... @IT'S UP TO YOU NOW TO SAVE THEM!
target: PETRALTZARREN ARMADA... EZUSTEAN ERASO DIGUTE! @MENDI TONTORRA LEHERRARAZI ZUTEN ETA HAN DAUDE ORAIN, GURE METALA ATERATZEN... @HERRIA BABESTEN SAIATU NINTZEN... ARMADAKOEK HARTU ETA HONA BEHERA BOTA NINDUTEN. @HOGEI LAGUN BEHAR IZAN ZITUZTEN, GAZTE! KRONG ZAHARRAK BURU ASKO ZAPALDU ZITUEN... @THRASH... SEME... HERRIKIDEAK PRESO HARTU DITUZTE... ZURE GURASOAK... @ZURE ESKU DAGO BERAIEK SALBATZEA!

source: NEPHEW... CAN'T YOU SEE THE CRATER OVER THERE? I HIT THE GROUND PRETTY HARD, Y'KNOW. @NOPE, THE END IS NEAR FOR ME... IT'S TIME FOR ME TO ASCEND... TO TROLLHALLA. @LISTEN TO ME. @AS A YOUNG ONE, YOU SHIED AWAY FROM THE WAY... OF THE METAL WARRIOR. @BUT... YOUR PARENTS AND I... WE ALWAYS SAW POTENTIAL IN YOU.
target: ILOBA... EZ AL DUZU HORKO KRATER HORI IKUSTEN? LURRAREN KONTRA KOLPE HANDI HARTU DUT. @EZ, NIRE BUKAERA HURBIL DAGO... @BADA GARAIA JOAN NADIN... TROLLHALLARA. @ENTZUIDAZU. @GAZTEA ZINENEAN, ZURE PATUARI UKO EGIN ZENION... METAL GERLARIA IZATEARI. @BAINA... ZURE GURASOAK ETA NIK... BETI IKUSI DIZUGU POTENTZIALA.

source: THRASH... TRARRG NEEDS YOU... TO HARNESS THAT POTENTIAL. @I KNOW... YOU... CAN DO IT...
target: THRASH... TRARRGEK BEHAR DU... ZURE POTENTZIALA USTIATZEA. @BADAKIT... EGIN... DEZAKEZULA...

source: KRONG!
GREAT UNCLE KRONG... WHAT HAPPENED TO YOU??
target: OSABA ZAHAR KRONG... ZER GERTATU ZAIZU??

source: WITH YOU BY OUR SIDE, KRONG!
GREAT UNCLE KRONG... REST IN GLORY. @WE'LL SAVE THE VILLAGE, YOU CAN BET ON IT.
target: OSABA ZAHAR KRONG... LURRA ARIN BEKIZU. @GURE HERRIA SALBATUKO DUGU, ZIUR EGON ZAITEZKE.

source: JOT, DUDE... LET'S ROLL ON!
NO CAN DO. NO ONE ASCEND BEYOND HERE. @... @UNLESS YOU HAD A PASS. @IF YOU HAVE A PASS, THEN YEAH... SURE THING, GO AHEAD.
target: EZIN DUT. INOR EZIN DA HEMENDIK GORA PASA. @... @BAIMENIK IZAN EZEAN. @BAIMENA BALDIN BADUZU, ORDUAN BAI... NOSKI, SEGI AURRERA.

source: BLOCKED AGAIN! LET ME HANDLE THIS...
target: HAU ERE ITXITA! HAU NIRE KONTU...

source: YO, GOOD SIR... COULD YOU KINDLY OPEN THE GATES? @WE HAVE MAJORLY IMPORTANT BUSINESS TO ATTEND TO - FORTHWITH.
target: ZU, UNTXI ON... ATEAK IREKITZERIK IZANGO AL ZENUKE? @KONTU OSO GARRANTZITSUEZ ARDURATU BEHAR DUGU, BEREHALA.
