target: EZ!! EZ NINTZEN NI IZAN! LUIZI BAT IZAN ZEN!

source: NOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!!!
PHEW, THAT BIG DUDE PACKED A HEAVY PUNCH... @WE TAUGHT 'EM ALL PRETTY GOOD THOUGH, HUH? @LET'S GET GOING!
target: FIU, HANDI HORREK SEKULAKO UKABILKADA ZUEN... @HALA ERE MEREZITAKOA EMAN DIEGU, EZTA? @JARRAI DEZAGUN!

source: AND {200}EXPLODED {100}ON THE GROUND BELOW
THE GIANT MACHINE FELL!
INTO APPROXIMATELY TWO HUNDRED AND EIGHTY MILLION PIECES
target: GUTXI GORABEHERA BERREHUN ETA LAUROGEI MILIOI PUSKATAN

source: THRASH!! SON... HOW LONG HAS IT BEEN?
LOOK AT YOU! YOU'RE SO MUCH TALLER! EVEN MORE HANDSOME!!
target: BEGIRA! ASKOZ ALTUAGO ZAUDE! BAITA EDERRAGO ERE!!

source: WHAT?? THEY CAN ALL SEE HOW HANDSOME YOU ARE...
target: ZER?? GUZTIEK IKUS DEZAKETE ZEINEN EDERRA ZAREN...

source: YOU DID GREAT. VERY METAL.
ONLY JUST ARRIVED AND NOW YOU'RE OFF AGAIN... @COME BACK TO THE MOUNTAIN WHEN YOU'RE DONE... YOUR LITTLE COUSINS WANT TO JAM WITH YOU!
target: ORAINTXE AILEGATUAK ETA BERRIZ ALDE EGIN BEHAR... @BUKATZEN DUZUNEAN ITZUL ZAITEZ MENDIRA... ZURE LEHENGUSU TXIKIEK ZUREKIN ENTSEATU NAHI DUTE!

source: GOOD WORK, YOU TWO! YOU GAVE HUMGRUMP A GOOD OLD WALLOP! @THAT MACHINE WAS EXTRACTING METAL FROM THE MOUNTAIN, YOU KNOW... @I HAVE WORD THAT HUMGRUMP'S GOONS ARE TRANSPORTING THE ORE SOMEWHERE... @FOR WHAT PURPOSE...? BEATS ME! @THAT'S SOMETHING FOR YOU TO FIGURE OUT. HOP TO IT, LADS! SHOO, SHOO! @MOONBEARD OUT.
target: LAN ONA, BIKOTE! ZAPLASTEKO EDERRA EMAN DIOZUE PETRALTZARRI! @MAKINA HORI MENDITIK METALA ERAUZTEN ARI ZEN, BAZENEKITEN? @PETRALTZARREN MORROIAK BETA HORIEK NONBAIT ERAMATEN ARI DIRELA ENTZUN DUT... @ZERTARAKO...? HORI EZ DAKIT! @HORI ZUEK IKERTU BEHARKO DUZUE. ZOAZTE, BERAZ! XIU, XIU! @ILARGIBIZARREK MOZTU.

source: TOO LONG! FAR TOO MANY DAYS...
THRASH, WE WATCHED HOW YOU HANDLED THAT MECHANICAL MONSTER...
target: THRASH, MUNSTRO MEKANIKO HORRENA NOLA KUDEATU DUZUEN IKUSI DUGU...

source: YOU HAVE THE MAKINGS OF A GREAT TRARRG WARRIOR... @WE'RE PROUD OF YOU, BOY.
target: TRARRG GERLARI IZUGARRIA IZATEKO POTENTZIALA DUZU... @ZUTAZ HARRO GAUDE, MUTIKO.

source: GREAT UNCLE KRONG. MAY HE REST IN GLORY.
target: OSABA ZAHAR KRONG. LURRA ARIN BEKIO.

source: SOUNDS LIKE YOU HAVE ANOTHER MISSION AHEAD.
target: AURREAN BESTE MISIO BAT DUZUELA DIRUDI.

source: THE REST OF THE VILLAGERS ARE IMPRISONED AROUND HERE. @WE'LL GO BUST SOME TROOPER HEADS AND BREAK THEM OUT. @TRARRGSPEED TO YOU BOTH.
target: GAINONTZEKO HERRITARRAK INGURUAN DAUDE PRESO HARTURIK. @SOLDADUEI EGURRA EMAN ETA ASKATUKO DITUGU. @IZAN BEDI TRARRG ZUEKIN BIOKIN.

source: {125}TO BATTLE!!{100}
MUM... C'MON! NOT IN FRONT OF EVERYONE!
target: AMA... TIRA! GUZTI HAUEN AURREAN EZ!

source: OHH... UH... YOU CAUGHT THAT, DAD?
WELL, Y'KNOW, ITS LIKE YOU TAUGHT ME, MUM... YOU GOTTA TAKE OUT THE TRASH. @GREAT UNCLE KRONG SHOWED ME SOME TRICKS.
target: ZERA, BADAKIZU, ZUK ERAKUTSI BEZALA, AMA... ZABORRA ATERA BEHAR DA. @KRONG OSABA ZAHARRAK TRIKIMAILU BATZUK IRAKATSI ZIZKIDAN.

source: I'LL BE BACK SOON, MUM... I PROMISE
target: LASTER ITZULIKO NAIZ, AMA... ZIN DAGIT

source: HEY, DUDE... HAVE I GOT EXCAVATOR BRAIN... OR... @...CAN YOU HEAR CLANKING??
target: AIZU, TXO... BURUAN HONDEAMAKINA DUT... EDO... @...ZUK ERE ENTZUTEN DUZU KARRANKA BAT??

source: {125}TRARRGSPEED{100}
...A CONVOY SPEEDING AWAY!
IN THE VERY FAR DISTANCE THEY COULD SPY...
target: ETA URRUNEAN IKUSI AHAL IZAN ZUTEN...

source: JOT AND THRASH LOOKED DOWN FROM THE CLIFFSIDE.
target: JOT ETA THRASHEK LABARRETIK BEHERA BEGIRATU ZUTEN.

source: TO FIND OUT WHERE HUMGRUMP'S CAVALCADE WAS HEADING.
target: PETRALTZARREN IBILGAILU-ILARA NORA ZIHOAN IKUSI AHAL IZATEKO.

source: OUR HEROES SET OFF
HAPPY BIRTHDAY TO US! HOHO! @THANK YOU BOTH SO VERY MUCH. YOU HAVE MADE OUR DAY A SPECIAL ONE. @WE DECREE THAT YOU SHALL RECEIVE A TOKEN OF OUR ROYAL APPRECIATION. @THIS... METAL THING!
target: URTE ASKOTARAKO GURI! JOJO! @ESKERRIK ASKO BIOI. GURE EGUNA OSO BEREZI EGIN DUZUE. @ERRET-ONESPENAREN SEINALEA ESKURATUKO DUZUELA DEKRETATU DUGU. @METALEZKO... GAUZA  HAU!

source: MAY YOUR LIGHT SHINE BRIGHT, O MERRY TRAVELERS!
target: ZUEN ARGIAK INDARTSU EGIN BEZA DIRDIR, BIDAIARI BIHOZBERAK!

source: OH THANK ROCKETONIO YOU'RE STILL HERE. I THOUGHT YOU HAD FORGOTTEN ME! @PLEASE, LIGHT ALL THE CANDLES AT ONCE TO SAVE MY SOUL. @GO NOW, FRIENDS. I WILL CONTINUE TO PRAY FOR YOU (AND ME).
target: OH, ESKERRAK SUZIRIKERRI ORAINDIK ERE HEMEN ZAUDELA. AHANZTU NINDUZULA USTE NUEN! @MESEDEZ, PIZTU ARGI GUZTIAK NIRE ESPIRITUA SALBATZEKO. @JOAN ORAIN, LAGUNAK. ZUEN (ETA NIRE) ALDE EGINGO DUT OTOITZ.

source: PLEASE, FRIENDS... @LIGHT THE CANDLES AND BRING US BIRTHDAY CHEER...
target: MESEDEZ, LAGUNAK... @PIZTU KANDELAK ETA ANIMA DEZAGUN URTEBETETZE HAU...

source: AHOY THERE! @WE ARE JERALDO, THE JELLY KING. HOHO! @IT'S OUR BIRTHDAY TODAY, YOU KNOW... SIXTY YEARS OLD! @OHH WE WOULD SO MUCH LIKE TO SEE A DISPLAY OF CANDLES ON OUR BIRTHDAY... @ONE LIT CANDLE FOR EVERY DECADE OF OUR WOBBLY EXISTENCE... @IT SO HAPPENS THERE ARE SIX CANDLES PLACED SOMEWHERE AROUND HERE. @IF YOU WERE TO IGNITE THEM ALL, YOU WOULD MAKE AN OLD KING VERY HAPPY!
target: KAAIXOOU! @GERALDO GARA, GELATINAREN ERREGE. JOJO! @GAUR GURE URTEBETETZEA DA, BADAKIZUE? HIRUROGEI URTE! @OHH, GURE URTEBETETZERAKO IZUGARRI GUSTATUKO LITZAIGUKE KANDELA ERAKUSTALDI BAT IZATEA... @GURE EXISTENTZIA KULUNKARIKO HAMARKADA BAKOITZEKO ARGI BAT... @ETA TXIRIPAZ-EDO HEMEN INGURUAN NONBAIT SEI KANDELA DAUDE. @GUZTIAK PIZTUKO BAZENITU, ERREGE ZAHARRA OSO ZORIONTSU EGINGO ZENUKETE!

source: I SAW SOME ON THE WAY OVER HERE. I THINK WE CAN HELP YOU OUT.
target: BIDEAN ZEHAR BATZUK IKUSI DITUT. LAGUNDUKO DIZUGULA USTE DUT.

source: OH PRAISE ROCKETONIO! @THE SCRIPTURES SAY YOU MUST LIGHT THEM ALL AT ONCE ELSE IT WON'T COUNT. @GO NOW... AND SAVE ME!
target: OH, ESKERRAK ZURI SUZIRIKER! @IDATZIEN ARABERA DENA BATERA PIZTU BEHAR DIRA, ZERBAITETARAKO BALIOKO BADU. @JOAN ZAITEZTE... ETA SALBA NAZAZUE!

source: WEAVER
Zap
Zip

INSIDE HERE IS AN INTERGALACTIC WARZONE... @IF WE SURVIVE THIS BATTLE, WE MIGHT RETRIEVE ONE OF MY DAD'S FRAGMENTS! @I'M NOT QUITE CONFIDENT ENOUGH IN MY JETTING ABILITIES, THOUGH... @LISTEN, LET'S FIND MORE OF MY DAD'S FRAGMENTS AND I CAN BUILD UP MY COURAGE. @I SAW ONE OVER TO THE LEFT, WAY UP HIGH... @AND ANOTHER ON THE VERY RIGHT SIDE OF THE GALAXY. @LET'S GO!
target: HEMEN BARRUAN GALAXIA ARTEKO GUDU-ZELAI BAT DAGO... @BORROKA HONETAN BIZIRAUNEZ GERO, NIRE AITAREN ZATI BAT LOR GENEZAKE! @EZ NAGO NIRE PROPULTSATZE GAITASUNEKIN ZIUR, BAINA... @ENTZUN, NIRE AITAREN ZATIAK AURKITU BITARTEAN NIRE KURAIA LANDUKO DUT. @EZKERREAN, OSO GOIAN IKUSI NUEN BAT... @ETA BESTE BAT GALAXIAREN ESKUINENEKO ALDEAN. @GOAZEN!

source: I'M NOT QUITE READY FOR THE WARZONE IN HERE... @LET'S GRAB A COUPLE OF MY DAD'S FRAGMENTS FIRST, SO I CAN PRACTICE JETTING!
target: EZ NAGO GUDU-ZELAI HONETARAKO ERABAT PREST... @HAR DEZAGUN NIRE AITAREN ZATI PARE BAT LEHENENGO, PROPULTSIOA PRAKTIKATZEKO!

source: LET'S FIND ONE MORE FRAGMENT OF MY FATHER BEFORE WE ENTER HERE. @I NEED A BIT MORE JETTING PRACTICE BEFORE I CAN BRAVE THIS WARZONE!
target: AURKI DEZAGUN NIRE AITAREN BESTE ZATI BAT HEMEN SARTU AURRETIK. @PROPULTSATZE PRAKTIKAN HANDIAGOA BEHAR DUT GUDU-ZELAI HONEKIN AUSARTZEKO!

source: ALRIGHT. @I'M READY AS I'LL EVER BE. @I'M CERTAIN THE LAST FRAGMENT OF MY FATHER IS IN HERE. @LET'S GO GET IT!
target: EDERKI. @ORAIN BAI NAGOELA PREST. @ZIUR NAGO NIRE AITAREN AZKEN ZATIA HEMEN NONBAIT DAGOELA. @GOAZEN HARTZERA!

source: ANOMALY DETECTED

IT'S ABOUT TIME, SOLDIER! @WHILE YOU'VE BEEN OUT DILLY-DALLYING, WE'VE BEEN UP TO OUR EYEBALLS IN SKRELL! @THEY'VE BEEN BLIPPING IN AND STEALING OUR BEST SCIENTISTS. @THOSE BOFFINS MAY BE WIMPY PUKES, BUT WE NEED 'EM FOR THE WAR! @GET OUT THERE, RESCUE THOSE SCIENTISTS... AND BRING THEM BACK HERE TO ME!! @ALSO, DON'T DIE.
target: BAZEN GARAIA, SOLDADU! @KANPOAN DENBORA GALTZEN ZENBILTZAN BITARTEAN, HEMEN SKRELLEZ GAINEZKA EGON GARA! @BAPATEAN AGERTU ETA GURE ZIENTZIALARI HOBERENAK LAPURTU DIZKIGUTE. @JAKINTSU HORIEK AHUL HUTSAK IZANGO DIRA, BAINA GERRARAKO BEHAR DITUGU! @ZOAZ ZIENTZIALARI HORIEK SALBATZERA... ETA EKARRI NIRI BUELTAN!! @AH, ETA EZ HIL.

source: THAT'S THE LAST SCIENTIST... YOU GOT 'EM ALL. @THIS BASE IS FULL OF NERDS NOW. @THEY'RE ALREADY COOKING UP OUR NEXT WEAPON! @GOOD JOB, SOLDIER! @YOUR NEXT MISSION - TAKE THIS PIECE OF JUNK AND TRANSPORT IT AWAY FROM HERE!
target: HORI DA AZKEN ZIENTZIALARIA... GUZTIAK DITUZU. @BASEA FRIKIZ BETETA DAGO ORAIN. @DAGOENEKO GURE HURRENGO ARMA PRESTATZEN ARI DIRA! @LAN ONA, SOLDADU! @ZURE HURRENGO HELBURUA: ZABOR ZATI HAU HARTU ETA HEMENDIK URRUN ERAMAN!

source: MISSION COMPLETE
WAVE

WE DID IT! WE WON THE INTERGALACTIC BATTLE! @YOUR LASER BLASTING WAS SO COOL! WAS MY JETTING OK?? @WAIT UNTIL I TELL MY DAD! @LET'S GET BACK TO MY HOME PLANET AND PUT HIM BACK TOGETHER! @THAT'S THE MUG-SHAPED PLANET WHERE WE FIRST MET!
target: LORTU DUGU! GALAXIA-ARTEKO BORROKA IRABAZI DUGU! @LASERRAREKIN TIROKA TREBEA ZARA GERO! NIRE PROPULTSIOA ONGI?? @NIRE AITARI KONTATZEKO IRRIKITAN NAGO! @GOAZEN NIRE PLANETARA ETA MUNTATU DEZAGUN! @LEHENENGOZ ELKARTU GINEN KATILU FORMAKO PLANETA DA!

source: JOT GOT THE STOP STAMP! @HE CAN USE IT TO IMPRINT A MAGICAL HAND ICON ONTO THE BOOK'S PAGES! @THIS ICON WILL FREEZE WHATEVER IT'S IMPRINTED ONTO. @PRESS {Action_Stamp} TO PLACE A STAMP, OR HOLD {Action_Stamp} TO CAREFULLY AIM IT.
target: JOTEK GELDITZE ZIGILUA LORTU DU! @LIBURUETAKO ORRIETAN ESKU MAGIKO BATEN IKONOA INPRIMATZEKO ERABIL DEZAKE! @IKONO HONEK AZPIAN DUEN ORO GELDIRIK MANTENDUKO DU. @SAKATU {Action_Stamp} ZIGILATZEKO, EDO EUTSI {Action_Stamp} KONTUZ APUNTATZEKO.

source: AH, HEY, ZIP PRIME. @YOU KNOW UP THERE IS THE... BLUE ZONE, RIGHT? @THAT'S WHERE OUR LORD ROCKETONIO RESIDES. @PRAISE ROCKETONIO. @YOU'RE LOOKING FOR YOUR DAD'S BITS, RIGHT? @I THINK SOMEONE OFFERED ONE OF THEM TO ROCKETONIO. @PRAISE ROCKETONIO. @YOU SHOULD GRAB THE REST OF HIM BEFORE HEADING ON UP.
target: AH, HEY, ZIP PRIME. @BADAKIZU GOIKO HORI DELA... EREMU URDINA, EZTA? @HOR BIZI DA GURE SUZIRIKER MAITEA. @LAUDATUA IZAN BEDI SUZIRIKER. @ZURE AITAREN ZATIEN BILA ZABILTZA, EZTA? @NORBAITEK PIEZETAKO BAT SUZIRIKERRI ESKAINI DIOLA USTE DUT. @LAUDATUA IZAN BEDI SUZIRIKER. @GORA JOAN BAINO LEHENAGO BESTE PIEZAK HARTU BEHARKO ZENITUZKEELA USTE DUT.

source: SALUTATIONS, ZIP PRIME. @I SEE YOU HAVE A PART OF YOUR FATHER THERE. @THAT WILL PLEASE ROCKETONIO. @IT IS HIS TEACHING THAT A SON RESPECTS HIS FATHER AND FETCHES HIS BITS, SHOULD THEY BECOME... @...DISTRIBUTED. @PRAISE ROCKETONIO. @ANYWAY, BEST GET THE OTHER BIT, HUH?
target: DIOSALA, ZIP PRIME. @ZURE AITAREN PIEZA BAT DARAMAZULA IKUSTEN DUT. @SUZIRIKER POZIK EGONGO DA. @BERE IRASKUNTZEKIN BADAKIGU SEME BATEK BERE AITA ERRESPETATU BEHAR DUELA ETA HONEN PIEZAK BILDU BEHAR LITUZKEELA... @...SAKABANATUTA DAUDENEAN. @LAUDATUA IZAN BEDI SUZIRIKER. @EDONOLA ERE, BESTE PIEZAK BILATU BEHARKO DITUZU, EZTA?

source: IT SEEMS THAT ALL THE BARRIERS HAVE BEEN LOWERED. @ROCKETONIO MUST BE PLEASED WITH YOUR PROGRESS. @PRAISE ROCKETONIO. @HE AWAITS YOU ABOVE, IN... THE BLUE ZONE. @DON'T FORGET YOUR OFFERING OR HE'LL VAPORISE YOU!
target: BADIRUDI HESI GUZTIAK JAITSI DITUELA. @SUZIRIKER POZIK EGONGO DA ZURE AURRERAPENEKIN. @LAUDATUA IZAN BEDI SUZIRIKER. @ZURE ZAIN DAGO GOIAN... EREMU URDINEAN. @EZ EZAZU AHAZTU ESKAINTZA EGITEA EDO LURRUNEZTATU EGINGO ZAITU!

source: OH, WELL THAT'S MUCH BETTER! @I DON'T KNOW IF YOU'VE EVER BEEN DISASSEMBLED, BUT I REALLY CAN'T RECOMMEND IT. @WHAT'S THAT? YOU'RE LOOKING FOR AN ITEM? @YOU KNOW, THERE'S A CURIOUS OBJECT LODGED IN THE CORE OF THIS PLANET... @MY ANTENNA TELLS ME IT MIGHT JUST BE WHAT YOU'RE LOOKING FOR. @LET'S SEE IF WE CAN BLAST IT OUT...
target: AH, HORRELA BAI ONGI! @EZ DAKIT INOIZ DESMUNTATU OTE ZAITUZTETEN, BAINA EZ DIZUET GOMENDATZEN. @ZER DIOZU? OBJEKTU BATEN BILA ZABILTZALA? @BA ENTZUN, PLANETA HONEN NUKLEOAN OBJEKTU BITXI BAT DAGO GORDETA... @NIRE ANTENAK DIO BILA ZABILTZANA IZAN DAITEKEELA. @EA ERAUZTERIK DAUKADAN...

source: AHHHH! @STRETCHING MY JETS NEVER FELT BETTER. @I HOPE THAT WEIRD THING IS WHAT YOU'RE AFTER. @THANK YOU, YOUNG WARRIOR, AND THANK YOU, ZIP... YOU'VE DONE ME PROUD!
target: AHHHH! @ZEINEN EDERRA NIRE PROPULTSATZAILEAK MARTXAN JARTZEA. @ESPERO DUT GAUZA ARRARO HAU IZATEA BILA ZENBILTZANA. @ESKERRIK ASKO, GERLARI GAZTEA, ETA ESKERRIK ASKO, ZIP... OSO HARRO NAGO!

source: ARRGGHH! @PLEASE, DON'T ABDUCT ME! @... @OH... YOU'RE NOT ONE OF THOSE SPAGHETTI-LEGGED ALIENS ARE YOU? @PRAISE BE TO ROCKETONIO... @OH, WAIT! @HERE THEY COME!
target: ARRGGHH! @MESEDEZ, EZ NAZAZU ABDUZITU! @... @OH... ZU EZ ZARA ALIEN HANKA-FIN HORIETAKO BAT, EZTA? @LAUDATUA IZAN BEDI SUZIRIKER... @OH, ITXARON! @HEMEN DATOZ!

source: PLEASE, ENJOY YOUR DAD'S PARTS. @I MEAN YOUR DAD'S BITS! @NO, HIS JUNK! @...THAT CAME OUT ALL WRONG, SORRY.
target: GOZATU ZURE AITAREN PIEZEKIN. @BERE ZATIEKIN, ESAN NAHI DUT! @HAU DA, BERE HONDAKINEKIN! @AI, EZ DAGO HAU MODU POLITEAN ESATERIK, SENTITZEN DUT.

source: OOH, VISITORS! @HELLO! I'M TERRY. @DON'T SEE MANY LIFEFORMS AROUND HERE. @HEY, BEFORE YOU JET OFF... I FOUND SOMETHING SHINY! @WHY DON'T YOU TAKE IT AS A SOUVENIR TO REMEMBER OLD TERRY BY?
target: OOH, BISITARIAK! @KAIXO! TERRY NAIZ. @HEMEN EZ DUT BIZIDUN GEHIEGI IKUSTEN. @AIZUE, ALDE EGIN BAINO LEHEN... DISTIRATSUA DEN ZERBAIT AURKITU DUT! @ZERGATIK EZ DUZUE OROIGARRI GISA HARTZEN? TERRY ZAHARRAZ GOGORATZEKO

source: OH, HELLO THERE! @I DIG YOUR ANTENNA...KINDA FLUFFY AND WAVY! @I'M ZIP, NICE TO MEET YOU... @...JOT, YOU SAY? YOU'RE LOOKING FOR SOME KIND OF ITEM? @WELL, Y'KNOW, MY DAD COULD HELP... HE'S VERY SMART. @BUT HE'S CURRENTLY ALSO RATHER DISASSEMBLED. @SOME OBNOXIOUS SOLDIERS BARGED INTO OUR LITTLE PLANET HERE AND TOOK HIM APART! @THEY CARTED HIS FRAGMENTS OFF... NOT COOL AT ALL! @HEY, IF YOU HELP ME REASSEMBLE THE OLD MAN, HE'LL HELP YOU FIND WHAT YOU'RE AFTER! @I'M NOT SUPER CONFIDENT IN MY JETTING SKILLS... BUT TOGETHER MAYBE WE COULD DO THIS... @HOW ABOUT IT? @IF YOU JUMP OUT OF THIS PLANET I'LL HOP ON YOUR BACK! @THEN WE CAN GO LOOKING FOR DAD'S FRAGMENTS TOGETHER!
target: HARA, KAIXO! @GUSTUKO DUT ZURE ANTENA...BIGUN ETA IZURTSUA! @ZIP NAIZ, URTE ASKOTARAKO... @...JOT, ESAN DUZU? OBJEKTUREN BATEN BILA ZABILTZA? @TIRA, ZIUR NIRE AITAK LAGUNDUKO LIZUKEELA... OSO ARGIA DA. @BAINA ORAINTXE BERTAN ZATIKATUTA DAGO. @SOLDADU HIGUINGARRI BATZUK GURE PLANETA TXIKIRA ETORRI ETA DESMUNTATU EGIN ZUTEN! @BERE ZATIAK HOR NONBAIT ERAMAN DITUZTE... OSO GAIZKI! @AIZU, NIRE AITA BERRIZ MUNTATZEN LAGUNTZEN BADIDAZU, NAHI DUZUNA AURKITZEN LAGUNDUKO DIZUT! @EZ NAIZ PROPULTSIOAN OSO TREBEA... BAINA ELKARREKIN AGIAN EGIN DEZAKEGU... @ZER IRUDITZEN? @PLANETA HONETATIK ATERATZEN BAZARA, ZURE BIZKARREAN IGOKO NAIZ! @ELKARREKIN JOANGO GARA NIRE AITAREN ZATIAK HARTZERA!

source: WE MADE IT BACK! @WHAT AN ODYSSEY! @OK, LET'S REASSEMBLE POPS!
target: ITZULI GARA! @HAU BAI ODISEA! @EA BA, MUNTATU DEZAGUN AITA!

source: HEY ZIP PRIME! @MANY BLESSINGS OF ROCKETONIO TO YOU! @YOU REALLY SHOULDN'T BE UP HERE... @I WAS SENT TO CLEAN UP ALL THE METEOR CHUNKS AFTER THE LAST SHOWER. @I HOPE THERE'S NOT ANOTHER ONE VERY SOON... @... @I CAN'T BELIEVE IT, A METEOR SHOWER!
target: AIZU ZIP PRIME! @SUZIRIKERREK BEDEINKA ZAITZALA! @EZ ZENUKE HOR GOIAN EGON BEHAR... @AZKEN METEORO EKAITZAREN ONDOREN BIDALI NINDUTEN HAU TXUKUNTZERA. @ESPERO DENBORALDI BATEAN BESTERIK EZ IZATEA... @... @EZIN DUT SINETSI, METEORO EKAITZA!

source: PLEASE DON'T TELL YOUR DAD ABOUT THIS. @HE NEVER LIKED ME WHEN WE USED TO PLAY TOGETHER AS LITTLE ROCKETTES. @I GUESS THIS IS PARTLY MY PETTY REVENGE.
target: EZ KONTATU HAU ZURE AITARI, MESEDEZ. @INOIZ EZ NAU GUSTUKO IZAN, SUZIRITXOAK GINELA JOLASTEN GINENETIK JAKIN DUT. @SEGUR ASKI HAU NIRE MENDEKU ZEKENA IZAN DA.

source: PHEW! @THAT WAS CLOSE. @I'M SORRY THAT YOU HAD TO BE UP HERE AT SUCH AN INOPPORTUNE MOMENT. @REALLY QUITE INCONVENIENT! @ANYHOW, THOSE METEORS DISLODGED THIS PIECE OF YOUR DAD... @WHICH WAS BURIED HERE... @BY... #...ME... @SORRY ABOUT THAT. PLEASE HAVE IT BACK
target: FIU! @HURBIL EGON DA. @SENTITZEN DUT UNE HONETAN HOR GOIAN EGON BEHAR IZATEA. @MOMENTU DESEGOKIA BENETAN! @EDONOLA ERE, METEORO HORIEK ZURE AITAREN PIEZA HAU ASKATU DUTE... @HEMEN LURPERATUTA NUEN... #NIK... @SENTITZEN DUT. MESEDEZ, ERAMAN EZAZU.

OVERHEARD YOU... LOOKING FOR A PASS? @THINK THERE'S ONE IN A CAVE AROUND HERE. @SOME BUNNY STORED IT IN A CHEST FOR SAFE KEEPING. @LOOK FOR A CAVE!
target: ENTZUN EGIN DIZUET... BAIMEN BATEN BILA? @HEMEN INGURUKO KOBA BATEAN BADAGOELA USTE DUT. @UNTXITXO BATEK KUTXA BATEAN GORDE ZUEN, GALDU EZ ZEDIN. @BILATU KOBA BAT!

source: I COULDN'T HELP OVERHEARING THE BUNNY THAT OVERHEARD YOU. @NOW HEAR THIS! IF YOU'RE LOOKING FOR A CAVE ENTRANCE, JOT... @YOU MAY SPOT ONE WHILE GIVING THE PAGES A BIT OF A TURN. @FREE ADVICE FROM OLD MOONBEARD! @ANNNNNND I'M OUT!
target: EZIN IZAN DUT EKIDIN UNTXI HORREK ENTZUN DIZUELA ENTZUTEA. @ORAIN ENTZUN HAU! KOBA SARRERA BATEN BILA BAZABILTZATE, JOT... @AGIAN ERRAZAGO EGINGO ZAIZU ORRIAK PASATZEN PROBATZEN BADUZU. @ILARGIBIZAR ZAHARRAREN DOAKO AHOLKUA! @EEEETA MOZTU!

source: SOMETIMES RABBIT-FOLK STORE THINGS IN CHESTS. @LITTLE KNOWN FACT ABOUT BUNNIES.
target: UNTXITXOEK GAUZAK KUTXETAN GORDETZEN DITUZTEN BATZUTAN. @EZ DA GAUZA OSO JAKINA.

source: OUR#HEROES#CLIMBED THE#{125}SHEER#{125}CLIFF FACE
ASCENDING#TO EVEN#{125}GREATER#{125}HEIGHTS
YOU MAY ASCEND. @TRY AVOID GETTING PECKED TO DEATH BY MEGA EAGLE.
target: IGO ZAITEZKETE. @SAIATU MEGA ARRANOAK HARTZEA EKIDITEN.

source: UHH... YEAH. @WE'LL DO OUR BEST. @THANK YOU BUNNY DUDE.
target: EHH... BAI. @GOGOZ SAIATUKO GARA. @ESKERRIK ASKO UNTXI-TXO.

source: ONCE AGAIN#OUR HEROES#SCALED THE#{150}PERILOUS#{150}ROCK FACE
AND STEELED#THEMSELVES#FOR A#{150}WILD#{150}ENCOUNTER

WELL OK. @WHAT WE HAVE BEFORE US HERE, JOT MY DUDE, IS A WALL OF IRONWEED. @IT'S THE TOUGHEST, GNARLIEST PLANT YOU WILL EVER ENCOUNTER. @IT'S USUALLY KEPT AT BAY BY THE RIGHTEOUS GARDENERS OF TRARRG. @BUT... THE GARDENERS ARE MIA. SO THE IRONWEED IS BIB. @THAT'S 'BACK IN BUSINESS', DUDE.
target: EDERKI BADA. @HEMEN AURREAN DUGUN HAU, JOT LAGUNA, BELAR-METAL PARETA BAT DA. @INOIZ AURKITUKO DUZUN LANDARERIK GOGOR ETA KORAPILATSUENA DA. @NORMALEAN TRARRGKO LOREZAINEK ARRASTOAN SARTUTA IZATEN DUTE. @BAINA... LOREZAINAK DESAGERTU EGIN DIRA ETA BELAR-METALA GOGOR DABIL. @HORI BAI DABILELA 'SU TA GAR', TXO.

source: HELLO, HIKERS! @IRONWEED, EH? TOUGH SHRUB. @I THINK I CAN HELP YOU OUT. I COOK UP A MEAN WEEDKILLER. @BUT I NEED A SPECIAL INGREDIENT... A CRUSHROOM! @IT'S... LIKE A PURPLE MUSHROOM. LUCKILY, THEY OFTEN GROW NEAR IRONWEED. @IF YOU GET ME ONE I MIGHT BE ABLE TO RUSTLE UP SOMETHING! @MOONBEARD OUT!
target: KAIXO, MENDIZALEAK! @BELAR-METALA, EH? BELAR GOGORRA. @USTE DUT ZUEI LAGUNTZEKO MODUAN NAGOELA. BELAR TXARRAK HILTZEKO HERBIZIDA PRESTA DEZAKET. @BAINA OSAGAI BEREZI BAT BEHAR DUT... ZANPAÑOIA! @ZERA... TXANPINOI MORE BATEN ANTZEKOA. ZORTEKOAK ZUEK, BELAR-METALAREN INGURUAN HAZTEN BAITA. @HORIETAKO BAT EKARTZEN BADIDAZUE ZERBAIT PRESTATUKO DIZUET! @ILARGIBIZARREK MOZTU!

source: OH GOOD ONE... YOU GOT A CRUSHROOM! @HAND IT OVER, LAD! @... @OH. WE'RE HUNDREDS OF MILES APART. @BIT OF A WRINKLE IN THE PLAN, THAT. @WELL... MAYBE THERE'S A WAY YOU COULD SHORTCUT ALL THOSE MILES TO GET ME THAT 'SHROOM?
target: OH EDERKI... ZANPAÑOI BAT LORTU DUZUE! @EKARRIDAZUE! @... @OH. EHUNDAKA KILOMETROTARA GAUDE. @PLANA EZ ZEN EGOKIENA, DIRUDIENEZ... @TIRA... AGIAN BADAGO BIDEZIDORREN BAT KILOMETRO HORIEK GUZTIAK EZ EGITEKO?

source: JOT!
WHOAH!
GOOD WORK, MY BOY! BENDING SPACE AND TIME LIKE A CHAMP! @NOW, HAND ME THAT CRUSHROOM AND I'LL GET COOKING!
target: LAN BIKAINA, MUTIKO! ESPAZIOA ETA DENBORA TOLESTEN TXAPELDUNEN PARE! @ORAIN, EMAIDAZU ZANPAÑOI HORI ETA HAS NADIN LANEAN!

source: HEY!
WOW!
NICE OF YOU TO DROP BY, JOT!
target: ZEINEN ONGI HEMENDIK PASA AHAL IZATEA, JOT!

source: TADA! A WEEDKILLER BOMB.
IF YOU THROW IT AT THE IRONWEED YOU'LL DISSOLVE IT IN A JIFFY... GIVE IT A GO! @OH... AND IF YOU WANT ANY MORE BOMBS I'LL LEAVE A FEW ON THE GROUND FLOOR OF MY HOUSE. @HAPPY GARDENING!
target: BELAR-METALARI BOTATZEN BADIOZU, ISTANTEAN DESEGINGO DU... PROBA EZAZU! @OH... ETA BONBA GEHIAGO BEHAR BADITUZU, NIRE ETXEKO SOTOAN UTZIKO DIZKIZUT BATZUK. @ONGI PASA LOREZAINTZAN!

source: GOOD LUCK, JOT!
WHOAH DUDE! THAT LOOKS... POTENT!
GNARLY! MOONBEARD'S POTIONS ALWAYS DO THE JOB!
target: APARTA! ILARGIBIZARREN EDABEEK EZ DUTE INOIZ HUTSIK EGITEN!

source: HELLO AGAIN, JOT! @IF YOU'RE LOOKING FOR WEEDKILLER BOMBS, YOU'LL FIND THEM ON THE GROUND FLOOR! @UMMM... THE LAB'S A BIT OF A MESS AT THE MO... THE STAIRS ARE BLOCKED. @CAN'T BE BOTHERED TO CLEAN UP RIGHT NOW, I'M IN THE ZONE. @YOU'LL HAVE TO FIND ANOTHER WAY TO THE GROUND FLOOR, LAD!
target: KAIXO BERRIZ, JOT! @BONBA BELAR-HILTZAILEEN BILA BAZABILTZA, SOTOAN AURKITUKO DITUZU! @EMMM... LABORATEGIAN SEKULAKO NAHASTEA DUGU ORAI... ESKAILERAK BLOKEATUTA DAUDE. @EZIN NAIZ ORAIN HORI TXUKUNTZEN HASI, INSPIRATUTA NAGO. @SOTORA JOATEKO BESTE BIDE BAT BILATU BEHARKO DUZU, LAGUN!

source: GLAD TO HAVE YOU BACK, JOT. @LOOKS LIKE YOU RETRIEVED MY STOP STAMP. @LET'S PUT IT TO GOOD USE THEN...
target: POZTEN NAIZ ZURE ITZULERAZ, JOT. @BADIRUDI NIRE GELDITZE ZIGILUA ESKURATU DUZULA. @TIRA, EMAIOZU ERABILERA ONA...

source: PRESS {Action_Stamp} TO STAMP
PRESS {Action_Stamp} TO ERASE A STOP STAMP
LOOK DUDE - A GATE WITH TWO WEIRDLY-SHAPED KEYHOLES IN FRONT OF IT.
target: BEGIRA TXO, FORMA ARRAROKO BI SARRAILA DITUEN ATE BAT.

source: IT MEANS WE NEED TO FIND TWO WEIRDLY-SHAPED KEYS. PRETTY CLEAR.
target: FORMA ARRAROKO BI GILTZA AURKITU BEHARKO DITUGU ORDUAN. NAHIKO ARGI DAGO.

source: HEAVY METAL! @THAT'S A BAD MOTHER OF A MACHINE... @I THINK IT'S GONNA TAKE BOTH OF US TO DEFEAT THIS THING, DUDE!
target: METALAREN IZENEAN! @HORI DA HORI MAKINATZARRA... @NIK USTE ELKARREKIN BORROKATU BEHARKO DUGULA GAUZA HORI GARAITZEKO, TXO!

source: LOOK, JOT! THOSE LOCKS ARE EXPOSED. @IF WE CAN BREAK THEM OFF, I'M SURE WE CAN STOP THIS THING!
target: BEGIRA, JOT! SARRAILA HORIEK BISTAN DAUDE. @HORIEK PUSKATUZ GERO, ZIUR GAUZA HAU GELDIARAZIKO DUGULA!

source: UH-OH, THAT MADE IT MAD!
WE'VE GOT COMPANY!
IT'S NO USE! THAT SAWBLADE IS TOO FAST...

WE'LL HAVE TO WORK TOGETHER, DUDE! @YOU STOP THE SAWBLADE WITH YOUR STOPPY POWERS... 
@AND I'LL YANK OFF THOSE LOCKS!
target:
ELKARREKIN EGIN BEHARKO DUGU LAN, TXO! @ZUK GELDITU ZERRA ZURE GELDITZE BOTEREEKIN... 
@ETA SARRAILA HORIEK NIRE KONTU!

source: JOT, THE REGULATOR'S EXPOSED! @GIVE IT A BASH, DUDE!
target: JOT, ERREGULADOREA BISTAN DAGO! @EMAIOZU EGURRA, TXO!

source: WHOAH, IT'S OUT OF CONTROL!!
JOT, WE DID IT! WE HAVE TWO OF MY FATHER'S PIECES! @I THINK WE'RE READY TO BRAVE THE WARZONE OVER THERE. @LET'S GO!
target: JOT, LORTU DUGU! NIRE AITAREN BI ZATI DITUGU! @NIK USTE DAGOENEKO HORKO GUDU-ZELAIRA JOATEKO PREST GAUDELA. @GOAZEN!

source: OH HO?? CAN IT BE?? @THEY'VE GONE AND DONE IT! @RETURN HERE FOR A KINGLY GIFT, DEAR SUBJECTS.
target: OOHH?? POSIBLE AL DA?? @HASI ETA EGIN EGIN DUTE! @ITZULI HONA ERRET-OPARI BAT HARTZEKO, MENDEKO MAITEAK.

source: FIRE LASER RIFLE
LASER RIFLE
HOLD Ꝃꝃ TO FIRE
FANCY MEETING YOU HERE.
WHAT YOU'RE AFTER IS CLOSE BY. @YOU'LL JUST HAVE TO MESS AROUND WITH PRESSURE PADS AND SWITCHES A BIT. @SUCH IS LIFE.
target: BILA ZABILTZANA HURBIL DAGO. @PRESIO-PANEL ETA ETENGAILUEKIN ENDREDATU BEHARKO DUZU PIXKA BAT.

source: IF YOU TRIED BLOCKING THE MINECART WHILE IT'S MOVING... @YOU COULD MAKE IT STOP AT A DIFFERENT LOCATION. @THEN IF YOU TILTED IT AGAIN... WHO KNOWS WHERE IT'D STOP?? @WHAT A THOUGHT...
target: MEATZE-ORGA MUGITZEN ARI DEN BITARTEAN BLOKEATZEN SAIATZEN BAZARA... @LEKU DESBERDIN BATEAN GELDIARAZIKO ZENUKE. @GERO BERRIZ OKERTUZ GERO... NORK DAKIN NON GELDITUKO DEN?? @ZELAKO IDEIA...

source: HEY UP.
THAT BLOCK... IT'S BIG, BUT I BET YOU COULD TILT IT.
target: BLOKE HORI... HANDIA DA, BAINA ZIUR OKERTUZ MUGIARAZI DEZAKEZULA.

source: DID YOU NOTICE THE CRACK ON THE LEFT WALL? @I'M SURE IT'D BREAK IF YOU TILTED THE BLOCK INTO IT. @WELL, IF THE BLOCK WAS REAL HEAVY, ANYWAY. @HEAVY LIKE... METAL.
target: IKUSI AL DUZU EZKERREKO PARETAKO ARRAKALA? @ZIUR PUSKATU EGINGO DELA BLOKEAK JOTZEN BADU. @TIRA, BLOKEA OSO-OSO ASTUNA BALITZ... @ASTUNA... METALA ADINA.

source: REAL DARK IN THAT CAVERN, EH? @IF ONLY YOU HAD A BIG OLD LIGHT SOURCE OF SOME KIND. @IF THAT BIG BLOCK COULD LIGHT UP, YOU'D BE MADE. @A GLOWING BLOCK, WHAT A DREAM.
target: ILUN DAGO KOBA BARRUAN, EZTA? @NOLABAITEKO ARGI-EMALE HANDIREN BAT BAZENU. @BLOKE HANDI HORREK ARGIA EMANGO BALU, HORTXE ZENUKE. @BLOKE DISTIRATSUA, HORI BAI AMETSA.

source: THERE MAY NOT BE ANY CHEESE LYING HANDILY AROUND... @BUT YOU'VE ALWAYS GOT YOUR GOOD OLD BLOCK THERE. @IF ONLY THE BLOCK WAS CHEESY... @THEN... YOU'D HAVE A BIG BLOCK OF CHEESE.
target: BEHARBADA HEMEN INGURUAN EZ DAGO GAZTARIK... @BAINA BETI DUZU ZURE BLOKE ZAHAR HORI ESKURA. @BLOKEA GAZTAZKOA IZANGO BALITZ... @ORDUAN... GAZTAZKO BLOKE HANDI BAT IZANGO ZENUKE.

source: ALRIGHT THERE.
YOU'LL BE WANTING TO TILT THOSE BIG BLOCKS, YOU WILL.
target: BLOKE HANDI HORIEK OKERTUTA MUGITU NAHI DITUZULA USTE DUT.

source: THE PROBLEM IS, ALL THE BLOCKS SLIDE AT THE SAME TIME. THEY MAKE A WALL. @IF YOU STOPPED ONE OF THEM YOU COULD BREAK UP THE WALL. @DO YOU HAVE ANY TOOL THAT MIGHT STOP BIG OLD BLOCKS LIKE THAT? @MIGHT WANT TO CHECK YOUR POCKETS.
target: BLOKE GUZTIAK ALDI BEREAN MUGITZEN DIRELA DA ARAZOA. EGIN EZAZU PARETA BAT. @BAT GELDIARAZIKO BAZENU, PARETA PUSKATU ZENEZAKE. @HORRELAKO BLOKERIK GELDITUKO DUEN TRESNARIK BADUZU? @BILATU ZURE PATRIKETAN.

source: HOW GOES IT.

IF YOU COULD BASH THAT HUGE STONE CHAP WITH SOMETHING BIG... @YOU COULD KNOCK HIM OUT THE WAY, I'M THINKING. @SOMETHING BIG LIKE THOSE PILLARS. @PROBLEM IS, THE PILLARS LOOK TOO STABLE TO TILT. @BUT HOW WOULD YOU MAKE THEM UNSTABLE? @KEEP IT IN THE BACK OF YOUR MIND WHEN YOU'RE LOOKING AROUND.
target: HARRIZKO GIZONTZAR HORI GAUZA HANDI BATEKIN JO BAZENEZAKE... @BIDETIK KENDUKO ZENUKE, ONGI PENTSATUTA. @HORKO ZUTABE HORIEK BEZAIN HANDIA DEN ZERBAIT. @ZUTABE HORIEK EGONKORREGIAK DIRA OKERTZEKO. @BAINA NOLA DESEGONKORTU DAITEZKE? @IZAN HORI BURUAN INGURUAN BILATZEN DUZUN BITARTEAN.

source: HULLO THERE. @HOW DID I GET DOWN HERE SO QUICKLY? @TRADE SECRET, THAT IS. DON'T THINK ABOUT IT TOO MUCH. @NOW... THAT PILLAR. IT'S BIG BUT IT'S FRACTURED, SO NOT VERY STABLE. @BET YOU COULD TILT IT OVER.
target: KAIXOU. @NOLA AILEGATU NAIZEN HONA BERA HAIN AZKAR? @SEKRETU PROFESIONALA DA. EZ PENTSATU GEHIEGI. @ORAIN... ZUTABE HORI. HANDIA DA BAINA ZARTATUTA DAGO. EZ DA OSO EGONKORRA. @ZIUR OKERRARAZI DEZAKEZULA.

source: THOSE PILLARS... TOO STABLE TO TILT... @BUT IF THEY WERE FRACTURED... @YOU'D BE ON YOUR WAY.
target: ZUTABE HORIEK... OKERTZEKO EGONKORREGIAK... @BAINA ZARTATUTA BALEUDE... @BIDE ONEAN ZEUNDEKE.

source: OLD GOZZY THERE, HE PLAYS A GOOD DEFENCE. @HE'S STOPPING THOSE PILLARS... BUT... @MAYBE YOU COULD STOP HIM? @YOU KNOW, WITH SOMETHING STOPPY. @WORTH CONSIDERING.
target: GOZZY ZAHARRAK BADAKI ZERTAN DABILEN. @ZUTABE HORIEK GELDITU DITU... BAINA... @AGIAN BERA GELDI ZENEZAKE? @BADAKIZU, 'AIZU, GELDITZEKO!' BATEKIN-EDO. @PENTSATU EGINGO NUKE.

source: JOT CROSSED THE _____ PILLAR
THE [CHEESE] PILLAR BLASTED OUT HEAVY MUSIC
THE [METAL] PILLAR BLASTED OUT HEAVY MUSIC
THE [GLOWING] PILLAR BLASTED OUT HEAVY MUSIC
THE [WOODEN] PILLAR BLASTED OUT HEAVY MUSIC
THE [CHEESE] PILLAR WAS OF ANCIENT CONSTRUCTION
THE [METAL] PILLAR WAS OF ANCIENT CONSTRUCTION
THE [GLOWING] PILLAR WAS OF ANCIENT CONSTRUCTION
THE [WOODEN] PILLAR WAS OF ANCIENT CONSTRUCTION
[WOODEN] CRUMBS DOTTED THE GROUND
[GLOWING] CRUMBS DOTTED THE GROUND
[METAL] CRUMBS DOTTED THE GROUND
[CHEESE] CRUMBS DOTTED THE GROUND
JOT CROSSED THE [CHEESE] PILLAR
JOT CROSSED THE [METAL] PILLAR
JOT CROSSED THE [GLOWING] PILLAR
JOT CROSSED THE [WOODEN] PILLAR
JOT CROSSED THE [NOISY] PILLAR
OH, YOU'RE GETTING CLOSE TO THE MOUNTAIN PEAK! @MORE IRONWEED IN YOUR WAY, EH? @GROUND FLOOR. MY HOUSE. MORE BOMBS. @ZONK! PROBLEM SOLVED! @MOONBEARD OUT!
target: OH, MENDI TONTORRERA HURBILTZEN ARI ZARETE! @BELAR-METAL GEHIAGO ZURE BIDEAN, EZTA? @SOTOA. NIRE ETXEA. BONBA GEHIAGO. @BAM! AKABO ARAZOAK! @ILARGIBIZARREK MOZTU!

source: WHOAH! THIS PATH... IT DOESN'T NORMALLY HAVE A GIANT METAL DISC STUCK IN IT... @WHAT HAPPENED, BUNNY DUDE?
target: UAAUU! BIDE HONEK... NORMALEAN EZ DU METALEZKO DISKO ERRALDOIRIK IZATEN ERDIAN... @ZER GERTATU DA, UNTXI-TXO?

source: HUGE SAWBLADE, MATE. CAME FLYING DOWN. NEARLY CLEAVED ME IN 'TWAIN. @MY LIFE... IT FLASHED BEFORE MY VERY EYES...
target: ZERRA ERRALDOIA ZERUTIK ERORI DA, TXO. GUTXIGAITIK EZ NAU ERDIBITU. @NIRE BIZITZA... IKUSI DUT NIRE AURRETIK PASATZEN...

source: OH MAN... SCARY STUFF... ARE YOU OK?
I'M ALRIGHT, MATE. @IT WAS QUITE A USEFUL FLASHBACK, ACTUALLY... @...I COULD SEE WHERE I'D LOST MY KEYS.
target: ONGI NAGO, MOTEL. @FLASHBACK ERABILGARRIA IZAN DA, EGIA ESAN... @...NIRE GILTZAK NON GALDU NITUEN IKUSI AHAL IZAN DUT.

source: WELL... THAT'S SOMETHING. @JOT, WE CAN'T CARRY ON UP THIS PATH... LET'S FIND ANOTHER WAY AROUND! @KEEP ROCKING ON, BUNNY DUDE!
target: TIRA... EZ DA GUTXI. @JOT, EZIN DUGU BIDE HONETATIK JARRAITU... BILA DEZAGUN BIDE BAT! @EMAN EGURRA, UNTXI-TXO!

source: WELL... THAT'S SOMETHING.
JOT, WE CAN'T CARRY ON UP THIS PATH... LET'S FIND ANOTHER WAY AROUND!
target: JOT, EZIN DUGU BIDE HONETATIK JARRAITU... BILA DEZAGUN BESTE BAT!

source: KEEP ROCKING ON, BUNNY DUDE!
WELL NOW. THERE'S A LITTLE ROCKET FELLOW AROUND HERE WHO NEEDS HELP. @HE LIVES IN A PLANET SHAPED LIKE A MUG. @ODD PLANET. NICE ROCKET.
target: IEPALA. HEMEN INGURUAN LAGUNTZA BEHAR DUEN SUZIRI TXIKI BAT DABIL. @KATILU FORMA DUEN PLANETA BATEAN BIZI DA. @PLANETA BITXIA. SUZIRI JATORRA.

source: HOWDY. YOU'RE LOOKING FOR PAPA ROCKET'S PARTS, EH? @THINK I SAW ONE TO THE LEFT, WAY UP HIGH. @HOPE YOU'VE GOT A HEAD FOR HEIGHTS.
target: EPA. AITA SUZIRIREN ZATIEN BILA ZABILTZA, EZTA? @EZKER ALDEAN, GOI-GOIAN, BAT IKUSI NUELA USTE DUT. @ESPERO ALTUEREIN BELDURRIK EZ IZATEA.

source: ALRIGHT. THERE'S SOMEONE AROUND HERE WHO NEEDS YOUR HELP. @LITTLE ROCKET FELLOW, LIVES IN A MUG-SHAPED PLANET. @I BELIEVE THE PLANET IS HABITABLE FOR SQUIRES.
target: EDERKI. HEMEN INGURUAN ZURE LAGUNTZA BEHAR DUEN NORBAIT DAGO. @SUZIRI TXIKI LAGUNA, KATILU FORMADUN PLANETAN BIZI DA. @USTE DUT EZKUTARIAK ERE BIZI DAITEZKEELA.

source: HELLO. LOOKING FOR ROCKET DAD'S LOST FRAGMENTS? @ I SPIED ONE OVER TO THE RIGHT. @THERE'S A JELLY FELLOW WHO MAY BE ABLE TO HELP YOU. @MOST NOBLE JELLY I EVER SAW.
target: KAIXO. AITA SUZIRIREN GALDUTAKO ZATIEN BILA? @ESKUIN ALDEAN BAT IKUSI NUEN. @LAGUNDU ZAITZAKEEN GELATINAZKO LAGUN BAT DAGO BERTAN. @INOIZ IKUSI DUDAN GELATINARIK ZINTZOENA.

source: CANDLE NEARBY. IN A WOODEN NOOK. @AT THE VERY EDGE OF THE DESK, IT IS. @YOU'LL NEED TO MAKE A LEAP OF FAITH TO IGNITE IT.
target: KANDELA HURBIL. EGURREZKO EZKUTALEKU BATEAN. @MAHAIAREN ERTZ-ERTZEAN DAGO. @PIZTU AHAL IZATEKO FEDE-JAUZIA EGIN BEHARKO DUZU.

source: THERE'S A CANDLE NEAR HERE. @HEAD UPWARDS!
target: HEMEN INGURUAN KANDELA BAT DAGO. @ZOAZ GORANTZ!

source: NOW THEN. TWO CANDLES CLOSE BY. @ONE'S IN A CAGE. ONE'S IN A MUG. @A TALE OF TWO CANDLES. WHAT A STORY.
target: TIRA BA. BI KANDELA HURBIL DAUDE. @BAT KAXAN. BAT KATILUAN. @BI KANDELAREN ISTORIOA, ZER NOLAKO ISTORIOA.

source: HOW'S TRICKS. TWO CANDLES NEAR HERE. @BOTH HIGH UP. @GET JETTING, LAD!
target: EH, TXIKITO. BI KANDELA HURBIL. @BIAK GOIAN. @PROPULTSATU, LAGUN!

source: EY UP. THERE'S A BIG PLANET UP THERE ON THE WINDOW SILL. @SHAPED LIKE A BIG TUB, IT IS. @AN INTERGALACTIC WAR RAGES IN ITS ATMOSPHERE. @I SPIED ONE OF PAPA ROCKET'S PARTS IN THERE. @YOU'RE GOING TO HAVE TO GO TO SPACE WAR TO GET IT, LAD. @SOMETIMES... YOU JUST HAVE TO GO TO SPACE WAR.
target: EPE. HAN GOIKO LEIHOAREN ERTZEAN PLANETA HANDI BAT DAGO. @ONTZI HANDI BATEN ITXURA DU. @GALAXIA ARTEKO GERRA MARTXAN DAGO HANGO ATMOSFERAN. @AITA SUZIRIREN ZATI BAT HAN IKUSI DUT. @ESPAZIO GERRARA JOAN BEHARKO DUZU ZATIA LORTU NAHI BADUZU, LAGUN... @BATZUTAN... ESPAZIOKO GERRARA JOAN BEHARRA DAGO.

source: AYE-AYE. I SAW ONE OF ROCKET SENIOR'S PARTS IN THE BIG PLANET. @YOU KNOW, THE PLANET ON THE WINDOW SILL, SHAPED LIKE A TUB. @FULL OF SWARMS OF MURDEROUS LASER-BLASTING ALIENS, IT IS. @APART FROM THAT, LOVELY PLACE.
target: IEP-IEP. AITA SUZIRIREN ZATIETAKO BAT IKUSI DUT PLANETA HANDIAN. @BADAIZU, LEIHO ERTZEKO ONTZI FORMA DUEN PLANETAN. @ALIEN LASER-JAURTITZAILE HILTZAILEEZ BETETAKO HORI. @HORRETAZ GAIN, LEKU ZORAGARRIA.

source: HI, LAD. TO GET FATHER ROCKET'S PART YOU'LL HAVE TO HEAD UPWARDS. @LOTS OF HIGH PLATFORMS TO NAVIGATE. THE FIRST IS BEHIND ME. @I'LL STAY DOWN HERE, THANK YOU VERY MUCH.
target: IEPA, LAGUN. AITA SUZIRIREN ZATIAK LORTZEKO GORA JOAN BEHARKO DUZU. @NABIGATZEKO PLATAFORMA ALTU ASKO. LEHENENGOA NIRE ATZEAN DAGO. @HEMEN BEHEAN EGONGO NAIZ, ESKERRIK ASKO BENETAN.

source: NOW NOW. THE PATH CONTINUES TO THE LEFT. @THE GAP'S TOO BIG TO JET ACROSS, THOUGH. @YOU'LL HAVE TO EXTEND A PLATFORM. OR FOLD ONE OUT. @THAT'S REALLY THE FULCRUM OF THE ISSUE.
target: ZER MODUZ? BIDEAK EZKERRERANTZ JARRAITZEN DU. @TARTEA HANDIEGIA DA PROPULTSATUZ PASATZEKO. @PLATAFORMA ZABALDU BEHARKO DUZU. EDO BAT HEDATU. @HORI DA AUZIAREN ILTZEA!

source: YO. PAPA ROCKET'S MISSING PART IS CLOSE BY. @JUST HAVE TO JET YOUR WAY THROUGH A DANGEROUS STRETCH OF SPACE TO GET TO IT. @SUCH IS LIFE.
target: ZU. AITA SUZIRIREN GALDUTAKO ZATIA HURBIL DAGO. @LORTU AHAL IZATEKO ESPAZIOKO EREMU ARRISKUTSU BATETIK BAKARRIK PASATU BEHARKO DUZU. @HORRELAKOA DA BIZITZA.

source: M.B. TO JOT! @YO, JUST CHECKING IN! QUITE A DINGY SPOT YOU'VE FOUND! @THAT THING IN FRONT OF YOU LOOKS LIKE A MINECART... @I BET IT'D ROLL AROUND THAT RAIL IF IT WERE... TILTED. @HAVE FUN, LAD! @MOONBEARD OUT!
target: I.B. JOTI DEIKA! @ZU, ZER MODUZ? LEKU SAKONA AURKITU DUZU GERO! @ZURE PAREKO HORREK MEATZE-ORGA BAT DIRUDI... @APUSTU EGINGO NUKE ERRAIL HORIETAN MUGITUKO DELA... OKERTZEN BADUZU. @ONGI PASA, LAGUN! @ILARGIBIZARREK MOZTU!

source: CRACKING, JOT! @NOW YOU CAN OPEN THAT GATE AND CONTINUE YOUR CLIMB WITH THRASH. @ONWARDS AND UPWARDS, LAD! @MOONBEARD OUT!
target: BIKAINKI, JOT! @ORAIN ATE HORI IREKI ETA THRASEKIN GORANTZ JARRAITU DEZAKEZU. @GORA TA GORA BETI, LAGUN! @ILARGIBIZARREK MOZTU!

source: HOO! THAT WAS KIND OF FUN, DUDE! @HAVEN'T HAD SUCH AN INTENSE DRUMMING WORKOUT FOR A GOOD WHILE... @FEELING PRETTY AMPED!  @LET'S ZIP ON AHEAD!

source: BOOGIE BEACH
WHO'S THAT TICKLING MY TAIL? @YOU SEEM LIKE A FRIENDLY CHAP... @SAY, MAYBE YOU COULD HELP ME OUT? @THERE ARE PESKY CREATURES RUNNING AROUND ON MY BACK AND I CAN'T SEEM TO SWAT THEM OFF.
target: NOR DABIL NIRE BUZTANEAN KILI-KILIAK EGITEN? @AIZU, LAGUNKOIA DIRUDIZU... @ESAN, AGIAN LAGUNDU NAZAKEZU? @IZAKI HIGUINGARRI PILA DABILKIT NIRE BIZKARREAN BUELTAKA ETA EZ NAIZ UXATZEKO GAI.

source: COULD YOU PERHAPS GET RID OF THESE ANNOYING LITTLE THINGS?
target: GAUZA TXIKI NARDAGARRI HORIEK KENDUKO DIZKIDAZU AGIAN?

source: THANK YOU, LITTLE FELLOW! @I CAN THINK AGAIN! @MY MIND IS CLEAR!
target: ESKERRIK ASKO, LAGUN TXIKI! @BERRIZ PENTSATZEKO GAI NAIZ! @NIRE GOGOA ARGI DAGO!

source: BUCCANEER BAY. _____ STRETCHED TO#THE EAST AND WEST
BUCCANEER BAY. [WATER] STRETCHED TO#THE EAST AND WEST
BUCCANEER BAY. [ICE] STRETCHED TO#THE EAST AND WEST
A BOX OF _____ KEPT THIS#STARFISH CHILLED
A BOX OF [WATER] KEPT THIS#STARFISH CHILLED
A BOX OF [ICE] KEPT THIS#STARFISH CHILLED
A LARGE METAL _____
A LARGE METAL [BATTERY]
A LARGE METAL [GOBLIN]
HERE WAS A SOLITARY _____
HERE WAS A SOLITARY [GOBLIN]
HERE WAS A SOLITARY [BATTERY]
THOSE BEASTLY BULLIES! @THEY BURIED MY POOR SWEET HUSBAND IN THE SAND!
target: ASTO ZANPATZAILE HORIEK! @NIRE SENAR MAITEA HAREATAN LURPERATU DUTE!

source: DON'T WORRY MRS STARFISH, WE'LL SOON HAVE YOUR DUDE OUT!
target: EGON LASAI ITSASIZAR ANDREA, LASTER ATERAKO DUGU!

source: OR... NOT... @THAT IS REALLY STURDY SAND...
IT'S BOOGIE SAND. VERY VISCOUS! @EASY TO BURY THINGS, HARD TO DIG 'EM OUT! @YOU BOYS ARE GONNA HAVE A TOUGH TIME, NO MISTAKIN'. @THERE'S ONLY ONE FELLA WHO COULD DIG MY MAN OUT OF THERE... @TUMBA!
target: DANTZHAREA DA. OSO LIKATSUA! @GAUZAK LURPERATZEKO ERRAZA, ATERATZEKO ZAILA! @GOGOR SAIATUTA ERE EZ ZENUKETE ATERATZEA LORTUKO. @IZAKI BAKARRA DAGO NIRE GIZONA HAREA HORRETATIK ATERA AHALKO DUENA... @PALAMENKO

source: TUMBA?
TUMBA! @A LITTLE ROUND FLAIRMINGO, HE IS. GOOD AT DIGGIN'. @FIND TUMBA SO WE CAN DIG UP MY SWEETHEART!
target: PALAMENKO! @DANTZAMENKO TXIKI BOROBIL BAT DA. ZULATZEN OSO ONA. @AURKI EZAZUE PALAMENKO NIRE MAITEA ATERA DEZAN!

source: YOU GOT IT, MRS STARFISH! @... @UH... ANY ADVICE ON WHERE WE'D FIND THIS TUMBA DUDE?
target: ULERTUTA, ITSASIZAR ANDREA! @... @EH... BESTE PALAMENKO HORI NON AURKITU DEZAKEGUN AHOLKUREN BAT?

source: WELL NOW... @AROUND THIS TIME YOU'LL USUALLY FIND HIM NAPPIN' UNDER A TREE. @SLEEPY BIRD, THAT ONE.
target: TIRA, BA... @ORDU HONETAN ZUHAITZEN BATEN AZPIAN AURKITUKO DUZUE SIESTAN. @TXORI LOTIA DUGU HORI.

source: JOT... I'VE BEEN SCOPING THIS PLACE OUT SINCE WE GOT HERE... @DIDN'T SEE ANY ROUND SLEEPY DUDES UNDER ANY TREES... @MAYBE YOU COULD SPOT WHO WE'RE AFTER... @...FROM A DIFFERENT VANTAGE POINT?
target: JOT... AILEGATU GARENETIK NABIL LEKU HAU IKUSKATZEN... @EZ DUT IZAKI BOROBILIK IKUSI ZUHAITZ AZPIAN LOTAN... @AGIAN ZUK IKUSI DEZAKEZU BILATZEN ARI GAREN HORI... @...PUNTU ALTUREN BATETIK BEGIRATUTA?

source: HURRY BOYS, FIND TUMBA!
WHO BE...?? WHAT'S THAT...?! @THERE'S A STARFISH BURIED, HUH? @THIS BE A JOB FOR TUMBA. @YOU LEAD THE WAY!
target: NOR...?? BAINA ZER...?! @ITSAS IZAR BAT LURPERATURIK, EH? @PALAMENKORENTZAT LANA IZAN HAU. @ZUK GIDATU!

source: JOT AND TUMBA#{150}BEHELD...{100}
THE FUNKY LAND OF#{200}BOOGIE BEACH{100}
{150}THE VIBE!!{100} @{150}IT'S BEEN TOTALLY KILLED!!!{100} @...WAIT... @... @FEEL LIKE I BE REPEATIN' MYSELF.
target: {150}GIROA!!{100} @{150}ERABAT AKABATU DUTE!!!{100} @...ITXARON... @... @HAU DAGOENEKO ESAN DUDALA USTE DUT.

source: BAD STUFF HAPPENIN' HUH, SOKA?
YOU BEST BELIEVE IT, TUMBA!
ON MY WAY. STAY SAFE, NOW.
OUR BEACH IS A CHILL PLACE... @DON'T WANT ANYONE DEFROSTIN' THE CHILL!
target: GURE HONDARTZA LEKU LASAIA DA... @EZ DUGU ARAZORIK NAHI!

source: TUMBA!
HOO! THAT STARFISH BEEN BURIED BAD. @LET'S SEE WHAT TUMBA CAN DO.
target: OHH! ITSAS IZAR HORI OSO LURPERATUTA. @EA PALAMENKOK ZER EGIN AHAL.

source: STANLEY! @THANK BOOGIE YOU'RE ALRIGHT!!
... @THE SAND... @... @SO DEEP... @SO... ENDLESS... @MILLIONS OF TINY... PRIMORDIAL... STONES...
STANLEY?
BANGING JOB, TUMBA DUDE!
OCH, IT BE NOTHING. @YOU BOTH HERE TO STOP ALL THE BAD BUSINESS? @HELP YOU, TUMBA WILL. @TUMBA'S NOT BIG, BUT KNOWS THESE BEACHES. @AND HAS A SHOVEL. CAN DIG UP USEFUL THINGS.
target: OH, EZER EZ IZAN. @ZUEK BIAK ARAZO ITSUSIAK MOLDATZERA ETORRI? @ZUEI LAGUNDU, PALAMENKOK. @PALAMENKO EZ HANDIA, BAINA HONDARTZA HAUEK EZAGUTU. @ETA PALA BAT IZAN. GAUZA ERABILGARRIAK ATERA AHAL IZAN.

source: TUMBA DUDE, THAT'D BE RAD. WE COULD USE YOUR HELP.
target: PALAMENKO, LAGUN, HORI ZORAGARRIA LITZATEKE. ZURE LAGUNTZA ESKERTUKO DUGU.

source: YOU GOT IT. LET'S ROLL.
THANK YOU FOR YOUR HELP!
COUNTLESS GRAINS OF SAND... @LIKE MOMENTS IN TIME...
PRESS {Action_Tool_2} TO SELECT THE BOMB STAMP
RIGHT-OH, JOT! @TIME TO SHOW THOSE HUMGRUMPANINNIES WHAT YOUR NEW BOMB STAMP CAN DO! @GET YOURSELF ON TOP OF THAT BOOK!
target: OSO ONGI JOT! @PETRALANGILE HORIEI ZURE BONBA BERRIEK EGIN DEZAKETENA ERAKUSTEKO UNEA DA! @JAR ZAITEZ LIBURU HORREN GAINEAN!

source: MAKE SURE YOU'VE GOT YOUR BOMB STAMP OUT. @THAT'S DONE BY PRESSING ꜻ WHEREVER YOU CAN FIND IT.
target: IZAN EZAZU BONBA ZIGILUA PREST. @HORRETARAKO SAKATU ꜻ AURKITZEN DUZUN LEKUAN.

source: PRESS {Action_Stamp} TO STAMP A BOMB
PRESS {Action_Stamp} TO DETONATE BOMB

MY GOODNESS! @YOU'RE AN UNUSUAL-LOOKING DINOSAUR! @YOU HAVE THE LOOK OF SOMEONE WHO'S ON A MISSION... @YOU'RE PLANNING TO SCALE THE VOLCANO, AREN'T YOU? WELL, IT'S PRETTY DANGEROUS! @TAKE THAT PRIMAL AXE OVER THERE... @IT'LL GIVE YOU THE POWER TO MAKE IT TO THE TOP!
target: ENE BADA! @EZ DIRUDIZU OHIKO DINOSAURO BAT! @MISIOREN BATEAN DABILEN NORBAITEN ITXURA DUZU... @SUMENDIRA IGO NAHIAN ZABILTZA, EZTA? TIRA, OSO ARRISKUTSUA DA! @HARTU HORKO AIZKORA PRIMITIBO HORI... @GORAINO IGOTZEKO INDARRA EMANGO DIZU!

source: GO ON, TAKE THE PRIMAL AXE!
target: SEGI BA, HAR EZAZU AIZKORA  PRIMITIBOA!

source: CAN YOU FEEL THE PRIMAL POWER? @WHAT YOU SEEK LIES AHEAD!
target: ANTZINAKO BOTEREA SENTI DEZAKEZU? @BILA ZABILTZANA AURREAN DAGO!

source: WELL, HELLO! @YOU MANAGED QUITE AN IMPRESSIVE FEAT OF ADVENTURING, GETTING ALL THE WAY UP HERE! @MY NAME'S TIME TIM... A PLEASURE TO MEET YOU!
target: HARA, KAIXO! @SEKULAKOA EGIN DUZU HONA GORAINO AILEGATZEA LORTUTA! @TIM DENBORA DUT IZENA... PLAZERA DA ZU EZAGUTZEA!

source: I'M AN ADVENTURER TOO, YOU KNOW... A TIME TRAVELLER, AS A MATTER OF FACT. @I LIKE TO VISIT ALL POSSIBLE FUTURES AND HISTORIES... TO SEE WHAT I CAN FIND. @HERE I FOUND... LOTS OF POINTY TEETH. AND CLAWS. ALL QUITE THRILLING! @NOW... DON'T LET ME HOLD YOU UP!
target: NI ERE ABENTURAZALEA NAIZ, BADAKIZU? DENBORA-BIDAIARIA, HAIN ZUZEN ERE. @AHAL DITUDAN ETORKIZUN ETA HISTORIA GUZTIAK BISITATZEN DITUT... EA ZER AURKITZEN DUDAN. @HEMEN AURKITU DUT... HORTZ ZORROTZ PILA BAT. ETA ATZAPARRAK. OSO ZIRRARAGARRIA DENA! @TIRA, EZ ZAITUT MOTELDU NAHI!

source: YOU'D BETTER LEAVE THE PRIMAL AXE HERE... @IF IT'S REMOVED, IT COULD ALTER THE COURSE OF HISTORY!
target: HOBE DUZU AIZKORA PRIMITIBOA HEMEN UZTEA... @DESAGERTUZ GERO, HISTORIA ALDA LEZAKE!

source: DON'T GET ME STARTED ON BUTTERFLY EFFECTS!
target: EZ NAZAZU TXIMELETA EFEKTUAZ HIZKETAN HASIARAZI!

source: I'LL BE SEEING YOU, ADVENTURER - ANOTHER TIME!
target: IKUSIKO DUGU ELKAR, ABENTURAZALE... BESTE UNEREN BATEAN!

source: EXCELLENT! @THE TIMELINES ARE ALREADY QUITE MESSY AS THEY ARE, YOU KNOW. @IN RETURN... SOMETHING THAT YOU MAY FIND USEFUL...
target: BIKAIN! @DENBORA LERROAK DAUDEN MODUAN DAGOENEKO NAHIKOA NAHASITA DAUDE, BADAKIZU. @ORDAINETAN... ZURETZAT ERABILGARRIA IZAN DAITEKEEN ZERBAIT...

source: WHOAH, HOLD UP! @YOU DON'T WANT TO GO BACK THERE WITHOUT THE AXE!
target: UOOU, EGON! @EZ DUZU HORRA ITZULI NAHI AIZKORARIK GABE!

source: JUMP {Action_Jump}
ATTACK {Action_Attack}
HMM... THESE HUMGRUMPY DUDES REALLY LOVE THEIR CRATES, HUH? @THEY HAVE A REAL TALENT FOR BLOCKING OUR WAY...
target: HMM... PETRAL HAUEK BENETAN MAITE DITUZTE BERAIEN KAXAK, EH? @GURE BIDEA BLOKEATZEKO SEKULAKO TALENTUA DUTE...

source: TUMBA THINKIN' THERE BE ANOTHER WAY AROUND. @JUNGLE FULL OF HIDDEN PLACES AMONG THE TREES... @YOU CLEAR THE LEAVES, YOU FIND THE WAY.
target: PALAMENKO PENTSATZEN BESTE BIDE BAT EGON INGURUAN. @BASOKO ZUHAITZEN ARTEAN EZKUTUKO LEKU ASKO... @ZUEK HOSTOAK KENDU, ZUEK BIDEA AURKITU.

source: SOUNDS PROMISING! JOT, MAYBE YOU COULD USE THAT OLD PLUCKY PIZZAZZ... @TAKE A LOOK FROM ABOVE... BLAST AWAY SOME OF THE LEAVES?
target: ITXURA ONA DU! JOT, AGIAN ZURE BETIKO AUSARDIA ERABILI DEZAKEZU... @EMAN BISTADIZO BAT GOITIK... ETA LEHERTU HOSTO BATZUK?

source: WATCH OUT AHEAD! THOSE GRUMPIES CAUSING HAVOC... @THEY'VE GOT A GIANT BALLOON! @MAYBE THEY HAVIN' SOME KIND OF A PARTY?
target: KONTUZ! PETRAL HORIEK TXIKIZIOA EGITEN ARI DIRA... @PUXIKA ERRALDOI BAT DUTE! @BEHARBADA NOLABAITEKO FESTAREN BAT DUTE?

source: THIS OIL IS TERRIBLE FOR OUR FEATHERS... @MESSY LOT, THESE GRUMPIES...
target: OLIO HAU GURE HEGALENTZAT OSO TXARRA DA... @PETRAL HAUEK HIGUINGARRIAK DIRA...

source: HUH, LOOKS LIKE HUMGRUMP HAS THIS PLACE LOCKED DOWN... @JOT... LET'S LOWER THAT GATE! @... @SOMEHOW. @... @NOT SURE ON THE DETAILS...
target: HARA, BADIRUDI PETRALTZARREK LEKU HAU ITXI EGIN DUELA... @JOT... JAITSI DEZAGUN ATE HORI! @... @NOLABAIT. @... @XEHETASUNAK EZ DITUT ARGI...

source: ONE OF THOSE BOOMY PORTALS! WAY TO GO, TUMBA DUDE! @JOT CAN USE THESE TO GET AHEAD...
target: ATARI ARRARO HORIETAKO BAT! HORI DUNK ETA, PALAMENKO! @HORRELA JOTEK AURRERA JARRAI DEZAKE...

source: BANGING JOB, JOT!
OUR TROUBLES JUST FLOATED AWAY ON THE BREEZE... @LET'S GET GOING, DUDE!
target: GURE ARAZOAK HAIZE GOZOAREKIN JOAN DIRA... @GOAZEN AURRERA, LAGUNOK!

source: ARRRR YER WENT AND SOLVED THE PUZZLE OF THE BAY, DIDN'T YE. @YERL BE ON YER WAY NOW, NO DOUBT. @WON'T BE LIVIN' WITH ME ON ME ROCK. @ROGER UNDERSTANDS. LIFE ON A ROCK AIN'T FER EVERYONE. @GOOD LUCK, ME HEARTIES!
target: ARRRR, BADIAKO PUZZLEA ARGITU DUZUE, EZTA? @ZUEN BIDEAN JARRAITUKO DUZUE, DUDARIK GABE. @EZ ZARETE NIREKIN ARROKAN BIZIKO. @ROGERREK ULERTZEN DU. ARROKAN BIZITZEA EZ DU MUNDU GUZTIAK MAITE. @ZORTE ON, NIRE AUSARTOK!

source: YO HO.
LOTS OF INTERESTING-LOOKING PLACES IN THE WATER HERE. SHAME YOU CAN'T GET TO THEM. @IF ONLY THE WATER WAS FROZEN SOLID, YOU COULD WALK ACROSS IT... @FROZEN SOLID... IN THIS HEAT? @FANCIFUL.
target: UR HONETAN GAUZA INTERESGARRI ASKO DAGO. PENA EZIN AILEGATZEA. @URA IZOZTUTA BALEGO, GAINEAN IBILI ZINTEZKE... @IZOZTUTA... BERO HONEKIN? @FANTASIA.

source: IF SOME THINGS ARE FROZEN THEN THEY CAN'T BE STRUCK. @YOU HAVE TO UNFREEZE THEM IF YOU WANT TO WHACK THEM. @STANDS TO REASON. @THEN IT'S JUST A CASE OF FINDING ANOTHER ROUTE TO THEM.
target: GAUZAK IZOZTUTA BALDIN BADAUDE, EZIN DIRA JO. @EGURTU NAHI BADITUZU, URTU EGIN BEHARKO DITUZU. @LOGIKOA, EZTA? @BERAIENGANA AILEGATZEKO BESTE BIDE BAT BILATU BEHARKO DUZU.

source: GREETINGS.
I PEEPED THE HAMMER KEY ON THE BOAT OVER TO THE RIGHT THERE. @TO GET INTO THE BOAT, YOU NEED TO EXTEND THAT BRIDGE. @TO EXTEND THE BRIDGE, YOU NEED TO POWER IT WITH A BATTERY. @SOMETHING TO PONDER.
target: ESKUINEAN DAGOEN ITSASONTZIAN IKUSI DUT MAILU GILTZA. @ITSASONTZIRA AILEGATZEKO, ZUBIA LUZATU BEHARKO DUZU. @ZUBIA LUZATZEKO, BATERIA BATEKIN EMAN BEHARKO DIOZU INDARRA. @PENTSATU BEHARREKO KONTUA.

source: THAT BIG METAL GOBLIN... @IF YOU WANT TO DISLODGE IT, YOU MIGHT WANT TO BLAST IT.
target: METALEZKO IRATXO HANDI HORI... @ASKATU NAHI BADUZU, LEHERKETA BAT BEHARKO DUZU.

source: IF YOU BLAST THAT BIG METAL GOBLIN, YOU MIGHT BE ABLE TO ROLL IT AROUND. @SOUNDS FUN.
target: METALEZKO IRATXO HANDI HORI LEHERTZEN BADUZU, AGIAN BIRARAZI AHALKO DUZU. @DIBERTIGARRIA LITZATEKE.

source: WELL, WE HAVE A METAL GOBLIN IN THE BRIDGE'S BATTERY SOCKET. @IF ONLY THE GOBLIN WERE A BATTERY, WE'D BE SET. @HOW TO TURN A GOBLIN INTO A BATTERY? @IT'S AN AGE-OLD QUESTION.
target: ONGI, ZUBIKO BATERIAREN LEKUAN DUGU METALEZKO IRATXOA. @IRATXOA BATERIA BAT IZANGO BALITZ, PREST GEUNDEKE. @NOLA BIHURTU IRATXOA BATERIA BATEAN? @ASPALDIKO GALDERA DA HORI.

source: TO KEEP THAT BRIDGE EXTENDED, YOU NEED TO PLACE SOMETHING ON THE PRESSURE SWITCH. @LIKE WHAT? GOOD QUESTION. @A BATTERY? A BOMB? @JUST THROWING IDEAS OUT HERE.
target: ZUBIA LUZATURIK MANTENTZEKO, PALANKA SAKATZEKO LEKUAN ZERBAIT JARRI BEHARKO DUZU. @ZER? GALDERA ONA. @BATERIA BAT? BONBA BAT? @IDEIAK BOTATZEN, BESTERIK EZ.

source: OH HELLO THERE! WELCOME TO THE DESERT PLAINS, MAN. @WE HAVE LOTS OF CACTI. AND SAND. @AND THIS ORB OF AMBER. @IT BELONGS SOMEWHERE ELSE...FEEL FREE TO TAKE IT!
target: OH, KAIXO! ONGI ETORRI BASAMORTU LAUTADARA, GIZON. @KAKTUS ASKO DITUGU. ETA HAREA. @ETA ANBAR ESFERA HAU. @BESTE NONBAITEKOA DA...HAR EZAZU LASAI EDERREAN!

source: GOOD LUCK ON YOUR JOURNEYS, MAN. @BY THE WAY, I HEARD A RUMOUR... @APPARENTLY THERE'S 'SOMETHING ARTY' ON THE RIGHT SIDE OF THE WINDOW SILL. @SOUNDS GROOVY. FAREWELL, MAN.
target: ZORTE ON ZURE BIDAIAN, GIZON. @BIDENABAR, ZURRUMURRU BAT ENTZUN DUT... @BADIRUDI 'ARTISTIKOA' DEN ZERBAIT DAGOELA LEIHOAREN ESKUINEKO ERTZEAN. @ITXURA ONA DU. IZAN ONGI, GIZON.

source: TUMBA HAS MOTTO... @'WHEN IN DOUBT, DIG.'
target: PALAMENKOK LEMA BAT IZAN... @'ZALANTZA IZAN, ZULOA EGIN.'

source: SOMETHIN' BURIED OVER THERE... @TUMBA HELP YOU UNCOVER IT.
YOU'LL BE WANTING TWO ORBS TO OPEN THAT BIG OLD GATE. @THERE'S ONE TO THE LEFT, IN A DESERT LAND.  @DEFEAT THE ENEMIES TO ENTER THE DESERT. @DON'T GET SAND IN YOUR SOCKS.
target: ATE HANDI ZAHAR HORI IREKITZEKO BI ESFERA BEHARKO DITUZU. @BAT EZKER ALDEAN DAGO, BASAMORTU LURRALDEAN. @GARAITU ARERIOAK BASAMORTUAN SARTU AHAL IZATEKO. @SAIATU ZAITEZ ZURE OINETAKOETAN HAREARIK EZ SARTZEN.

source: ALRIGHT. LOOKS LIKE YOU'LL NEED TWO ORBS TO OPEN THAT BIG GATE. @SAW ONE ORB IN A JUNGLE OVER THERE TO THE RIGHT. @HOPE YOU'RE A FAN OF HUMIDITY AND HEAVY FOLIAGE.
target: EDERKI. BADIRUDI BI ESFERA BEHARKO DITUZULA ATE HANDI HORI IREKITZEKO. @ESKUINEAN DAGOEN BASOAN IKUSI NUEN BAT. @HEZETASUNA ETA HOSTOTZAREN ZALEA IZATEA ESPERO DUT.

source: YO, JOT. THIS T-REX BEHIND ME IS WILD. @DEMOLISHED THE FENCE OUT OF PURE RAGE. @NO REASONING WITH A TYRANNOSAURUS. @BE ON YOUR TOES
target: ZU, JOT. NIRE ATZEKO T-REX HAU BASATIA DA. @HASERRE HUTSEZ PUSKATU DU HESIA. @EZIN DA TIRANOSAURO BATEKIN ARRAZOITU. @KONTUZ IBILI

source: HEYUP. THERE'S A BIG FRIENDLY DINO ON THE LEFT. @CLIMB ONTO THE DINO'S TAIL TO CONTINUE ON YOUR WAY. @REMEMBER TO BE POLITE WHILE YOU'RE SCAMPERING ACROSS ITS BACK.
target: IEPE. DINOSAURO LAGUNKOI HANDI BAT DAGO EZKERREAN. @IGO ZAITEZ BERE ISATSERA ZURE BIDEAN JARRAITZEKO. @GOGORATU ATSEGINA IZATEA BERE BIZKARREAN ZABILTZAN BITARTEAN.

source: HOW DO. THE ITEM YOU'RE SEARCHING FOR IS AT THE TOP OF THIS VOLCANO. @THE VOLCANO IS HEAVING WITH PREHISTORIC BEASTIES. @YOU'LL ONLY SURVIVE BY RELEASING YOUR INNER CAVEMAN. @GET PRIMAL, LAD.
target: ZE MARTXA. BILA ZABILTZAN OBJEKTUA SUMENDI HONEN TONTORREAN DAGO. @SUMENDIA HISTORIAURREKO PIZTIEZ JOSITA DAGO. @BIZIRAUN NAHI BADUZU, ZURE BARRUKO TROGLODITA ATERA BEHARKO DUZU. @IZAN PRIMITIBO, LAGUN.

source: REAL ODD, DUDE... ONE MOMENT WE WERE STUCK OUT THERE... @THE NEXT, WE WERE BACK ON LAND!
target: OSO BITXIA, TXO... UNE BATEZ HOR KANPOAN TRABATURIK GAUDE... @ETA BAPATEAN LURREAN BUELTAN!

source: I THINK A GUST OF WIND MUST HAVE BLOWN US HERE...
MAJORLY CONVENIENT GUST!
THE WAY BE CLEAR. @ON WE GO.
AN EXPLOSIVE DEVELOPMENT... YOU ACQUIRED THE BOMB STAMP! @GET BACK TO YOUR BOOK AND CAUSE SOME SHOCKWAVES! @THE PATH BACK IS THROUGH HERE, PLUCKY SQUIRE...
target: APARTEKO BERRIA... BONBA ZIGILUA LORTU DUZU! @ITZUL ZAITEZ ZURE LIBURURA ETA SORTU ISKANBILA PIXKA BAT! @BERTARAKO BIDEA HEMENTXE DUZU, EZKUTARI AUSARTA...

source: GREEN GRUMPIES! WITH CROSSBOWS, HUH? @BRING IT ON!
HEAVING WITH GRUMP-HEADS! @WELL... LET'S GIVE THESE GRUMP-HEADS THE HEAVE-HO!
target: HAU PETRALKIDEZ BETETA DAGO! @TIRA... EMAN DIEZAIEGUN MEREZI DUTENA!

source: WHOAH, THRASH... @PRETTY IMPRESSIVE COMBAT MOVES! @WHEN DID LAID-BACK THRASH TURN INTO A BRAWLER??
target: UAU, THRASH... @EGUNDOKOA IZAN DA! @NOIZTIK DA THRASH LASAI HORRELAKO GERLARIA??

source: WELL, YOU KNOW, I KIND OF REACHED MY LIMIT WITH THESE GRUMPY DUDES... @YOU CAN ONLY PUSH A MOUNTAIN TROLL SO FAR. @I THOUGHT IT WAS TIME TO LET MY DRUMSTICKS DO THE TALKING!
target: ZERA, TIPO PETRAL HAUEK NIRE ONETIK ATERATZEN NAUTE... @MENDIKO TROLLAK BADITU BERE MUGAK. @NIRE BAKETEK HITZ EGITEKO UNEA AILEGATU DELA IRUDITU ZAIT!

source: GOOD FIGHTIN'. NOW ON WE GO.
HEARD YOU'RE LOOKING FOR A SLEEPY FELLOW UNDER A TREE... @TURN THE BOOK'S PAGES TO LOCATE HIM, LAD! @MOONBEARD OUT!
target: ZUHAITZ AZPIAN LOTAN DAGOEN NORBAITEN BILA ZABILTZATELA ENTZUN DUT... @MUGITU LIBURUAREN ORRIAN AURKITZEKO, LAGUN! @ILARGIBIZARREK MOZTU!

source: CLASH AT THE CASTLE!
CHAPTER EIGHT
THE GANG ARRIVED AT ARTIA
TO SEE THE AFTERMATH OF A#{150}GREAT BATTLE{100}
THE ARMY OF ARTIA HAD BEEN#THOROUGHLY DEFEATED BY#{150}HUMGRUMP'S FORCES!
THE ARTIAN GUARD STANDS NO MORE! @HUMGRUMP'S FORCES... THE METAL BEASTS... ALL TOO MUCH... @I WASN'T... STRONG ENOUGH... @PLUCKY SQUIRE... GO! DEFEND THE CASTLE! @PROTECT... THE QUEEN!
target: ARTIAKO ZAINDARIAK ERORI EGIN DIRA! @PETRALTZARREN ARMADA... METALEZKO PIZTIAK... GEHIEGI IZAN DA... @EZ NAIZ... NAHIKOA INDARTSUA... @EZKUTARI AUSARTA... JOAN! DEFENDATU GAZTELUA! @BABESTU... ERREGINA

source: WHOAHH... HUMGRUMP'S MINIONS HAVE REALLY DONE A NUMBER ON THIS PLACE...
target: UAAUUU... PETRALTZARREN MORROIEK BENETAN JOKALDI ZIKINA EGIN DUTE HEMEN...

source: MY TOWN! THIS IS A DISASTER!
GAHHHH!! HORRID BRUTES!
HUMGRUMPIES EVERYWHERE!
SOMEONE HAS TO TEACH THESE HUMGRUMPIES THAT IT'S NOT COOL TO BULLY...
target: NORBAITEK IRAKATSI BEHARKO DIE MORROI HORIEI ZAPALTZEA EZ DAGOELA ONGI...

source: LOOK AT YOUR FANCY TOWN NOW! HUHUHUHUH
target: BEGIRATU ZUEN HERRI DOTOREARI ORAIN! JUJUJUJUJ

source: WE'LL SHOW YOU 'HORRID', YOU ENTITLED LITTLE BRATS!!!
target: ERAKUTSIKO DIZUEGU ZER DEN 'ZAKARRA', MUKITSU ERGELAK!!!

source: IT'S OUR TOWN NOW. WE'LL MAKE IT NICE AND COMFY, YOU'LL SEE.
target: GURE HERRIA DA ORAIN. OSO POLIT ETA EROSO UTZIKO DUGU, IKUSIKO DUZUE.

source: {150}YOU'D BETTER GET LOST!{100}

target: GEHIEEEGI... BAINA HORREK MOTELDU EGITEN DITU... @PIP AZKARRARENTZAT ONA DA HORI!

source: PHEW, HOW MUCH PAPERWORK DO THESE GUYS NEED?
target: FIU, ZENBAT PAPER-LAN BEHAR DUTE TIPO HAUEK?

source: THE {125}THIRD{100} DATA CENTRE#LAY AHEAD OF THE#BAND OF MISCREANTS
ONCE AGAIN#THE WRETCHED#RODENT#PREPARED TO#SCUTTLE THROUGH.
{125}HOWEVER{100}#THE GUARDS#WOULD NOW#CERTAINLY#APPREHEND#THEIR PREY
HAVING RECENTLY#UNDERGONE EXTENSIVE#TRAINING IN THEIR#CORE COMPETENCIES
target: IZAN ERE,#BERRIKI OSATUA ZUTEN#OINARRIZKO KONPETENTZIEN#PROGRAMA ZABALA

source: WELL WHAT A GREAT LOAD#OF GOOD ALL THE GUARD'S#TRAINING HAD DONE
target: EGINDAKO ENTRENAMENDU#GUZTIAK ZAINDARIEI#ASKORAKO BALIO IZAN ZIEN

source: A STELLAR JOB#ALL ROUND#STOPPING THE#WRETCHED RODENT#FROM GETTING PAST#AND GRANTING#ACCESS TO HIS#CHUMS
THE TROOPS WOULD#SURELY BE COMMENDING#EACH OTHER FOR THEIR#FLAWLESS PERFORMANCE
target: SOLDADUAK ZIUR#ELKAR ZORIONTZEN#ARI ZIRELA#EGINDAKO LAN APARTAGATIK

source: FROM THE BOTTOM#OF THE PIT INTO#WHICH THEY WOULD#SOON BE BANISHED.
GOOD SNEAKING, PIP!
IMPRESSED BY YOUR RHYTHM, DUDE!
LOOK! OVER THERE... @THAT'S AN ELEVATOR!
AN ELEVATOR... @IT'S A BOX ON A STRING THAT GOES UP AND DOWN. @IT'S OUR WAY UP TO THE SURFACE! @IF WE CAN DEFEAT ALL THESE GRUMPS WE'LL BE ON OUR WAY OUT OF DEEPDOOM!
target: IGOGAILU BAT... @SOKA BATETIK ZINTZILIK GORA ETA BEHERA DABILEN KAXA BAT DA. @GAINAZALERAKO GURE BIDEA DA! @PETRAL HAUEK GUZTIAK GARAITUZ GERO GALBIDE SAKONETIK ATERAKO GARA!

source: I MISS THE SKY...
C'MON, LET'S RUMBLE!
WE MADE IT!
LET'S GO!
METAL!!
ELEVATOR!
THE PALACE... IT'S... HIDEOUS! @THAT HUMGRUMP... I HAVE NEVER KNOWN ANYONE WITH A WORSE SENSE OF AESTHETICS.
target: PALAZIOA... ZEINEN... ZATARRA! @PETRALTZAR HORI... EZ DUT INOIZ ESTETIKA-SENA OKERRAGOA DUEN INOR IKUSI.

source: MAJOR DOWNGRADE...
YEAHH... I MEAN... HUMGRUMP HAS VERY BAD TASTE. @WHICH IS FUNNY, BECAUSE MOONBEARD HAS SUCH GREAT STYLE.
target: BAAI... ZERA... PETRALTZARREK GUSTU KAXKARRA DU. @BITXIA DA, ILARGIBIZARREK SEKULAKO ESTILOA BAITU.

source: I STILL CAN'T BELIEVE THEY'RE RELATED...
WHAT'S HUMGRUMP'S DEAL WITH PLASTERING HIS LOGO EVERYWHERE? @IT'S SO... GARISH!
target: ZERGATIK JARRI BEHAR DU PETRALTZARREK BERE AURPEGIA ALDE GUZTIETAN? @OSO... DEIGARRIA DA!

source: DUDE REALLY LOVES THAT MARK, HUH...
target: ATENTZIOA EMATEA GUSTUKO DU TIPOAK, EH...

source: WHAT'S IT SUPPOSED TO BE, ANYWAY?
I ALWAYS THOUGHT IT WAS... AN AXE HEAD. YOU KNOW - SOMETHING SHARP AND NASTY.
target: NIK BETI PENTSATU IZAN DUT ZELA... AIZKORAREN BURUA. BADAKIZUE, ITSUSIA ETA ZORROTZA.

source: REALLY? IT'S GOT TO BE A 'H', FOR HUMGRUMP, RIGHT?
target: BENETAN? NIK 'H' BAT ZELA USTE NUEN, NORBAITEK BADAKI BERE BEREZKO IZENA?

source: NOPE.
IT'S NEITHER OF THOSE THINGS. @THE DESIGN... IT COMES FROM EVENTS IN HUMGRUMP'S PAST.
target: EZ DA HORIETAKO EZER ERE. @DISEINUA... PETRALTZARREN IRAGANEKO KONTUETATIK DATOR.

source: AND THAT'S THE STORY BEHIND HUMGRUMP'S LOGO.
target: ETA HORI DA PETRALTZARREN LOGOAREN ISTORIOA.

source: HE MUST HAVE BEEN A SENSITIVE SOUL. NOT ABLE TO GET OVER HIS REJECTION...
target: ESPIRITU OSO SENTIKORRA IZANGO DU. GAITZESPENARI AURRE EGIN EZIN IZAN ZIONA...

source: WHY DIDN'T HE JUST... YOU KNOW... TRY AND GET BETTER AT WRITING POETRY? @I WAS A RUBBISH DRUMMER AT FIRST. EVERYONE'S RUBBISH AT FIRST!
target: ZERGATIK EZ OTE ZUEN... BADAKIZU... JARRAITU ETA POEMA HOBEAK IDAZTEN SAIATZEN? @BATERIA JOLE ESKASA NINTZEN HASIERAN. GUZTIOK GARA TXARRAK HASIERAN!

source: HE WAS TOO PROUD FOR THAT... @BETTER TO BLAME THE WORLD THAN TRY AND IMPROVE HIMSELF. @MOONBEARD OFFERED HIS BROTHER HELP, BUT HUMGRUMP SAW THIS AS A HUMILIATION. @HE FLEW INTO A RAGE... HE SAID HE DIDN'T NEED ANY HELP... HE'D GO IT ALONE. @SO THAT'S WHAT HE DID. @EVEN NOW, SO MANY YEARS LATER... THE RESENTMENT AND ENVY STILL BURNS WITHIN HIM. @HE HAS TORN DOWN THE WORLD THAT REJECTED HIM, AND CREATED A NEW ONE OF HIS OWN. @A NEW TALE... ALL ABOUT HIM.
target: HORRETARAKO HARROEGIA ZEN... @MUNDUARI ERRUA BOTATZEA BERE BURUA HOBETZEA BAINO AUKERA HOBEA IRUDITU ZITZAION. @ILARGIBIZARREK ANAIARI LAGUNTZA ESKAINI ZION, BAINA PETRALTZARRENTZAT UMILIAZIOA ZEN. @ETA AMORRUZ BETE ZEN... LAGUNTZARIK EZ ZUELA BEHAR ESAN ZUEN... BAKARRIK EGINGO ZUELA. @ETA HORIXE EGIN ZUEN. @ORAIN ERE, URTEAK PASA ONDOREN... ERRESUMINAK ETA INBIDIAK BARRUTIK ERRETZEN DUTE. @BERA BAZTERTU ZUEN MUNDUA URRATU ETA BERE PROPIO SORTU DU. @BERARI BURUZKO... IPUIN BERRI BAT.

source: WELL... IT SUCKS.
DEFINITELY PREFER HOW IT WAS BEFORE.
target: LEHENAGO ZENA NAHIAGO DUT ZALANTZARIK GABE.

source: AGREED. SO, WE HAVE TO TRY AND CHANGE THIS PLOTLINE BACK. @AND THAT MEANS CONFRONTING ITS STARRING CHARACTER... @HUMGRUMP! @COME ON... LET'S ENTER THE PALACE.
target: ERABAT ADOS. HORREGATIK ISTORIOARI BUELTA EMATEN SAIATU BEHAR DUGU. @HORRETARAKO TOKATUKO ZAIGUNA IZANGO DA ISTORIOKO PROTAGONISTAREN AURKA JOATEA... @PETRALTZARRENGANA! @TIRA BA... GOAZEN PALAZIO BARRURA.

source: WE'RE GETTING DEEP INTO HUMGRUMP'S DOMAIN NOW. @LET'S BE ON OUR TOES!
target: PETRALTZAR EREMUAN ERABAT SARTU GARA. @IBIL GAITEZEN KONTUZ!

source: UH... WELL, THIS IS A WEE BIT UNNERVING...
target: EH... TIRA, HAU NAHIKO BELDURGARRIA DA...

source: OH THAT'S RIGHT! YOU HATE SNAKES, DON'T YOU, THRASH?
target: OH EGIA DA! SUGEAK GORROTO DITUZU, EZTA THRASH?

source: I DON'T LOVE THEM.
YOU {125}THRASHED {100}THEM.
{75}DID YOU LIKE MY PUN?
I THINK WE TOOK CARE OF ALL OF THEM...
LOOKS PRETTY DARK DOWN THERE.
I MEAN... IT'S PRETTY DARK UP HERE TOO.
target: TIRA... HOR GOIAN ERE ILUN SAMAR DAGO.

source: FAIR POINT. @WELL... THIS WAY LEADS TO HUMGRUMP. @SO WE DESCEND!
target: EGIA DA, BAI. @TIRA... HEMENDIK PETRALTZARRENGANA GOAZ. @GOAZEN BA BEHERA!

source: WE'RE CLOSE. I CAN FEEL IT IN MY WHISKERS. @THERE'S SOMETHING... WAITING... THROUGH THAT DOOR. @THAT CREEPY OLD GRUMP IS RIGHT, YOU KNOW... @HE DOES CONTROL THE REALITY OF THE BOOK NOW. @I CAN'T LIE TO YOU... GOING UP AGAINST HIM... @OUR ODDS AREN'T... GREAT. @ARE YOU SURE YOU'RE READY TO STEP THROUGH THE DOOR?
target: HURBIL GAUDE. NIRE BIBOTEETAN NABARI DUT. @ZERBAIT DUGU... ZAIN... ATE HORREN ATZEAN. @PETRAL ZAHAR BELDURGARRI HORI ZUZEN DAGO, BADAKIZUE? @BERAK DU LIBURUAREN ERREALITATEAREN KONTROLA. @EZIN DIZUET GEZURRIK ESAN... BERE AURKA JOANDA... @EZ DUGU AUKERA HANDIRIK... @ZIUR AL ZAUDETE ATEA IGAROTZEKO PREST GAUDELA?

source: OUR CHANCES MAY BE SLIM... BUT... @I DON'T WANT TO LIVE IN ANY PLOTLINE THAT HUMGRUMP CONTROLS. @SO... @HOWEVER WE CAN STOP THAT... @THAT'S WHAT WE HAVE TO DO.
target: GURE AUKERAK ESKASAK IZAN DAITEZKE... BAINA... @EZ DUT PETRALTZARREK KONTROLATZEN DUEN ISTORIAN BIZI NAHI. @BERAZ... @HORI GELDITZEKO MODURIK BADAGO... @HORI DA EGIN BEHAR DUGUNA.

source: NOT TURNING BACK NOW. @WE'RE IN. @FOR ARTIA!
ALRIGHT. WELL... @HERE GOES NOTHING.
CAN WE...? @OH! WE CAN TALK AGAIN!
{150}PHEW!!!{100}@THAT WAS THE FREAKIEST THING.
AMAZING WORK, PEOPLE! @HUMGRUMP SERVED HARD, BUT WE SMASHED RIGHT BACK.
target: LAN BIKAINA, LAGUNAK! @PETRALTZARREK GOGOR SAKATU DU, BAINA GOGORRAGO ITZULI DIOGU.

source: THREE ROUNDS TO THE MOJAM CREW!
THE GAME'S NOT OVER YET, THOUGH, IS IT? @I CAN STILL FEEL HIM WATCHING US...
target: JOKOA ORAINDIK EZ DA AMAITU, EZTA? @NOLA BEGIRATZEN GAITUEN NABARI DEZAKET...

source: YOU'RE RIGHT. WE'RE ABOUT TO ENTER THE FINAL ROUND. @HE'S HERE... BEHIND THAT DOOR.
target: ZUZEN ZAUDE. AZKEN ROUNDA GELDITZEN ZAIGU. @HEMEN DAGO... ATEAREN ATZEAN.

source: THEN LET'S GO MEET HIM. @WHATEVER HAPPENS... I'M HAPPY TO HAVE MADE A STAND... @...WITH MY FRIENDS.
target: GOAZEN BADA BEREGANA. @EDOZER GERTATUTA ERE... OSO HARRO NAGO NIRE LAGUNEKIN... @BERARI AURRE EGITEAZ.

source: SAME. @THE FINEST DUDES IN ALL OF MOJO.
target: BAITA NI ERE. @MOJOKO LAGUNIK ONENAK GARA.

source: GAME FACES ON. @LET'S GO.
OH! WHAT COULD IT BE? @I HEAR A STEP UPON MY FLOOR... @THE STEPPING FEET OF TRAITORS, FOUR.
target: OH! ZER OTE DA HAU? @NIRE LURREAN PAUSUAK ENTZUTEN DITUT... @LAU TRAIDORE ZIKINEN PAUSUAK.

source: LOOK... WHAT... CREPT... RIGHT THROUGH... @...MY DOOR.
target: BEGIRA... ZER... SARTU... DEN NIRE... @...ATEAREN AZPITIK.

source: HUMGRUMP! @WE'RE HERE ON BEHALF OF THE PEOPLE OF MOJO! @WE'VE COME TO TAKE BACK THIS LAND!
target: PETRALTZAR! @MOJOKO BIZTANLEEN IZENEAN GAUDE HEMEN! @LURRALDE HAU BERRESKURATZERA ETORRI GARA!

source: {150}OHHHHHHHHH.{100} @OH. OH. OH. I SEEEEEEEE. @WELL IF THE MOUSE SAYS SO... @THEN... I WILL HAVE TO GIVE IT SOME {125}SERIOUS{100} CONSIDERATION. @... @... @OK, I'VE SERIOUSLY CONSIDERED. @THE ANSWER IS... @THAT'S SERIOUSLY NOT HAPPENING.
target: {150}OHHHHHHHHH.{100} @OH. OH. OH. BAAAI. @TIRA, SAGUAK HALA BADIO... @ORDUAN... KONTU HAU {125}SERIOSKI{100} PENTSATU BEHARKO DUT. @... @... @ONGI, SERIOSKI PENTSATU DUT. @ERANTZUNA DA... @SERIOSKI HORI EZ DELA GERTATUKO.

source: OW. @BOGUS.
LET US GO, HUMGRUMP! @HAVEN'T YOU DONE ENOUGH HARM? @TO MOJO? TO... YOUR OWN BROTHER? @WHERE DOES IT END?
target: UTZIGUZU JOATEN, PETRALTZAR! @EZ AL DUZU NAHIKO KALTE ERAGIN? @MOJORI? ZURE... ANAIARI? @NON BUKATUKO DA?

source: WELL, I'D SAY... THAT THIS STORY ENDS... HERE. @BUT NOT THE TALE ABOUT ME... OH NO, NO, NO... @THAT STILL HAS MANY MAGNIFICENT CHAPTERS STILL TO BE WRITTEN. @RATHER, THE ONE ABOUT THE PEPPY PROTEGES OF MY WONDERFUL BROTHER.
target: ZERA, ESANGO NUKE... ISTORIO HAU... HEMEN BUKATZEN DELA. @BAINA EZ NIRI BURUZKO IPUINA... OH EZ, EZ, EZ... @HORREK ORAINDIK SEKULAKO KAPITULUAK DITU IDAZTEKE. @BAIZIK ETA NIRE ANAIAREN BABESEKO TXEPELEN ISTORIOA.

source: AMONG THEM... THE PLUCKY SQUIRE. @DIDN'T YOU USED TO BE SOMEONE? @YOU WERE QUITE THE STARRING CHARACTER AROUND THESE CHAPTERS. @FUNNY HOW THINGS CAN CHANGE. FROM HERO TO HAS-BEEN IN THE TURN OF A PAGE. @I WILL SO ENJOY GIVING YOUR TALE... @...ALL OF YOUR TALES... @A FITTING ENDING. @YOU SEE... YOU DO SO IRRITATE ME. @YOUR YOUTH, YOUR ENTITLEMENT... YOUR POTENTIAL... @IT WILL BE A PLEASURE TO END THAT POTENTIAL... RIGHT HERE AND NOW.
target: HAIEN ARTEAN DAGO... EZKUTARI AUSARTA. @ZU EZ AL ZINEN... NORBAIT? @KAPITULU HAUETAKO PROTAGONISTA IZAN OHI ZINEN. @BITXIA DA GAUZAK NOLA ALDATZEN DIREN. HEROI IZATETIK HER-OHI IZATERA ORRIA PASATUTA. @POZARREN EMANGO DIET ZURE IPUINEI... @ZURE IPUIN GUZTIEI... @BUKAERA EGOKIA. @EZ DAKIZU NOLA SUMINTZEN NAUZUN. @ZURE GAZTETASUNA, ESKUBIDEAK... POTENTZIALA... @PLAZERA IZANGO DA POTENTZIAL HORREKIN BUKATZEA... HEMEN ETA ORAIN.

source: I WILL BURN YOU ALIVE, JUST LIKE I DID...
AHA! FAST ASLEEP. @NAP TIME FOR THE GRUMPY BABY.
target: AJA! LO SEKO. @SIESTA ORDUA UME PETRALARENTZAT.

source: YO!
NOW... LET'S SEE WHAT WE CAN DO ABOUT THIS NASTY MAGICAL CAGE.
target: EA BA... ZER EGIN OTE DEZAKEGU KAIOLA MAGIKO HONEKIN.

source: MOONBEARD!
YOU'RE... REALLY HERE!!!
BUT... HOW??? @I THOUGHT YOU WERE... WERE... GONE??
target: BAINA... NOLA??? @USTE NUEN ZU... ZU... HILDA ZEUNDELA??

source: SNAP! I WAS PRETTY SURE IT WAS CURTAINS FOR MOONBEARD, TOO. @BUT IT WAS NOT SO...
target: KONTXO! NIK ERE NIRE ORDUA AILEGATU ZELA USTE NUEN. @BAINA EZ ZEN HALA IZAN...

source: AND THAT'S HOW MOONBEARD GOT HIS FORM BACK. @YOU KNOW... VIOLET... @THE MAGIC THAT REFORMED ME... IT WAS THE VERY POTION THAT WE COOKED UP TOGETHER IN MY LAB. @THE POTION OF REBINDING! @I'M VERY GLAD I DRANK THAT CONCOCTION... IT SAVED MY LIFE.
target: ETA HORRELA LORTU ZUEN ILARGIBIZARREK BERE FORMA BERRESKURATZEA. @BADAKIZU... VIOLET... @BERREGIN NINDUEN MAGIA... NIRE LABORATEGIAN ELKARREKIN EGIN GENUEN EDABEA IZAN ZEN. @BERLOTZEKO EDABEA! @IZUGARRI POZTEN NAIZ HORI EDAN IZANAZ... BIZITZA SALBATU ZIDAN.

source: I'M... I'M JUST GLAD I COULD HAVE HELPED.
target: NI... LAGUNDU AHAL IZATEAZ POZTEN NAIZ.

source: YOUR ASSISTANCE HAS BEEN ESSENTIAL, VIOLET. @ALL OF YOU!
target: ZURE LAGUNTZA BEREBIZIKOA IZAN DA, VIOLET. @ZUEK GUZTIONA!

source: WHAT'S WITH THE NEW LOOK, M.B.?
AH, THRASH! YOU KNOW, IT'S A FUNNY THING... @WHEN I WAS REFORMED, THE PIGMENTS IN MY INK WERE DISSOLVED... @LEAVING ME... UTTERLY COLOURLESS. @I AM CLASSIC MOONBEARD NO MORE. @NOW, I AM...
target: AH, THRASH! KONTU DIBERTIGARRIA DA... @BERREGIN NINTZENEAN, NIRE TINTA PIGMENTUAK DISOLBATU EGIN ZIREN... @NI... KOLORERIK GABE UTZIAZ. @JADA EZ NAIZ ILARGIBIZAR KLASIKOA. @ORAIN NAIZ...

source: RAD!! YOU LOOK PRETTY METAL. @AND... MINIBEARD? @WHY'S HE GOT THAT COLOURLESS LOOK? @THAT LITTLE DUDE WENT THROUGH ALL OF THIS, TOO?
target: ONA!! OSO METALERO ITXURA DUZU. @ETA... MINILARGI? @ZERGATIK DAGO BERA ERE KOLORERIK GABE? @BERARI ERE ZURE GAUZA BERA GERTATU ZAIO?

source: OH NO, NO, NO. @NOTHING HAPPENED TO MINIBEARD. @NO, HE WAS OUT ROLLER SKATING WHEN ALL OF THIS WENT DOWN. @I THINK HE CHANGED OUTFITS A MINUTE OR TWO AGO TO COORDINATE.
target: OH EZ, EZ, EZ. @MINILARGIRI EZ ZAIO EZER GERTATU. @EZ, HAU DENA GERTATU ZENEAN HOR ZEHAR PATINATZEN ARI ZEN. @BERE ITXURA ORAIN DELA MINUTU BAT EDO BI ALDATU DU, KOORDINATZEKO.

source: ROLLER SKATING.

IT WAS REALLY QUITE A TREK FROM THAT SHEET OF KITCHEN ROLL BACK TO THIS WORLD. @PAGE THE BOOKWORM HELPED ME ON THE WAY. @GOOD OLD PAGE. @ANYWAY, I'M BACK NOW, AND FROM THE LOOK OF HUMGRUMP'S ANTICS, NOT A MOMENT TOO SOON!
target: SUKALDEKO PAPER HORTATIK MUNDU HONETARA ITZULTZEA... HORI ODISEA. @PAGE PAPERJALEAK BIDEAN LAGUNDU NAU. @ZE JATORRA DEN PAGE. @EDONOLA ERE, BUELTAN NAIZ, ETA PETRALTZARREK NAHASI DUENA IKUSITA, UNE EGOKIAN ETORRI NAIZ!

source: OH, THAT IS GROSS.
THE GAMES END HERE. @MY TRANSFORMATION... IS AT HAND. @I CANNOT... UNNNGH... STOP IT... ANY LONGER! @THIS SILLY LITTLE BOOK... @IT WAS NEVER ENOUGH FOR ME.
target: HEMEN BUKATZEN DIRA JOLASAK. @NIRE TRANSFORMAZIOA... ESKUAN DUT. @EZIN DIOT... UNNNGH... GEHIAGO... EUTSI! @IPUINTXO ERGEL H AU... @EZ DA INOIZ NAHIKOA IZAN NIRETZAT.

source: I HAVE GRANDER DESIGNS. @THE OUTSIDE... RRRGGHH... WORLD... @THAT IS WHAT I NOW... DESIRE... @I... WILL... SEIZE... EVERYTHING... OUT THERE... @AND I WILL BURN THIS LITTLE BOOK TO ASH...
target: PLAN ANBIZIOTSUAGOAK DITUT. @KANPOKO... RRRGGHH... MUNDUA... @HORI DA NIK... NAHI DUDANA... @KANPOAN... DAGOEN... GUZTIA... MENDERATUKO... DUT... @ETA LIBURU TXIKI HAU ERRAUSTU EGINGO DUT...

source: IT IS TIME... AHHHHHHHHH... @TO FINALLY FULFILL... GNNNNNGHHH... @MY POTENTIAL!!
target: HELDU DA GARAIA... AHHHHHHHHHH... @AZKENEAN LEHERTZEKO... GNNNNNGHHH... @NIRE POTENTZIALA!!

source: DRAT! HE'S GIVEN US THE SLIP! @IT'S THAT METAMAGIC... IT'S JUST TOO POWERFUL. @AS LONG AS HE HAS THAT STAFF IN HIS GRUBBY HANDS... @...HE'LL ALWAYS BE ABLE TO PULL SOME KIND OF MISCHIEF. @THIS TIME HE'S LEAPT STRAIGHT OUT OF OUR WORLD! @JOT!
target: KAKA! ALDE EGIN DIGU! @METAMAGIA HORI DA... BOTERETSUEGIA DA. @BERE MAKULU HORI ESKUARTEAN DUEN BITARTEAN... @...BETI IZANGO DU GAIZTAKERIAK EGITEKO AUKERA. @ETA ORAINGOAN GURE MUNDUTIK ATERA DA! @JOT!

source: JOT... GOOD LUCK OUT THERE!
WE BELIEVE IN YOU. YOU CAN DO IT.
TRARRGSPEED, DUDE!

AMAZING WORK, LAD! @I WAS WATCHING YOU BATTLING THAT MONSTROUS... BUTTERGRUMP... @YOU KNOW, MY BROTHER'S STAFF... IT'S BEEN DESTROYED! @AND SO, HIS POWER... IS GONE. @AND HE IS BANISHED. PERHAPS... IT WILL GIVE HIM TIME... @...TO FINALLY REFLECT ON THINGS.
target: LAN ITZELA, LAGUN! @MUNSTRO HORRI AURRE NOLA EGITEN ZENION IKUSI DUT... @GOGORATZEN DUZU NIRE ANAIAREN MAKULUA? DEUSEZTATU EGIN DA! @ETA HORRELA, BERE BOTEREA... JOAN EGIN DA. @ETA BERA DESERRIRATUA IZAN DA. AGIAN... HORREK EMANGO DIO... @GAUZEI BURUZ PENTSATZEKO DENBORA.

source: {125}AND GOOD RIDDANCE TO YOU!!!
YOUR MAJESTY!
MOONBEARD! PIP! KIDS! @YOU'RE ALL OK!! @I AM SO HAPPY TO SEE YOU!
target: ILARGIBIZAR! PIP! HAURRAK! @DENAK ONGI ZAUDETE! @ASKO POZTEN NAIZ ZUEK IKUSTEAZ!

source: LIKEWISE, YOUR MAJESTY!

MURAL AND I HAVE BEEN IMPRISONED IN THIS MISERABLE PALACE... @OH, FOR SO LONG... @BUT JUST NOW... HUMGRUMP'S TROOPS... THEY BEGAN TO PANIC... @TO SCATTER! @I CAN FEEL... SOMEHOW... THAT WIZARD'S DARK POWER... HAS DISSIPATED.
target: MURAL ETA NI PRESO IZAN GAITUZTE PALAZIO ZATAR HONETAN... @OH, DENBORA LUZEZ... @BAINA ORAINTXE... PETRALTZARREN SOLDADUAK... BELDURTZEN HASI DIRA... @ETA IHES EGIN DUTE! @NOLABAIT... SENTI DEZAKET... AZTI HORREN BOTERE ILUNA... DESAGERTU EGIN DELA.

source: JUST SO, YOUR HIGHNESS. @JOT DEFEATED HUMGRUMP, AND DESTROYED HIS METAMAGIC STAFF. @THAT GREASY WEASEL'S POWER IS GONE!
target: HALA DA, MAIESTATEA. @JOTEK PETRALTZAR GARAITU DU ETA BERE MAKULU METAMAGIKOA DEUSEZTATU DU. @GAIZTO MALTZUR HORREN BOTEREA JOAN EGIN DA!

source: JOT... HOW CAN I THANK YOU ENOUGH? @ONCE AGAIN... THE LAND IS INDEBTED TO ITS CHAMPION.
target: JOT... NOLA ESKERTU DIEZAZUKET? @BERRIZ ERE... LURRALDEA BERE HEROIAREKIN ZORRETAN DAGO.

source: VIOLET, THRASH, PIP... THEY ALL STOOD UP IN MOJO'S TIME OF NEED. @THEY ALL DID THEIR PART!
target: VIOLET, THRASH, PIP... MOJOK BEHAR HANDIENA ZUENEAN AURRERAPAUSUA EMAN DUTE. @DENEK HARTU DUTE PARTE!

source: YOU BECAME THE WARRIORS THAT MOONBEARD KNEW YOU COULD BECOME. @I'M PROUD OF YOU ALL.
target: AZKENEAN ILARGIBIZARREK ESATEN ZUEN GERLARIAK BIHURTU ZARETE. @ZUETAZ OSO HARRO NAGO.

source: IT WAS NOTHING, YOUR HIGHNESS!
NO TROUBLE AT ALL, REALLY!
NOW THEN. @LET'S GET OUT OF THIS CREEPY PALACE...
target: ETA ORAIN. @ATERA GAITEZEN PALAZIO ZATAR HONETATIK...

source: YOUR MAJESTY... @THAT SOUNDS LIKE AN EXCELLENT IDEA. @WE HAVE A LAND TO REBUILD!
target: BERORREN MAIESTATEA... @IDEA ZORAGARRIA DA HORI. @BERRERAIKI BEHARREKO LURRALDEA DUGU!

source: YOUNG ONES... @LEAD THE WAY!
{150}MOONBEARD THE MONOCHROMATIC!{100}

THIS IS A JOB FOR THE PLUCKY SQUIRE! @YOU MUST FOLLOW HUMGRUMP OUT OF THE BOOK AND PUT A STOP TO HIM... @BEFORE HE BECOMES ALL-POWERFUL! @WHAT HANGS IN THE BALANCE IS... @THE FATE OF THIS BOOK, AND THE ENTIRE OUTSIDE WORLD! @... @NO PRESSURE. @GO GET HIM, LAD!
target: HAU EZKUTARI AUSARTARENTZAKO LANA DA! @PETRALTZAR LIBURUTIK KANPORA JARRAITU ETA GELDIARAZI BEHAR DUZU... @AHALGUZTIDUN BIHURTU AURRETIK! @LIBURU HONEN PATUA DAGO JOKOAN ETA KANPOKO MUNDU GUZTIARENA ERE BAI! @... @PRESIORIK GABE. @HARRAPA EZAZU, LAGUN!

source: THE HEAVY IRON GATE WAS VERY MUCH _____
THE HEAVY IRON GATE WAS VERY MUCH [SHUT]
THE HEAVY IRON GATE WAS VERY MUCH [BROKEN]
THE _____ WALL ONLY LED TO ANOTHER CELL CHAMBER, HA!
THE [BROKEN] WALL ONLY LED TO ANOTHER CELL CHAMBER, HA!
_____ THING WAS CERTAIN
[ONE] THING WAS CERTAIN
THERE WAS _____ WAY OUT
THERE WAS [NO] WAY OUT
THERE WAS [ONE] WAY OUT

source: JUBILATION! THE PAGES HAVE UNFROZEN! @THE WORKINGS OF BOOK MAGIC ARE QUITE A MYSTERY, YOU KNOW... @I BELIEVE YOU MAY NOW RETURN TO YOUR BOOK'S PAGES, AND TO YOUR COMPANIONS. @I WISH YOU THE BEST OF LUCK, JOT. I HAVE THE UTMOST FAITH IN YOU! @GO NOW!

source: ROCKETING RASPBERRIES! @THAT BUTTERFLY WAS A REAL MEAN SPECIMEN! @THE GALAXY IS HEAVING WITH WEIRD OLD CREATURES, Y' KNOW... @BUT YOU GAVE THAT ONE A RIGHT GOOD BOP! @BLASTINGLY BRILLIANT JOB, THE BOTH OF YOU! @YOU'RE SHAPING UP TO BE QUITE THE INTERGALACTIC HEROES. @NOW, YOUNG WARRIOR... BEST RETURN TO YOUR HOME PLANET!
target: ZIRKUITUEN IZENEAN! @TXIMELETA HORI ZINEZ HORRORXOU ZEN! @GALAXIA IZAKI BITXIEZ BETETA DAGO, BADAKIZU... @BAINA HORRI LEZIO EDERRA EMAN DIOZU! @LAN APARTA EGIN DUZUE ZUEK BIOK! @GALAXIA-ARTEKO HEROIAK IZATEKO BIDEAN ZAUDETE. @ORAIN, GERLARI GAZTEA... source: IF YOU TILT THE CRATES TO SLIDE THEM ACROSS THE FLOOR... @YOU COULD MAKE A WALKWAY. @WELL, MAYBE NOT WITH TWO CRATES. @MAYBE WITH THREE CRATES. @THREE CRATES ARE BETTER THAN TWO, AS I ALWAYS SAY.
target: KAXAK OKERTZEN BADITUZU LURREAN ZEHAR IRRISTATZEKO... @BIDE BAT IREKI ZENEZAKE. @TIRA, AGIAN EZ BI KAXEKIN. @AGIAN HIRUREKIN. @HIRU BI BAINO HOBETO, BETI DIODAN BEZALA.

source: DIFFICULT TO GET THE CRATES LINED UP JUST PERFECT, EH? @YOU'LL WANT TO BE STOPPIN' ONE OF THEM, I'D SAY. @STOP THE CRATE, MIGHT WORK GREAT.
target: KAXA HORIEK BIKAIN LERROKATZEA ZAILA DA, EH? @BATEN BAT GELDITU BEHAR ZENUKE, NIK USTE. @GELDITU KAXA, FUNTZIONA DEZAKE.

target: PSST... BILA ZABILTZAN GITLZA... KAXA BATEAN DAGO. @KAXA PUSKATZEN BADUZU, HARTU AHAL IZANGO DUZU.

target: TIRA, KAXAK PITZATUTA. @BAINA EZ ERABAT PUSKATUTA. @ORAIN, NOLA PUSKATUKO DITUZU? @LEHERKETA BATEKIN, NIK USTE. @ERANTZUNA LEHERKETAN DAGO, JOT.

source: RIGHT, RIGHT.

THAT GREEN-GLOWING SECTION OF PIPE... @BUZZING WITH METAMAGIC, IT IS. @ONE FUNNY THING ABOUT METAMAGIC IS... IT CAN TRANSFER THINGS BETWEEN PAGES. @IF YOU WERE TO PRESS THAT METAMAGICAL PIPE SECTION ONTO ANOTHER PAGE... @IT MIGHT GET TRANSFERRED ACROSS. @HOW WOULD YOU PRESS ONE PAGE ONTO ANOTHER? @WELL... IF YOU CLOSED THE PAGES, THAT'D DO IT. @THIS IS ALL THEORY, OF COURSE.

ORRIAK ITXIZ GERO, HORTXE DUZU. @HORI TEORIA DA, NOSKI.

source: YOU CAN MOVE THE PIPE SECTION BY TILTING THE BOOK. @PRO-TIP.

source: HELLO CHUCK.
YOU'LL BE NEEDING TO GET THAT BIG CRATE ON TOP OF THE BIG BUTTON. @TRY SLIDIN' THE CRATE AROUND. @ALSO - IT'S FULL OF METAMAGIC. WHICH MEANS YOU CAN TRANSFER IT BETWEEN PAGES. @NO NEED TO THANK ME.
target: NIK USTE KAXA HANDIA BOTOI HANDIAREN GAINEAN JARRI BEHARKO ZENUKEELA. @SAIATU KAXA IRRISTATZEN. @GAINERA, METAMAGIAZ GAINEZKA DAGO. ORRIETAN ZEHAR GARRAIA DEZAKEZULA ESAN NAHI DU HORREK. @EZ EMAN ESKERRIK.

source: SEE THE METAL BLOCKS WITH THE ROUND HOLES ON THEIR TOP SURFACE? @PUSHERS, THEY ARE. THEY PUSH THINGS. @BUT ONLY IF YOU GIVE 'EM A JOLT. @WHAT KIND OF JOLT? @THE ANSWER IS ALWAYS EXPLOSIVES.
target: IKUSTEN DITUZU GAINEAN ZULOA DUTEN METALEZKO BLOKE HORIEK? @GAUZAK BULTZA DITZAKETE. @LAGUNTZATXO BAT BAKARRIK BEHAR DUTE. @NOLAKO LAGUNTZATXOA? @ERANTZUNA BETI DA: LEHERGAILUAK.

source: NOW, YOU MAY NEED TO STOP THAT CRATE FROM SLIDING AROUND. @FOR THAT, I'D RECOMMEND THE BIG METAL PLATFORMS THAT RISE OUT OF THE FLOOR. @HOW DO YOU MAKE THEM RISE? BY HITTIN' THE ORB SWITCH. @HOW DO YOU HIT THE ORB SWITCH WHEN YOU'RE OUT OF THE BOOK? @ONE WORD: BOOM.

source: CRACKING JOB. TO THE LEFT YOU'LL FIND THE PATH BACK. @JUST A BIT FURTHER NOW. @KEEP YOUR NERVE AND YOU'LL BE BACK IN YOUR BOOK IN A JIFFY. @WHEN YOU'RE BACK SEND ME A POSTCARD.

source: WHAT AN ABSOLUTE HONOUR TO FINALLY MEET YOU. @AH... @BUT... @I CAN SEE YOU THINKING... 'WHO'S THIS WEIRD ROBED CHAP?' @WELL... SINCE NO ONE ELSE IS AROUND... I THINK IT'S ONLY POLITE THAT I SHOW MY FACE.
target: ZELAKO OHOREA AZKENEAN ZU EZAGUTU AHAL IZATEA. @AH... @BAINA... @BADAKIT ZER ARI ZAREN PENTSATZEN... 'NOR DA TXANODUN XELEBRE HAU?' @TIRA... INGURUAN EZ DAGOENEZ INOR GEHIAGO... ZER GUTXIAGO NIRE AURPEGIA ERAKUSTEA BAINO.

source: WE MEET AGAIN, JOT! @YOU REMEMBER ME, DON'T YOU? @THE LAST TIME WE MET WAS IN PREHISTORY... YOU WERE MANICALLY DODGING LAVA BOMBS AS I RECALL. @I BELIEVE I MAY HAVE MENTIONED; I AM A TIME TRAVELER.
target: BERRIZ TOPATU GARA, JOT! @GOGORATZEN NAUZU, EZTA? @TOPATU GINEN AZKENENGO ALDIAN HISTORIAURREAN GEUNDEN... @LABA BONBETATIK IHESI ZENBILTZAN GOGORATZEN DUDANEZ. @USTE DUT AIPATU NIZULA: DENBORA-BIDAIARIA NAIZ.

source: BUT WHAT I DIDN'T MENTION IS THAT I'M ACTUALLY FROM YOUR FUTURE. @AND IN THAT FUTURE I'M THE MAIN CHARACTER IN A SERIES OF BOOKS - JUST LIKE YOU! @QUITE POPULAR BOOKS, I MUST ADD... @WITH VERY LUCRATIVE MERCHANDISING TIE-INS AND BRAND INTEGRATIONS!
target: BAINA ESAN EZ NIZUNA DA, IZATEZ ZUEN ETORKIZUNEKOA NAIZELA. @ETA ETORKIZUN HORRETAN LIBURU SORTA BATEKO PROTAGONISTA NAIZ, ZU BEZALA! @LIBURU NAHIKO EZAGUNAK, ESAN BADEZAKET... @MERCHANDISING OSO ERRENTAGARRIAREKIN ETA MARKEKIN LANEAN

source: I CAME BACK TO YOUR TIME TO WATCH YOU AND YOUR FRIENDS ON YOUR HISTORIC ADVENTURES. @YOU DIDN'T DISAPPOINT... THE WAY YOU SHOWED THAT HUMGRUMP WHAT-FOR...
target: ZU ETA ZURE LAGUNEN ABENTURA HISTORIKOAK BERTATIK BERTARA IKUSTEKO ETORRI NAIZ. @EZ DUZUE HUTSIK EGIN... @PETRALTZAR TRISTE HORI GARAITU ZENUTEN MODUA...

source: WHEN HE DOUBTS HIMSELF AND NEEDS TO BE BRAVE... @WHEN HE KNOWS WHAT THE RIGHT THING TO DO IS, EVEN THOUGH IT'S HARD... @OR WHEN HE NEEDS TO THINK OF A CREATIVE WAY OUT OF A TOUGH SPOT... @HE REMEMBERS THE PLUCKY SQUIRE AND HIS FRIENDS... @AND THE WAY FORWARD REVEALS ITSELF.
target: BERE BURUAZ ZALANTZA EGITEAN EDO KEMENTSU SENTITU BEHAR DUENEAN... @BADAKIENEAN ZEIN DEN EGIN BEHARREKO GAUZA ZUZENA, NAHIZ ETA GOGORRA IZAN... @EDO ARAZOREN BATI IRTEERA IRUDIMENTSUA BILATU BEHAR DIONEAN... @EZKUTARI AUSARTA ETA BERE LAGUNETAZ OROITZEN DA... @ETA AURRERANZKO BIDEA AGERTZEN ZAIO.

source: NOW... I'VE SAID WHAT I NEEDED TO SAY, I'VE SEEN WHAT I WANTED TO SEE... @I MUST BE GOING! @UNTIL WE MEET AGAIN, PLUCKY SQUIRE...
target: ORAIN... ESAN BEHARREKOA ESAN DUT, IKUSI NAHI NUENA IKUSI DUT... @JOAN EGIN BEHAR DUT! @BERRIZ TOPO EGIN ARTE, EZKUTARI AUSARTA...

source: JOT DUDE... THERE YOU ARE! WE CAME TO FIND YOU...
target: JOT TXO... HEMEN ZAUDE! ZURE BILA ETORRI GARA...

source: AND TO TAKE A BREATHER FROM THE PARTY. IF WE'RE BEING HONEST...
target: ETA FESTATIK ATSEDEN PIXKA BAT HARTZEKO. DENA ESATE ALDERA...

source: SO MANY PEOPLE WANT TO TALK TO US... @HELLO... NICE TO MEET YOU... HELLO THERE... HI... PHEW!!!
target: JENDE PILOAK HITZEGIN NAHI DU GUREKIN... @KAIXO... URTE ASKOTARAKO... KAIXO... IEPA... FIU!!!

source: I THINK I MIGHT HAVE DEVELOPED A VACANT STARE...
target: USTE DUT BEGIRADA FINKOA GARATU DUDALA...

source: IT'S PRETTY COOL THOUGH... ALL THE NICE THINGS PEOPLE ARE SAYING ABOUT US.
target: GAUZA EDERRA DA HALA ERE... GUTAZ ZEINEN GAUZA POLITAK ESATEN DITUZTEN.

source: KIND OF UNBELIEVABLE... MAKING US SOUND LIKE WE'RE... HEROIC WARRIORS OR SOMETHING!
target: NAHIKO SINESKAITZA... GURETAZ HIZKETAN... HEROI GERLARIAK BAGINA BEZALA!

source: WELL... Y'KNOW... WE DID SORT OF... SAVE THE LAND. PRETTY MAJOR DEAL!
target: TIRA... BADAKIZU... LURRALDEA... SALBATU DUGU. EZ DA GUTXI!

source: NO LIE. QUITE THE THING, REALLY...
target: EZ BA. GAUZA HANDIA DA BENETAN...

source: YEAH... I... SUPPOSE SO!
WE ROCKED!
GO US!
WHOAH, THEY BROKE OUT THE FIREWORKS!
ROCKIN' PARTY.
HEY, JOT... I WANTED TO ASK... @YOU'RE GOING TO BE WRITING THIS WHOLE ADVENTURE UP IN A NEW BOOK, RIGHT?
target: AIZU JOT... GALDETU NAHI NIZUN... @ABENTURA GUZTI HAU LIBURU BERRI BATEAN IDATZIKO DUZU, EZTA?

source: YOU HAVE TO! @I MEAN... IT'S ONE GNARLY STORY...!
target: EGIN BEHAR DUZU! @ZERA... ISTORIO ITZELA DA...!

source: ... SOMEWHERE IN THE TIME STREAM!
OOH, MAKE SURE I LOOK REALLY COOL, OK! @MAYBE LEAVE OUT THE PART WHERE WE'RE BEING ATTACKED BY POISONOUS SNAKES... @MY MUM WOULD FREAK OUT...
target: OOH, EGIN NAZAZU DEMASEKOA, BAI? @HOBE SUGE POZOINTSUEK ERASO EGIN ZIGUTEN UNEA ALDE BATERA UZTEN BADUZU... @NIRE AMA IZUTU EGINGO DA...

source: THE TITLE! WHAT'S THE TITLE GOING TO BE?
target: IZENBURUA! ZEIN IZANGO DA BA IZENBURUA?

source: SOMETHING HEROIC! WARRIOR-ESQUE!
HEY, WAIT A MINUTE... IS SOMEONE WATCHING MINIBEARD? @YOU KNOW HOW HE GETS AROUND FIREWORKS...
target: EGON MINUTU BATEZ... NORBAITEK BADAKI NON DAGOEN MINILARGI? @BADAKIZUE NOLA JARTZEN DEN SU ARTIFIZIALEKIN...

source: GOOD POINT!
COME ON DUDES, LET'S GET BACK TO THE FUN!
POW!
UTTERLY SENSATIONAL!
I'VE ALSO COME TO GIVE YOU A MESSAGE FROM THE AUTHOR OF MY BOOKS. @HE WANTED TO LET YOU KNOW... @THAT YOU, VIOLET, THRASH, PIP... MOONBEARD... HAVE ALL BEEN A GREAT INSPIRATION TO HIM.
target: ZURI NIRE LIBURUEN EGILEAREN MEZU BAT EKARTZERA ERE ETORRI NAIZ. @ZURI JAKINARAZTEA NAHI DU... @VIOLET, THRASH, PIP, ZU... ILARGIBIZAR... BERETZAT INSPIRAZIO HANDIA IZAN ZARETELA.

source: CHAPTER TEN
A GREAT INSPIRATION
TARQUIN
HEY, LATCH!#JUST HANGIN' HERE AS A TEST. @HAVE YOU CHANGED YOUR HAIR? IT BOILS QUITE NICELY NOW! @UGH, PRESS THE B BUTTON TO SHUT ME UP.
target: KAIXO! #HEMEN PROBETARAKO BAKARRIK NAGO. @ORRAZKERA ALDATU AL DUZU? ZORAGARRI DUZU! @ARG, SAKATU B BOTOIA NI ISILARAZTEKO.
