source: JUMP
EXIT

YEP, IT'S HUMGRUMP ALRIGHT. ALWAYS UP TO TREACHEROUS TRICKERY, THAT ONE. @THIS IS A JOB FOR THE PLUCKY SQUIRE, JOT! @HUMGRUMP IS AT TOME TOWER... @HEAD THERE AND MAKE SURE THAT CREEPY LITTLE TWERP DOESN'T CAUSE ANY MORE BOTHER!
target: BAI BA, PETRALTZAR IZAN DA. BETI BADARABIL MALTZURKERIAREN BAT HORREK. @HAU EZKUTARI AUSARTARENTZAKO LANA DA, JOT! @PETRALTZAR LIBURUKI DORREAN DAGO... @ZOAZ HARANTZ ETA ZIURTATU KAIKU HORREK EZ DUELA ARAZO GEHIAGORIK SORTUKO!

source: THAT WEASELLY WIZARD IS AT TOME TOWER. YOU KIDS HEAD OVER THERE, AND JOT... @PUT A STOP TO HUMGRUMP'S MALARKEY! @I'LL LOOK INTO THAT STRANGE GREEN MAGIC... @LATER!
target: AZTI MALTZUR HORI LIBURUKI DORREAN DAGO. ZOAZTE HARUNTZ GAZTETXOOK, ETA JOT... @GELDI EZAZU PETRALTZARREN GAIZTAKERIA! @NIK MAGIA BERDE BITXI HORI AZTERTUKO DUT... @AIO!

source: LEAD THE WAY, JOT!
YOU GOT THE BOW! @HERE, YOU'LL BE ABLE TO GET DOWN TO THE DESK AND BACK TO YOUR BOOK!
target: ARKUA LORTU DUZU! @HEMENDIK MAHAIRA JAITSI ETA ZURE LIBURURA JOAN AHAL IZANGO ZARA!

source: WELL THIS IS UNKNOWN TERRITORY, KIDDOS. @JOT, YOUR STORY HAS NEVER TAKEN YOU TO THIS AREA... YOU'RE OFF-SCRIPT NOW! @NO HAPPY ENDINGS GUARANTEED... YOU COULD GET SPLATTED, EATEN BY A HUGE FROG... WHO KNOWS? @NEVERTHELESS, YOU ZZZKVCCCH @ZZDVVVVVVV @VVVDDCH BAD RECEPTION!
target: TIRA, LURRALDE EZEZAGUNA DUGU HAU, TXIKIOK. @JOT, ZURE ISTORIEK EZ ZAITUZTE SEKULA HONA EKARRI... GIDOIZ KANPO ZABILTZA! @EZ DUGU BUKAERA ZORIONTSU ZIURRIK... @ZAPALDU ZAITZAKETE, IGEL ERROLDOI BATEK JAN... NORK DAKI?. @HALA ERE, ZUK ZZZKVCCCH @ZZDVVVVVVV @VVVDDCH ESTALDURARIK GABE!

source: SO... THIS MUST BE ONE OF THE PORTALS MOONBEARD WAS TALKING ABOUT... @AND YOU, JOT... CAN JUST... JUMP RIGHT OUT OF OUR WORLD THROUGH THIS THING? @ONTO... A DESK IN SOMEONE'S ROOM??
target: BERAZ... ILARGIBIZARREK AIPATUTAKO ATARI HORIETAKO BAT IZANGO DA HAU... @ETA ZUK, JOT... SOILIK... JAUZI EGIN ETA GURE MUNDUTIK KANPORA ZOAZ HEMENDIK? @NORBAITEN... GELAKO MAHAIRA??

source: {120}I'M A CHARACTER... IN A STORY????? @{140}MY WHOLE LIFE IS JUST A PLOTLINE?? @{100}... @SORRY. IT'S JUST A BIT MUCH TO TAKE ON BOARD...
target: {120}IPUIN BATEKO... PERTSONAIA NAIZ????? @{140}NIRE BIZITZA OSOA ARGUMENTU BAT BAINO EZ DA?? @{100}... @BARKATU. ONARTZEA PIXKA BAT ZAILA EGITEN ARI ZAIT...

source: {175}THE PLUCKY SQUIRE!{100} @YES, THAT'S RIGHT. THIS BOOK IS ALL ABOUT YOU. AND ME. AND ALL WHO LIVE IN THIS DRATTED LAND. @IT TURNS OUT, YOU SEE, THAT OUR LAND OF MOJO IS JUST... @...{150}A SETTING IN A STORYBOOK!{100} @I READ THE BOOK... IT'S VERY INTERESTING. @YOU AND THAT WITCH GIRL ADVENTURING THROUGH THE LAND... @MEETING UP WITH THE MOUNTAIN TROLL, MAKING YOUR WAY HERE TO MEET ME... @IN FACT... I READ AHEAD... TO THIS VERY CHAPTER. I'VE SEEN WHAT HAPPENS NEXT. @WE FIGHT, HERE ON THE ROOF. ANY GUESSES HOW THAT TURNS OUT?
target: {175}EZKUTARI AUSARTA!{100} @BAI, HALAXE DA: LIBURU HAU ZURI ETA NIRI BURUZKOA DA. @ETA LURRALDE HONETAKO BIZTANLE GUZTIEI BURUZKOA. @IKUSTEN DENEZ, GURE MOJO LURRALDEA... @...{140}UMEENTZAKO IPUIN BATEKO LEKUA DA!{100} @LIBURUA IRAKURRI DUT... OSO INTERESGARRIA. @ZU ETA SORGIN HORI LURRALDEAN ZEHAR ABENTURA HASTEN... @MENDIKO TROLLAREKIN TOPATU ZINETENEKOA, NI AURKITZEKO HONAINOKO BIDEA... @ETA... AURRERAXEAGO EGIN DUT... KAPITULU HONETARA AILEGATU ARTE. GERTATUKO DENA IKUSI DUT. @BORROKA EGINGO DUGU, HEMENTXE BERTAN. BADAKIZU ZER GERTATUKO DEN?

source: BECAUSE YOU ARE THE PLUCKY SQUIRE. THE HERO OF THIS STORY. THE BOY WHO CAN DO NO WRONG. @ALWAYS VICTORIOUS! EVEN THE LITTLE STORIES YOU WRITE... BELOVED BY ALL!
target: ZU EZKUTARI AUSARTA ZARELAKO. ISTORIO HONETAKO HEROIA. OKERRIK EGIN EZIN DUEN MUTIKOA. @BETI GARAILE! ZUK IDATZITAKO IPUINTXO HORIEK ERE DENEK MAITE DITUZTE!

source: I SUPPOSE YOU MUST HAVE A GREAT NUMBER OF QUESTIONS, LAD! @THE ANSWER TO THE FIRST QUESTION IS... @YES. OUR ENTIRE WORLD IS INDEED A LAND IN A STORYBOOK. @I'VE KEPT THIS KNOWLEDGE A CLOSELY GUARDED SECRET FOR MANY A YEAR. @SOMEHOW, THAT GREASY NINCOMPOOP HUMGRUMP FOUND OUT. @NOW HE KNOWS THE TRUTH, WHO KNOWS WHAT MISCHIEF HE'S PLANNING. @BUT THAT JUST MEANS, YOUNG SQUIRE, THAT WE MUST BE DOUBLE THE TROUBLE!
target: GALDERA ASKO IZANGO DITUZULA PENSATZEN DUT, LAGUN! @LEHENENGO GALDERAREN ERANTZUNA DA... @BAI. GURE MUNDU GUZTIA IPUIN BATEKO LURRALDE BAT BESTERIK EZ DA. @URTE LUZEZ GORDE IZAN DUT SEKRETU HAU. @BAINA, NOLABAIT, PETRALTZAR HIGUINGARRI HORREK JAKIN EGIN DU. @EGIA HORI EZAGUTU DU ETA NORK DAKI ZER NOLAKO GAIZTAKERIA PRESTATZEN ARI DEN. @ETA HORREK ZER ESAN NAHI DUEN, EZKUTARI GAZTEA? LAN HANDIA IZANGO DUGULA!

source: METAMAGIC, THAT IS. IT LETS YOU BREAK THE FOURTH WALL. @COME, JOT. SHOW ME YOUR NEW MAGIC TRICK.
target: METAMAGIA DU IZENA. LAUGARREN PARETA PUSKATZEKO BALIO DU. @TIRA, JOT. ERAKUTSIDAZU ZURE MAGIA TRUKO BERRIA!

source: I HEAR YOU'VE ALREADY MET? @THEN YOU'LL KNOW THERE'S A LOT OF WISDOM STORED IN THAT TINY BEARDED HEAD.
target: ELKAR EZAGUTZEN DUZUELA JAKIN DUT, EZTA? @BURU BIZARDUN TXIKI HORRETAN JAKITURIA HANDIA DAGO GORDETA.

source: YOU'RE NOT A GHOST, ARE YOU?
OF COURSE HE ISN'T, THRASH! @ JOT, WHERE WERE YOU??
target: NOSKI EZ DELA, THRASH! @JOT, NON IBILI ZARA??

source: INDEED! I'M TALKING TO YOU VIA A DEVICE KNOWN AS A RUNETOOTH HEADSET. @THIS IS A STRANGE MAGICAL FORM OF COMMUNICATION KNOWN AS... A 'CONFERENCE CALL'. @ NOW LISTEN UP! THIS BUSINESS WITH HUMGRUMP IS RATHER WORRYING. @WE MUST CONSULT WITH QUEEN CHROMA AT ARTIA CITY. YOU THREE SHOULD HEAD THERE NOW! @ I'LL JOIN YOU KIDS LATER. @VIOLET, THRASH - I'LL FILL YOU IN ON THE SITUATION WHILE YOU TRAVEL. @MOONBEARD OUT!
target: HALA NAIZ! BLUTUZ IZENEZ EZAGUNA DEN GAILU BATEKIN ARI NATZAIZUE. @KOMUNIKAZIO MAGIKO MOTA BITXI BAT DA ETA IZENA DU... 'TELEKONFERENTZIA'. @ORAIN ENTZUN! PETRALTZARREN KONTU GUZTI HAU KEZKAGARRIA DA. @ARTIA HIRIAN DAGOEN KROMA ERREGINAREKIN HITZ EGIN BEHAR DUGU. @HARANTZ JOAN BEHAR ZENUKETE ORAINTXE! @BERANDUAGO ELKARTUKO NAIZ ZUEKIN. @VIOLET, THRASH... ZUEN BIDAIAN ZEHAR AZALDUKO DIZUET GERTATUTAKOA. @ILARGIBIZARREK MOZTU!

source: WELL... YOU HEARD HIM. A TRIP TO ARTIA CITY... MY HOME TOWN! @ C'MON, LET'S SCOOT!
target: TIRA... ENTZUN DIOZU. ARTIA HIRIRA BIDAIA... NIRE JAIOTERRIRA! @TIRA BA, WAZEMANK!!

source: JOT! @OUR LAND HAS NEVER BEEN TROUBLED BY SOMETHING QUITE LIKE HUMGRUMP'S METAMAGIC BEFORE. @THERE MAY BE GREAT UPHEAVALS AND BIG BATTLES AHEAD. @BUT I HAVE FAITH YOU'LL RISE TO WHATEVER CHALLENGES ARE THROWN OUR WAY. @NOW, I EXPECT THAT YOUR FRIENDS ARE WAITING FOR YOU. @IF YOU LEAVE THE BOOK AND TURN TO THE NEXT PAGE I THINK YOU'LL FIND THEM!
target: JOT! @GURE LURRALDEAN EZ DUGU INOIZ PETRALTZARREN METAMAGIA ADINAKO ARRISKURIK EZAGUTU. @BALITEKE ASALDURA ETA BORROKA HANDIAK AURKITZEA. @BAINA BADAKIT AURREAN JARRIKO ZAIZUN EDOZEIN ERRONKA GAINDITUKO DUZULA. @ORAIN, ZURE LAGUNAK ZAIN IZANGO DITUZU. @LIBURUTIK ATERA ETA HURRENGO ORRIRA BAZOAZ, BERTAN AURKITUKO DITUZU!

source: WE HAVE SUCCESSFULLY EXITED THE HOME PLANET'S ATMOSPHERE! @WE'RE IN THE BIG BAD GALAXY, NOW... @WHERE THE THREE PIECES OF MY DAD HAVE BEEN SCATTERED. @MY DEEP SPACE THRUSTERS ARE ENABLED... @IT'S TIME TO EXPLORE THE COSMOS... LET'S JET!
target: PLANETAKO ATMOSFERATIK IRTEERA ARRAKASTATSUA IZAN DA! @GALAXIA HANDI ETA BELDURGARRIAN GAUDE ORAIN... @NIRE AITAREN HIRU ZATIAK BARREIATURIK DAUDEN LEKUAN. @ESPAZIO SAKONEKO PROPULTSATZAILEAK AKTIBATUTA DITUT... @ESPLORA DEZAGUN KOSMOSA... @AIRERATU!

source: THAT'S THE LAST SCIENTIST... YOU GOT 'EM ALL. @THIS BASE IS FULL OF NERDS NOW. @THEY'RE ALREADY COOKING UP OUR NEXT WEAPON! @GOOD JOB, SOLDIER! @YOUR NEXT MISSION - TAKE THIS PIECE OF JUNK AND TRANSPORT IT BACK TO YOUR HOME PLANET!
target: HORI DA AZKEN ZIENTZIALARIA... GUZTIAK DITUZU. @BASEA FRIKIZ BETETA DAGO ORAIN. @DAGOENEKO GURE HURRENGO ARMA PRESTATZEN ARI DIRA! @LAN ONA, SOLDADU! @ZURE HURRENGO HELBURUA: ZABOR ZATI HAU HARTU ETA ERAMAN ZURE PLANETARA!

source: DON'T FORGET OLD TERRY, OK?

OH, HELLO THERE! @I'M ZIP, NICE TO MEET YOU... @...JOT, YOU SAY? YOU'RE LOOKING FOR SOME KIND OF ITEM? @WELL, Y'KNOW, MY DAD COULD HELP... HE'S VERY SMART. @BUT HE'S CURRENTLY ALSO RATHER DISASSEMBLED. @SOME OBNOXIOUS SOLDIERS BARGED INTO OUR LITTLE PLANET HERE AND TOOK HIM APART! @HEY, IF YOU HELP ME REASSEMBLE THE OLD MAN, HE'LL HELP YOU FIND WHAT YOU'RE AFTER! @I'M NOT SUPER CONFIDENT IN MY JETTING SKILLS... BUT TOGETHER MAYBE WE COULD DO THIS... @HOW ABOUT IT? @IF YOU JUMP OUT OF THIS PLANET I'LL HOP ON YOUR BACK! @THEN WE CAN GO LOOKING FOR DAD'S FRAGMENTS TOGETHER!
target: HARA, KAIXO! @ZIP NAIZ, URTE ASKOTARAKO... @...JOT, ESAN DUZU? OBJEKTUREN BATEN BILA ZABILTZA? @TIRA, ZIUR NIRE AITAK LAGUNDUKO LIZUKEELA... OSO ARGIA DA. @BAINA ORAINTXE BERTAN ZATIKATUTA DAGO. @SOLDADU HIGUINGARRI BATZUK GURE PLANETA TXIKIRA ETORRI ETA DESMUNTATU EGIN ZUTEN! @AIZU, NIRE AITA BERRIZ MUNTATZEN LAGUNTZEN BADIDAZU, NAHI DUZUNA AURKITZEN LAGUNDUKO DIZUT! @EZ NAIZ PROPULTSIOAN OSO TREBEA... BAINA ELKARREKIN AGIAN EGIN DEZAKEGU... @ZER IRUDITZEN? @PLANETA HONETATIK ATERATZEN BAZARA, ZURE BIZKARREAN IGOKO NAIZ! @ELKARREKIN JOANGO GARA NIRE AITAREN ZATIAK HARTZERA!

source: HELLO THERE. @EXCUSE MY SHIVERS... @THERE'S A BIG HORRIBLE RAT AROUND HERE THAT IS GIVING ME THE HEEBIE-JEEBIES. @THE RAT'S IN A DARK HOLE... @IF YOU WALK IN FRONT OF IT, IT'LL POUNCE AND EAT YOU. @CERTAIN DOOM, MATE. UNLESS... @IF YOU COULD FIND SOME CHEESE AROUND HERE, YOU COULD DISTRACT THE RAT.
target: KAIXO, KAIXO. @BARKATU DARDARKA ETORTZEA... @HOTZIKARAK EMATEN DIZKIDAN ARRATOI HANDI BAT DABIL HEMEN INGURUAN. @ARRATOIA ZULO BELTZ BATEAN DAGO... @PARETIK PASATUZ GERO, JAUZI EGIN ETA JAN EGINGO ZAITUZTE. @BUKAERA ZITAL ZIURRA. EDONOLA ERE... @INGURUAN GAZTARIK AURKITUZ GERO, DISTRAITUKO LITZATEKE.

source: SEEMS LIKE YOU TWO HAVE HIT A BIT OF AN IMPASSE THERE! @YOU'RE NOT GOING TO HALT THAT MACHINE BY ASKING IT POLITELY, YOU KNOW. @NOPE, I THINK YOU'LL NEED TO STOP IT WITH A SPECIAL KIND OF ITEM, JOT. @AN ITEM... YOU MAY FIND OUT THERE ON THE TABLE!
target: @BADIRUDI PASA EZINEZKO LEKU BATERA AILEGATU ZARETELA! @MAKINA HORI EZ DA GELDITUKO, EZTA GOXO ESKATUTA ERE, BADAKIZUE? @EZPA, OBJEKTU BEREZIREN BAT BEHARKO DUZUE HORI GELDITZEKO, JOT. @OBJEKTUA HORI... MAHAI GAINEAN AURKITUKO DUZUELAKOAN NAGO!

source: WE DID IT! WE WON THE INTERGALACTIC BATTLE! @LET'S GET BACK TO MY HOME PLANET AND PUT MY DAD BACK TOGETHER! @THAT'S THE MUG-SHAPED PLANET WHERE WE FIRST MET!
target: LORTU DUGU! GALAXIA-ARTEKO BORROKA IRABAZI DUGU! @GOAZEN NIRE PLANETARA ETA MUNTATU DEZAGUN! @LEHENENGOZ ELKARTU GINEN KATILU FORMAKO PLANETA DA!

source: YO, GOOD SIR... COULD YOU KINDLY OPEN THE GATES?
target: ZU, UNTXI ON... ATEAK IREKITZERIK IZANGO AL ZENUKE?

target: BAIMENA... EHH... @NIK EZ DUT, JOT... @ZUHAIXKEN ARTEAN BILATU DEZAKEGU, AGIAN NORBAITI INGURUAN BATEN BAT ERORI ZAIO...

source: SO LONG, KRONG!
HOO! THAT WAS KIND OF FUN, DUDE! @HAVEN'T HAD SUCH AN INTENSE DRUMMING WORKOUT FOR A GOOD WHILE... @LET'S ZIP ON AHEAD!,BUA! OSO DIBERTIGARRIA IZAN DA
target: TXO! @ASPALDIAN EZ NUEN BATERIA HORRELAKO GOGOZ JO... @GOAZEN EGURRA EMATERA!"

source: THAT'S TRARRG, THE LEGENDARY METAL WARRIOR. JAMMIN' OUT! @THEY SAY HE TRANSMITS HIS ENERGY TO ALL WHO LIVE ON THE MOUNTAIN. @Y'KNOW, GROWING UP HERE... I NEVER REALLY GOT IT. @BUT NOW... I'M STARTING TO FEEL SOME OF THAT MOUNTAIN TROLL FIRE...
target: HORI TRARRG DA, ELEZAHARRETAKO METAL GERLARIA. SOLO BAT EGITEN! @BERE ENERGIA MENDIKO BIZTANLE GUZTIEI IGORTZEN DIELA ESATEN DA. @NAHIZ ETA HEMEN HAZIA IZAN, TXIKITAN EZ NUEN ULERTZEN, BADAKIZU? @BAINA ORAIN...MENDIKO TROLL HORREN GARRA NABARITZEN HASI NAIZELA USTE DUT...

source: WE'LL HAVE TO WORK TOGETHER, DUDE!

target: AURREAN IZAN PETRALTZARREN EZKUTALEKUA. @PALAMENKO POZIK ZUEK HONA EKARRITA. @BAINA PALAMENKOK ETXERA JOAN BEHAR ORAIN.

source: YOU DID AMAZING, TUMBA.
TUMBA FEEL... HAPPY... @MADE SOME NEW FRIENDS TODAY. @TUMBA CAN'T DANCE... BUT... @TUMBA DANCIN' ANYWAY!
target: ... @PALAMENKO SENTITZEN... POZIK... @LAGUN BERRIAK EGIN GAUR. @PALAMENKOK EZIN DANTZA EGIN... BAINA... @HALA ERE PALAMENKO DANTZAN!

source: SO LONG, AND GOOD LUCK, FRIENDS.
GUYS, WE WON'T BE ABLE TO DEFEAT THIS CHAP WITH A BONK ON THE HEAD. @NO. A MAGIC WIELDER CAN ONLY BE DEFEATED... BY MAGIC. @I SUPPOSE IT'S TIME... @FOR ME TO STEP UP TO BAT.
target: @MUTILAK, EZ DUT USTE TIPO HAU BURUKO BATEKIN GARAITUKO DUGUNIK. @EZ. MAGIA ERABILTZAILEA BAKARRIK GARAITU DAITEKE... MAGIAREKIN. @BADA GARAIA... @PAUSU BAT AURRERA EMAN DEZADAN.

source: VIOLET... THAT WAS AMAZING!

BUT YOUR STORYBOOK... @HOW WEARY, STALE AND UNINSPIRING THE STORY HAS BECOME. @THE LIFE ENERGY... IT IS DRAINING FROM ITS PAGES. @YOU MUST DEFEAT HUMGRUMP AND RESTORE THE BOOK'S STORY TO ONE OF LIGHT! @AND ALSO... GET THE BOOK BACK ONTO THE DESK. @BUT FIRST THINGS FIRST! LET'S GET YOUR ITEMS AND WEAPONS BACK!
target: BAINA ZURE LIBURUA... @ISTORIOA ERABAT ASTUN, NEKAGARRI ETA INSPIRAZIORIK GABEA BIHURTU DA. @BIZI ENERGIA... ORRIETATIK ALDE EGITEN ARI DA. @PETRALTZAR GARAITU ETA LIBURUARI DAGOKION ARGIA ITZULI BEHAR DIOZU! @ETA GAINERA... LIBURUA BERRIZ MAHAIRA ITZULI. EZ DAKIT HORI NOLA EGINGO DUGUN. @BAINA HAS GAITEZEN HASIERATIK! BERRESKURATU ZURE OBJEKTU ETA ARMAK!

source: ITS LIFE ENERGY... HAS FULLY DISSIPATED! @IT IS A FROZEN TOME. THIS IS WHAT HAPPENS TO FORGOTTEN BOOKS.
target: BERE BIZI ENERGIA... ERABAT JOAN DA! @IZOZTUTAKO LIBURUKIA DA. HAU DA AHAZTUTAKO LIBURUEI GERTATZEN ZAIENA.

source: AN ELEVATOR... @IT'S OUR WAY UP TO THE SURFACE!
UMMMMMM... @NOPE.

{200}JOT!!!{100}@{200}YOU'RE ALIVE!!{100}@BOY AM I HAPPY TO SEE YOU! @{200}ANYWAY{100}@WE'RE NOT IN THE BEST SHAPE, TO BE HONEST... @MOONBEARD... IS NO LONGER WITH US. @HUMGRUMP NOW RULES MOJO FROM HIS HORRIBLE PALACE... @IT'S SAID THAT QUEEN CHROMA IS IMPRISONED IN HIS PALACE. @I SEE YOU DON'T HAVE YOUR SWORD... @I OVERHEARD SOME TROOPS SAYING THEY'D TAKEN ALL YOUR GEAR TO A SPOT SOMEWHERE 'OUTSIDE THE BOOK' @BUT TWO THINGS WE MAY FIND HERE ARE... VIOLET AND THRASH. @C'MON, LET'S GO FIND THEM!
target: {200}JOT!!!{100}@{200}BIZIRIK ZAUDE!!{100}@AI, ASKO POZTEN NAIZ ZU IKUSTEAZ! @{200}EDONOLA ERE{100}@EGIA ESANGO DIZUT, HONEK EZ DU ITXURA ONIK... @ILARGIBIZAR... EZ DAGO GURE ARTEAN. @PETRALTZARREK AGINTZEN DU MOJON BERE PALAZIO ZATARRETIK... @KROMA ERREGINA PALAZIOAN PRESO DAGOELA ESATEN DA. @IKUSTEN DUT EZ DUZULA EZPATARIK... @ZURE GAUZA GUZTIAK 'LIBURUTIK KANPO'KO LEKUREN BATEAN DAUDELA ESAN DIET SOLDADUEI @BAINA HEMEN BI GAUZA BILATU BEHAR DITUGU... VIOLET ETA THRASH. @GOAZEN, AURKI DITZAGUN!

source: WE MUST RETURN THE BOOK TO THE DESK! IT MAY REGAIN SOME ENERGY THERE... @THE WORKINGS OF BOOK MAGIC ARE QUITE A MYSTERY, YOU KNOW! @I WISH YOU THE BEST OF LUCK, JOT. GO NOW!
target: LIBURUA MAHAIRA ITZULI BEHAR DUGU! BALITEKE BERTAN BIZI ENERGIA BERRESKURATZEA... @LIBURUETAKO MAGIAREN FUNTZIONAMENDUA MISTERIO HUTSA DA, BADAKIZU! @ZORTERIK ONENA OPA DIZUT, JOT. JOAN ZAITEZ!

source: AND NOT A HAIR OUT OF PLACE! NOTHING MAJOR HAPPENED WHILE YOU WERE GONE. @IT GOT A LITTLE CHILLY. BUT THEN IT WARMED UP AGAIN.
target: ILE BAKAR BAT ERE HARROTU GABE GAINERA! EZ DA GAUZA HANDIRIK GERTATU EZ ZEUNDEN BITARTEAN. @PIXKA BAT FRESKO EGON DA. BAINA BERRIZ EPELDU DU.

source: COME ON, LET'S SCOOT!
THANK YOU, JOT. THANK YOU, PIP. @I'LL DO WHAT I CAN. @WE CAN'T LET HUMGRUMP GET AWAY WITH WHAT HE DID TO MOONBEARD.
target: ESKERRIK ASKO, JOT. ESKERRIK ASKO, PIP. @AHAL DUDANA EGINGO DUT. @ILARGIBIZARRI EGIN DIONA ETA GERO EZIN DIOGU PETRALTZARRI IRABAZTEN UTZI.

source: I MEAN, OF COURSE WE ARE! @WHO'S GOING TO STOP THE MOJAM CREW?
target: TIRA, NOSKI BIZI GARELA! @NORK GELDITUKO DU MOJAM TALDEA?

source: HEAVY DUTY PIPE... TRANSPORTING META MAGIC AROUND, NO DOUBT. @THAT GREEN STUFF HAS THE FUNNIEST PROPERTIES... @IT CAN POP THINGS RIGHT OUT OF THE BOOK... @AND EVEN TRANSFER THEM FROM PAGE TO PAGE... @AT LEAST, THAT'S WHAT MOONBEARD TOLD ME.
target: HODI SENDO HAUEK... METAMAGIA GARRAIATZEKO DIRA, ZIUR. @GAUZA BERDE HORREK NAHIKO EZAUGARRI BITXIAK DITU... @GAUZAK LIBURUTIK ATERA DITZAKE... @BAITA ORRITIK ORRIRA PASA ERE... @HORI ESAN DIT ILARGIBIZARREK, BEHINTZAT.
